string.name: desc
string.value: [종족특성 스킬] 캐논슈터 특유의 강인함을 익혀 각종 스탯을 영구적으로 증가 시킨다.

string.name: h
string.value: 영구적으로 힘 #strX, 민첩성 #dexX, 지력 #intX, 운 #lukX , 최대 HP #mhpR%, 최대 MP #mmpR% 증가

string.name: desc
string.value: 영구적으로 자신의 상태 이상 내성과 모든 속성 내성을 증가시키고 블루 오라의 능력을 업그레이드한다. 추가로 블루 오라 사용 시 주변 파티원들의 방어력을 증가시킨다.\n필요 스킬 : #c블루 오라 20레벨 이상#

string.name: h
string.value: 액티브 효과 : MP #mpCon 소비, 분배된 데미지의 #y% 흡수, 아군의 방어력 #z% 증가\n[패시브 효과 : 상태 이상 내성 #asrR 증가, 모든 속성 내성 #terR% 증가]

string.name: pdesc
string.value: 영구적으로 자신의 상태 이상 내성과 모든 속성 내성을 증가시키고 블루 오라의 능력을 업그레이드한다. 추가로 블루 오라 사용 시 주변 팀원들의 방어력을 증가시킨다.\n필요 스킬 : #c블루 오라 20레벨 이상#

string.name: desc
string.value: MP를 소비하여 일정 시간 동안 현재 활성화된 오라의 효과를 비약적으로 강화시킨다. 슈퍼바디 상태가 해제될 때까지 다른 오라로 전환할 수 없다. 또한 적의 공격에도 버프가 해제되지 않는다.\n필요 스킬 : #c다크 오라 10레벨 이상, 옐로우 오라 10레벨 이상, 블루 오라 10레벨 이상#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP #mpCon 소비, #time초 동안 현재 발동 중인 오라의 효과 중 다음과 같은 부분에 대해 #x배 적용
다크 오라 : 데미지 증가량
옐로우 오라 :공격 속도, 이동 속도, 회피율 
블루 오라 : 분배된 데미지 흡수량, 방어력 증가량
재사용 대기시간 #cooltime초

string.name: desc
string.value: 영구적으로 자신의 상태 이상 내성과 모든 속성 내성을 증가시키고 블루 오라의 능력을 업그레이드한다. 추가로 블루 오라 사용 시 주변 파티원들의 방어력을 증가시킨다.\n필요 스킬 : #c블루 오라 20레벨 이상#

string.name: h
string.value: 액티브 효과 : MP #mpCon 소비, 아군이 받은 데미지의 #x% 분배, 분배된 데미지의 #y% 흡수, 아군의 방어력 #z% 증가\n패시브 효과 : 상태 이상 내성 #asrR 증가, 모든 속성 내성 #terR% 증가

string.name: desc
string.value: 현재 적용중인 모든 오라를 나에게 집중하여 효과를 극대화시킨다. 슈퍼 바디가 활성화 상태일 때만 사용할 수 있으며 빅 크런치 오라 상태에서는 슈퍼 바디 및 다른 오라를 사용할 수 없다.\n필요 스킬 : #c슈퍼 바디 20레벨 이상#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP #mpCon 소비, #time초 동안 현재 발동 중인 오라의 효과 중 다음과 같은 부분에 대해 3배 적용
다크 오라 : 데미지 증가량
옐로우 오라 :공격 속도, 이동 속도, 회피율 
블루 오라 : 데미지 흡수량 #x% 적용
재사용 대기시간 #cooltime초

string.name: desc
string.value: 새틀라이트의 공격 데미지가 영구적으로 증가한다. 또한 순간적으로 치명상을 입게 될 경우, 새틀라이트가 데미지의 일부를 대신 흡수하여 피해를 최소화할 수 있다. 데미지를 흡수한 새틀라이트는 자동 소멸되어 일정 시간 동안 세이프티 효과를 발동시킬 수 없다.\n스킬 사용 시 효과가 활성화되고 재사용 시 비활성화되는 #c온오프 스킬#\n필요 스킬 : #c새틀라이트 10레벨 이상#

string.name: h
string.value: 새틀라이트의 공격 데미지 #damR% 증가\n순간적인 피격 데미지가 최대 HP의 #x% 이상일 경우 발동, 피격 데미지의 #y%를 새틀라이트가 흡수\n#c재발동 대기시간 #cooltime초#

Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Lv. 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.value: Muster your faith in the darkest of times to recover health.\nDoes not activate in towns or while affected by statuses that prevent HP recovery. string.name: h
string.value:
Reduces Zero's attack skill cooldown by 4 seconds (excluding Transcendent and 5th Job skills).
#c[Detect]#: When Alpha attacks, Critical Rate increases by 2% for 20 seconds. Can stack up to 10 times.
#c[Strength]#: When Beta attacks, damage increases by 1% for 20 seconds. Can stack up to 10 times, Attack Speed increased +1 when max stacked
#cEffect for [Detect] and [Strength] remains even when tagged.#

string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nSummon the White Angel sealed inside the White Angelic Blessing.

string.name: desc
string.value: Learn a Link Skill from another character within the world or remove the Link Skill that you currently learned.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nTemporarily increases your Speed and Jump.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 50, Movement Speed: +20, Jump: +10, Duration: 200 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nCreates a portal that leads to the nearest town. You (and only you) can use it multiple times until it disappears. Press Up to use it.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 120, Uses 2 Magic Rocks, Portal Duration: 120 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nAllows you to locate an enemy's weak spot to deal fatal damage to that enemy.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 80, Crit Rate: +10%, Crit Damage: 8%, Duration: 240 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nIncreases Max HP and Max MP.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 80, Max HP and Max MP: +40%, Duration: 240 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill] Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. #cOnly 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level#, while other skills can only be increased to master level. \nExceptions: Some special skills, Beginner Skills, Combat Orders, Decent Combat Orders, Hyper Skills, and 5th Job Skills cannot be increased.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 64, All skill levels increased by 1 level for 240 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nGreatly increases your ATT, Magic ATT, DEF, Max HP, and Max MP. Can be stacked with other buff skills, except Bless and Advanced Blessing.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 120, Attack Power: +20, Magic ATT: +20, DEF: +425, Max HP: +475, Max MP: +475, Duration 240 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nConsumes HP and MP to increase your attack speed 1 level for a fixed period of time. Can be stacked with other buffs except Speed Infusion.

string.name: h1
string.value: HP Cost: 120, MP Cost: 120, Attack Speed increased for 240 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\n Increases damage by 10% when attacking monsters with the word Pig in their names.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\n Increases damage by 10% when attacking monsters with the word Stump in their names.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\n Increases damage by 10% when attacking monsters with the word Slime in their names.

string.value: Fires two arrows at an enemy.

string.name: pdesc

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a spirit that attacks the enemies you attacked.

string.value: Summons a spirit that attacks the enemies you attacked.

string.name: desc
string.value: Your arrows walk on the wind, flying through any monsters they touch.

string.value: Deals a powerful strike to your enemies. #cIf the enemies are close, also increases your Critical Rate#. #cIf they're far away, also increases your damage#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons an Evil Eye that heals you regularly when it is near. The Evil Eye does not receive bonuses to summon duration.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean's basic powers stem from being a natural-born boss monster. His awesome abilities make him totally different from regular monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: 여러 가지 도구를 사용하는 것이 재미있다는 것을 깨달은 핑크빈이 공격키를 연타하면 전방의 적 다수를 다양한 도구로 수회 연속 공격하며 함께 사용한 방향키 방향으로 전진한다. 전진 중에는 몬스터에게 부딪히지 않는다.\n사용 후 핑크빈 어택을 제외한 스킬의 데미지가 1회 증가하며 다른 스킬로 연계가 가능하다.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cCommon for all hits#: MP Cost per attack: #mpCon, Skill Damage Increase buff once to skill other than Pink Bean Attack will disappear after use or after #time sec
#c1st hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #y% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Final Damage of next skill: +#x%
#c2nd hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #w, Damage: #u% + #v% per level, Number of Attacks: #s, Final Damage of next skill: +#q% 
#c3rd hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #v2, Damage: #s2% + #u2% per level, Number of Attacks: #w2, Final Damage of next skill:+ #q2%
#c4th hit#: Required Level: 80, Max Enemies Hit: #speedMax, Damage: #psdJump% + #psdSpeed% per level, Number of Attacks: #dotInterval, Final Damage of next skill: +#dotTime%

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean realized using tools can be fun! Keep tapping the attack key to deal 4 consecutive attacks with lots of tools and move forward.\nIncreases damage for other skills after use. Can be linked to other skills.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cCommon for all hits#: MP Cost per attack: #mpCon, Skill Damage Increase buff once to skill other than Pink Bean Attack will disappear after use or after #time sec
#c1st hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #y% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Final Damage of next skill: +#x%
#c2nd hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #w, Damage: #u% + #v% per level, Number of Attacks: #s, Final Damage of next skill: +#q% 
#c3rd hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #v2, Damage: #s2% + #u2% per level, Number of Attacks: #w2, Final Damage of next skill:+ #q2%
#c4th hit#: Required Level: 60, Max Enemies Hit: #speedMax, Damage: #psdJump% + #psdSpeed% per level, Number of Attacks: #dotInterval, Final Damage of next skill: +#dotTime%

#cCommon for all hits#: MP Cost per attack: #mpCon, Skill Damage Increase buff once to skill other than Pink Bean Attack will disappear after use or after #time sec

string.name: desc
string.value: 걷는 것보다 구르는 것이 빠르다는 것을 알아버린 핑크빈이 앞으로 굴러 이동하며 공격한다. 지상과 공중에서 사용할 수 있으며 사용한 위치에 따라 다른 특성이 적용된다. 데굴데굴은 공격 반사 상태의 적을 공격해도 피해를 입지 않는다.

string.name: h
string.value: #cOn Ground#: MP Cost: #mpCon per sec. While the skill key is held, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #w% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount while moving. After a set time, size gets bigger, Damage: #z% + #s% per level, Max Duration: #time sec, Cooldown: #cooltime sec\n#cIn Air#: MP Cost: #v, Jump once more during a jump to use it and rolls forward in the air to attack, Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #y% + 1% for every #u level(s), Number of Attacks: #q2, Cooldown: 0.5 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean lands from the air more slowly than usual. It reminds you of something...

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Falling Speed during Keydown: #x, Can only be used in the air.

string.name: desc
string.value: When Pink Bean is tired from exploring Maple World, he has lots of cool ways to relax. This skill produces different effects depending on the action. Not affected by buff duration increase.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cCommon for all methods#: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Cooldown: #cooltime sec, Won't bump into monsters after use for +#x sec, EXP obtained: +#y%, Cannot be cast while hanging onto a rope or ladder.
#cTongue Out#: Max Enemies Hit: #z, Enemy DEF: -#s%
#cNom Nom Meat#: Recovers #w% of your Max HP per sec
#cZzz#: Fully Recovers HP and MP, ATT: +#u%
#cMysterious Cocktail#: Status Resistance: +#v
#cPink Bean Headset#: ATT: +#s2%, Status Resistance: +#w2

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean loves growing monstrous plants, and this is a perfect spot for one! The plant's attack is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Cooldown: #cooltime sec
#cPosie#: Use with the down arrow key, Max Enemies Hit: #y, Damage: #x% + #u% per level, Duration: #v sec
#cBreezy#: Max Enemies Hit: #psdSpeed, Damage: #z% + #q% per level, Number of Attacks: #w
#cPretty#: Use with the up arrow key, Duration: #s sec, Seduces to decrease DEF by #s2%, Speed by #psdJump

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean loves soaring through the skies of Maple World! Not affected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Duration for charging: #time sec. The more you charge, the further you can jump. Reach max distance at #dotTime sec.
You can use direction keys during the jump to adjust the distance. Attacks a max of #mobCount enemies, inflicts #damage% + damage #w% per level, then jumps again. Can jump again #z time(s).
Can be used in the air, but will drop you to the ground immediately.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean cheers up the whole party with a special brand of adorableness! Boosts Party EXP, Speed, Attack Power, and Magic Attack Power. Unaffected by buff duration increase.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Won't bump into monsters after use for #y sec, Cannot be cast while hanging onto a rope or ladder.\nDuration: #time sec, All party member EXP: +#indieExp%, Speed: +#indieSpeed, ATT/Magic ATT: +#indiePadR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean is one of the finest yo-yo-ers of this generation! Watch this burning trick that clobbers enemies multiple times. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
You can get up to #x yo-yo(s) every #s sec, and they are used when you use the skill.
#c1st Hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #z% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Can be used consecutively as a 2-hit attack.
#c2nd Hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #w% + #u% per level, Number of Attacks: #q2. Use the skill consecutively to link as one hit.
#cBuff#: Blazing Yo-yo Damage: +#s2%, Duration: #time sec, can be stacked up to #u2 time(s). Buff disappears when a skill that is not Blazing Yo-yo is used.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean's love for all things pink can be... dangerous. This knocks over a pink pillar to deal heavy damage. During cooldown, there's a chance for Mini Beans to come to your aid, and every time they attack it lowers the cooldown on this skill. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #z% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Chance to summon Mini Beans during cooldown: +#y%
Each time Mini Beans attack, cooldown decreases by #x sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean is a huge music buff, and has no qualms about busting out with his instruments. Each instrument has its own special effect.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Cooldown: #cooltime sec
#cElectric Guitar#: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #x% + #u% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, When attack hits, party members' ATT and M. ATT will increase by #v% for #time sec
#cWhistle#: Max Enemies Hit: #u2, Damage: #z% + #q% per level, Number of Attacks: #psdSpeed, Hit Enemies will get DoT of #w% + 1% per level for #v2 sec
#cMegaphone#: Max Enemies Hit: #q2, Damage: #s% + #s2% per level, Hit enemies will have their accuracy decrease by #y% for #psdJump sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: With each attack, Pink Bean's fan club members, the Mini Beans, come out and attack alongside Pink Bean. What great groupies!

string.name: h
string.value: Chance to summon Mini Beans on attack: #z%, Duration: #x, Number of Mini Beans summoned: #u\nMini Beans' attacks: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #w% + #s% per level\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off# with the skill key.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean looooooves making shadow pictures, and summons a pink shadow which copies its actions after a short delay. It doesn't copy some movement skills, and copies summoning and buff skills but they have no effect.\nPink Bean sometimes looks back and sees the shadow acting after some delay. Wait, can a shadow do that?\nThe shadow's attack is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, summons a shadow that makes an additional hit that is #x% of the final damage for #time sec, can summon up to 3 shadows, cannot be cast while hanging onto a rope or ladder.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean took a shine to some goddess and imitated her to temporarily increase the stats of all party members.\nIt stacks with Maple Warrior, Call of Cygnus, Nova Warrior, Hero of the Flora, President's Orders, Anima Warrior, and Rhinne's Protection because imitation doesn't make one a goddess.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, won't bump into monsters after use, cannot be cast while hanging onto a rope or ladder.\nIncreases all stats assigned APs by 1% for every #y level for #time sec.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean is interested in moving through portals and keeps on opening new ones to random places. Sometimes someone familiar comes out of those portals.\nThere are still many devoted to following Pink Bean. Still as popular as ever.\nGo, Pink Beans! is not affected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, opens portals within a fixed range and summons someone that resembles Pink Bean.\nThat someone is angry and creates at least #x and at most #y areas. Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Attacked: #mobCount, Damage: #w% + #q% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Ballerina Pink Bean dons a tutu and gives a twirl. That's some incredible centrifugal force! Strong enough to break through rocks, even.\nCan move while using. Increases Damage, attack range, and Speed when used long enough. \nCannot be copied by Pink Shadow.

string.name: h
string.value: Key-down skill. The key can be held down for up to #time sec. Increases damage, attack range, and speed when used longer than a specific duration.\nPer Attack - MP Cost: MP #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #x% + #y% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Doubles Final Damage when used longer than a specific duration.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean loves zooming around on a pink scooter made just for him! And don't worry! It's not a battle scooter or anything, so it won't even sting if he hits you with it.\nCannot be copied by Pink Shadow.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon per second. While holding the skill key, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + 1% per #y level(s), Number of Attacks: #attackCount while moving. Speed: #x, Max Key-down Time: #time sec\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: 메이플 월드를 모험하며 여러 조형물에 관심이 생긴 핑크빈이 시간의 신전에 강림할 때의 모습을 재현한다.\n잘 만들어진 석상이야. 엇, 왜 움직이지. 몰라, 뭐야... 이거 무서워.\n신들의 황혼은 공격반사에 당하지 않는다.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP cost: #mpCon. Re-creates Twilight of Gods for #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #attackCount, Number of Attacks: #mobCount per sculpture for the duration. Cooldown: #cooltime sec
#cAriel#: Damage: #u% + #u2% per level, every #w sec
#cSolomon the Wise and Rex the Wise#: Damage: #v% + #q% per level, every #s sec
#cHugin and Munin#: Damage: #q2% + #v2% per level, every #w2 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: 마트료시카에 관심을 가진 핑크빈이 직접 체험을 해보기로 한다.\n다음에는 누가 나올까? 짜잔~ 나였습니다.\n핑크빈의 마트료시카는 핑크틱 쉐도우가 따라하지 않는다.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #y% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Duration: #time sec
Invincible while casting
Tosses an open Matryoshka doll in the surrounding area to temporarily attack enemies, Max Enemies Hit: #v, Damage: #s% + #u% per level, Number of Attacks: #w
Once thrown, the doll lasts for #z sec after Pink Bean's Matryoshka ends. It performs additional attacks upon disappearing, Max Enemies Hit: #v2, Damage: #s2% + #u2% per level, Number of Attacks: #w2
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean looooooves making shadow pictures, and summons a pink shadow which copies its actions after a short delay. It doesn't copy some movement skills, and copies summoning and buff skills but they have no effect.\nPink Bean sometimes looks back and sees the shadow acting after some delay. Wait, can a shadow do that?\nThe shadow's attack is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean looooooves making shadow pictures, and summons a pink shadow which copies its actions after a short delay. It doesn't copy some movement skills, and copies summoning and buff skills but they have no effect.\nPink Bean sometimes looks back and sees the shadow acting after some delay. Wait, can a shadow do that?\nThe shadow's attack is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cWhen your HP reaches 0# your dark contract keeps you alive,#c granting temporary invincibility# and#c allowing you to use Gungnir's Descent without any cooldown#. However, you must eliminate the required number of monsters before time runs out, or you will be dragged into the Shadow Abyss. The hourglass will be displayed during the reactivation cooldown.\nNot affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: #cWhen your HP reaches 0#, fully restores HP and MP, Invincibility Duration: #time sec, deals damage to enemies with attack ignore and attack reflection, #cIgnores Gungnir's Descent cooldown#. string.name: desc
string.value:
Lift up monsters or objects with the powers of psychokinesis. You cannot lift bosses, stationary monsters, or enemies 11+ levels higher than you. The following actions can be done while holding.
\c#cLevel 20 required to learn Psychic Clutch#

\c#c[Psychic Smash]:# Using [Psychic Grab] while the monster is lifted up will throw the monster at nearby enemies, dealing damage.

Lift monsters or objects with the overwhelming powers of psychokinesis. You cannot lift bosses, stationary monsters, or enemies 11+ levels higher than you. The following actions can be performed while holding.
Skill Requirements: #cPsychic Grab Lv. 20#

string.value:
Infuses your wings with the magic of the Elder Crystal. While active, Radiant Javelin is #cenhanced to Winged Javelin# to pursue enemies, exploding on contact. Its Attack Power is also increased.
While active, #ccasting Crystalline Wings while holding a directional key# will teleport you more quickly in that direction.
Wings of Glory is not affected by buff duration bonus or Buff Freezer effects.
Machina and Elder Crystal will be automatically summoned when Wings of Glory ends.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Part of your body links to the Abyss and transforms into the Specter.
Specter skills are powerful, but using this too often will activate your Specter state which tears at your soul and depletes your Spectra very quickly.
Consumed Spectra can be slowly recovered while in your Flora state.
Non-cash equipment is not visible even when equipped. Cape is not visible while in Specter-ridden state.

string.name: h
string.value:
Activate Specter State after using Specter skills multiple times.
If you use the last of your Spectra to maintain Specter State, you won't be able to recover it for #z sec, even in Flora State

string.name: desc
string.value:
Use a passage through the abyss to dodge your enemy's attack. Shifts to Specter State when the skill is used. Spectra is not consumed while using this skill, but you can't use it while affected by Spectra Fatigue. Not affected by cooldown reset.
You can move while using the skill by holding down the key. Triggers Boundless Horror to obliterate surrounding enemies when the key is released.
Boundless Horror does damage to enemies with attack ignore and attack reflection.
Boundless Horror can chain into any other skill. Skills chained from Boundless Horror will be performed in place, unless you use the arrow keys to direct their attacks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Causes you to move lightning fast, ruthlessly clawing at everything nearby.\nShifts to Abyssal Charge Drive in Flora State.

string.name: h
string.value: Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nRecovers #w% of Max HP when the attack hits\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Charges forward and creates an Abyssal Prison that binds and holds the enemy. The damage inflicted on the imprisoned enemy is applied when Blissful Restraint ends. Activates Specter State upon using the skill. Cannot be used while Spectra Fatigue is in effect. Not affected by cooldown reset.\nThe enemy with the highest Max HP within range will be attacked first. Unaffected by attack reflection. Does not trigger Impending Death.\nAffected enemies cannot be bound again by Blissful Restraint or other skills for 90 sec.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Bind Duration: #time sec, Bind duration can increase up to 100% based on the damage inflicted with this skill.
Afterward
Duration: #y sec, Max Enemies Hit: #u, Damage: #x%, Number of Attacks: #v
When the skill ends:
Damage: #w2%, Max Enemies Hit: #s2, Number of Attacks: #q2
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Opens the gate to the abyss, attacking forward for a moment, then summoning an Abyssal Guard for the final blow. Shifts to Specter State when the skill is used. Spectra is not consumed while using this skill, but you cannot use this while Spectra Fatigue is in effect. Not affected by cooldown reset.\nEndless Agony is unaffected by attack reflection. Abyssal Guard Attack does damage to enemies with attack ignore and attack reflection.\nThe final hit can chain into any other skill. Skills chained from the final hit will be performed in place, unless you use the arrow keys to direct their attacks.

string.name: h
string.value: Hold the key to continue the attack. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Max Duration: #dot sec, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. An Abyssal Guard is summoned when the key is released or when the skill ends.\nAbyssal Guard Damage: #s%, Abyssal Guard Max Enemies Hit: #q, Abyssal Guard Number of Attacks: #v, HP Recovery when the attack hits: #u% of Max HP, Final Damage based on duration: Up to #x%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Talisman Skill]# Summons a gourd that sucks up enemies. Press the skill key a second time to launch any enemies captured by the gourd.\nCannot swallow boss monsters, stationary monsters, or enemies 11+ levels higher than you. If you wait too long after sucking up enemies, you will be unable to launch them from the gourd.

Damage divided by the number of enemies being attacked (excluding #y% of Damage).\nBoss Damage: +#bdR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: When painting a dragon, the eyes are the final touch that brings it to life. So have you put the final touch on your training.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the damage of Humanity: As-You-Will Fan, Ground-Shattering Wave skills, Iron Fan Gale skills, Stone Tremor skills, Consuming Flames skills, and Humanity: Gold-Banded Cudgel.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the defense ignored by Humanity: As-You-Will Fan, Ground-Shattering Wave skills, Iron Fan Gale skills, Stone Tremor skills, Consuming Flames skills, and Humanity: Gold-Banded Cudgel.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the boss damage of Humanity: As-You-Will Fan, Ground-Shattering Wave skills, Iron Fan Gale skills, Stone Tremor skills, Consuming Flames skills, and Humanity: Gold-Banded Cudgel.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the damage of Talisman: Evil-Sealing Gourd.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the defense ignored by Talisman: Clone and Sage: Clone Rampage.

string.name: desc
string.value: Reduces the interval between attacks made by the Seeking Ghost Flame.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the damage of Scroll: Degeneration.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the Boss Damage for Scroll: Butterfly Dream.

string.name: desc
string.value: Reduces the interval between attacks made by Scroll: Star Vortex.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Heaven Skill]# Fans the flames of destruction. Can only be used while airborne.\n#cPress the up arrow key and skill key again to link into Consuming Flames (True), launching yourself further into the air. If you do not link into Consuming Flames (True), it will link into Consuming Flames (Clone), sending a clone instead.#\nNot affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Usage of Graceful Flight and Nimbus Cloud is reset after using this skill\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: #[Humanity Skill]# Summons the weapon of an ancient sage, delivering a series of quick blows to your enemies.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Final Blow Damage: #x%, Final Blow Number of Attacks: #y\nBoss Damage: +#bdR%\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Transforms into a thousand-ton stone and drops down from the sky to crush enemies on the ground. Can only be used while airborne. Can be used by pressing the skill key or by tapping the down arrow key twice.
Can only damage enemies that are in range at the time of casting.
Can be linked while you are using Heaven: Iron Fan Gale, Iron Fan Gale (True), Heaven: Consuming Flames, or Consuming Flames (True).
#cRight-click to lock command.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Drops straight down when used in the air, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.\nAttacked enemies Bleed for #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec.\n#cCooldown: #cooltimeMS sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: #[Talisman Skill]# Summons a warp gate. Press the skill key again while the gate is active to mark your location and teleport to the gate.\nUse the skill again while near the gate to teleport back to your marked location.\nPressing up and the skill key while the gate is open consumes Talisman Energy, opening a new gate while the existing warp gate and marked location vanish.

string.name: h
string.value: Talisman Energy Cost: #atGauge1Con, Warp Gate Duration: #time sec\nUsing the skill again teleports you to the gate, Using the skill near the gate teleports your previous location, Teleport Cooldown: #cooltime sec\n[Passive Effect: Avoidability Chance: +#prop%]

string.name: desc
string.value: #[Scroll Skill]# Summons a swarm of colorful but deadly flowers. While this skill is active, your attacks summon butterflies to attack your enemies.\n\n#Scroll: Butterfly Dream is unaffected by attack reflection.#

string.name: h
string.value: Scroll Energy Cost: #atGauge2Con, Duration: #time sec, Final Damage: +#indiePMdR%, Summons #u2 butterflies that deal #v2% damage when you attack.\nButterfly Summon Cooldown: #x sec\n[Passive Effect: Scroll: Degeneration Damage: +#damPlus%p]

string.name: desc
string.value: #[Scroll Skill]# Summons a powerful vortex that absorbs the enemies' energy. Use the skill again to make the vortex disappear. Restores HP and MP to party members based on how many enemies are hit.\n\n#Scroll: Star Vortex is unaffected by attack reflection.#

string.name: h
string.value: Scroll Energy Cost: #atGauge2Con, Creates a vortex that deals #damage% damage #attackCount times for #time sec\nYou can absorb 1 energy for every #z successful hits up to #x, Attacking boss monsters absorbs #w times the energy\nUsing the skill again will make the vortex disappear and restore #y% of the Max HP and Max MP of party member for each energy absorbed.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases the stats of all party members. Does not stack with Maple Warrior, Call of Cygnus, Nova Warrior, Hero of the Flora, President's Orders, Anima Warrior, or Rhinne's Protection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Increases all stats assigned APs by #x% for #time sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Hones your resolve to ignore certain abnormal status effects. Immune to Abnormal Status for 3 sec after use.

string.name: desc
string.value: Takes a sip of medicine stolen from your master's stash. Restores Talisman Energy and Scroll Energy over time.\nNot affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. For #time sec, periodically restores Talisman Energy by #x and Scroll Energy by #y.\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Transports you into a scroll featuring a beautiful vista, giving you a moment of respite in battle.\nIf you don't use the full skill duration, then this skill's cooldown will be reduced. Not affected by cooldown reset.\nCan be used while airborne or while using 1st to 4th job skills, but can only be activated during the finishing hit of Humanity: Gold-Banded Cudgel.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpRCon% of Max MP, Invincible while casting and while holding down the key, Max Skill Duration: #y sec\nWhen the skill effects end, cooldown is reduced by #x sec for each second of remaining duration.\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Transforms one of your clones into a clone of your master, who then proceeds to nag your enemies' ears off. Stuns targets. The stun's duration increases when there are fewer enemies in range.\n\n#cTargets cannot be stunned by Sage: Tai Yu Clone or other skills again for 90 sec.#

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP, Clone charges to the enemy with the highest Max HP within range, Max Enemies Hit: #u2, Damage: #v2%, Number of Attacks: #w2
Stun Duration: #y sec, If only a few enemies are hit, the duration increases to up to #time sec
Stun duration can increase up to 100% based on the damage inflicted with the attack.
#Cooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants 1 skill level for every 10 levels your highest level character has. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows one to lead up to 3 pets at once. (Passive skill)

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Max MP permanently. Also increases MP proportional to your level.

string.value: For every 5 levels on your highest level Cygnus Knight or Mihile character, this skill will gain 1 Skill Point. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Lv. 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Swathes you in a curtain of cards to teleport long distances.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Use directional keys to teleport\n(Arrows shown only for the directions you can go)\nNumber of directional keys you can enter: #z, Each movement you make after the skill ends increases the cooldown by #cooltimeMS seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Steals the skills of Explorer characters nearby. Certain skills cannot be stolen, and Bishop's Heal will have its cooldown increased.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Shifts to steal mode upon use\nMove the mouse cursor to select the nearby Explorer character

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to manage skills stolen from other Explorer characters. Use this skill to forget stolen skills or call them up with Impeccable Memory. Cannot use the skill directly after configuration.

string.name: h
string.value: Manage stolen skills. 30 second cooldown added.

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses up your entire stack of cards to pull out one card and grant additional effects to that card's attack. Can only been used when your deck is full.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Attacks with Carte Blanc #u times. Grants one of the following effects for #time sec:\n#cDestin Card:# Critical Rate +#v%\n#cMalheur Card:# Item Drop Rate +#w%

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses up your entire stack of cards to pull out one card and grant additional effects to that card's attack. Can only been used when your deck is full.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Attacks enemies with Carte Noir #u times. Also grants one of the following effects for #time sec.
#cDestin Card:# Critical Rate +#v%
#cMalheur Card:# Item Drop Rate +#w%
#cEndurance Card:# Abnormal Status Resistance +#x, Elemental Resistance +#y
#cDrain Card:# #z% of Max HP recovered when attacking

string.name: desc
string.value: Skill used exclusively in Phantom's tutorial.\nUse this skill to avoid being detected by the guards. #cYou will be detected if you collide with a guard.#

string.value: Tosses Mesos to distract a guard

string.value: Learn a Link Skill from another character within the world or remove the Link Skill that you currently learned.

string.name: desc
string.value: Judgment Draw can be set to either Auto Mode or Manual Mode. Double-click to switch between the two.

string.name: h
string.value: #cAuto Mode#: Automatically activates the Judgment Draw skill when your deck is full.\n#cManual Mode#: Judgment Draw must be used manually, even if your deck is empty.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill] Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. #cOnly 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level#, while other skills can only be increased to master level. \nExceptions: Some special skills, Beginner Skills, Combat Orders, Decent Combat Orders, Hyper Skills, and 5th Job Skills cannot be increased.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 64, All skill levels increased by 1 level for 240 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nGreatly increases your ATT, Magic ATT, DEF, Max HP, and Max MP. Can be stacked with other buff skills, except Bless and Advanced Blessing.

string.value: MP Cost: 120, Attack Power: +20, Magic ATT: +20, DEF: +425, Max HP: +475, Max MP: +475, Duration 240 sec

string.value: [Potential Skill]\nConsumes HP and MP to increase your attack speed 1 level for a fixed period of time. Can be stacked with other buffs except Speed Infusion.

string.name: h1
string.value: HP Cost: 120, MP Cost: 120, Attack Speed increased for 240 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You learn how to use potions more efficiently to resolve supply shortage issues.

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants 1 skill level for every 10 levels your highest level character has. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.

string.name: desc
string.value: For every 5 levels on your highest level Cygnus Knight or Mihile character, this skill will gain 1 Skill Point. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Lv. 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fill your light gauge completely to gain bonus damage with light magic. Each light magic attack will also restore some HP.

string.name: h
string.value: Light skills deal an additional hit dealing 50% of Final Damage and restoring 1% of your base HP per cast.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fill your dark gauge completely to gain bonus damage with dark magic. Dark magic uses 0 MP.\nCharacter Appearance Change On/Off: Right-click

string.name: h
string.value: Dark skills deal an additional hit proportional to the number of attacks that is 50% of final damage and use 0 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: The power of light breaks down enemy DEF, allowing your attacks to penetrate.

string.name: h
string.value: Enemy DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR% when attacking enemies

string.name: desc
string.value: Your perfect balance between light and dark increases Knockback Resistance and reduces all enemy attacks to 1 damage. All spells will deal extra damage with no cooldown. Light spells recover HP, and dark spells will not use MP. Character Appearance Change on/off: Right-click

string.name: h
string.value: Knockback Resistance +#prop% for #time sec. When using light and dark spells, delivers an additional attack inflicting #damage% of Final Damage for each hit. When Equilibrium is active, delivers an additional attack inflicting 100% of Final Damage for each hit. Ignores all cooldowns. Dark spells cost 0 MP. Light spells restore #x% of HP.\n#cThe total number of hits cannot exceed 15 for both Light and Dark attacks.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Your perfect balance between light and dark increases Knockback Resistance and reduces all enemy attacks to 1 damage. All spells will deal extra damage with no cooldown. Light spells recover HP, and dark spells will not use MP. Character Appearance Change on/off: Right-click

string.value: Knockback Resistance +#prop% for #time sec. When using light and dark spells, delivers an additional attack inflicting #damage% of Final Damage for each hit. [Command: #cUp + Attack Key#]
Command Effect: Increases your vertical jump 
#cRight-click to lock command#

string.name: desc
string.value: Masterfully counts up your attacks in a Combo Count. Increases Critical Rate and Attack Power with every 50 counts, stacking up to 10 times. Also passively increases your Knockback Resistance, Attack Power, Abnormal Status Resistance Chance, Critical Rate, and Critical Damage.\nRequired Skill: #cCombo Ability Lv. 10#\n#cLevel 10 required to learn Adrenaline Rush.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the damage of Double Swing, and the damage of next skill used after swinging once is increased by 1. Damage Increase only applies to Aran's skills except for that one swing. It also increases the damage of Double Swing, Triple Swing, and Combo Smash.\nRequired Skill: #cTriple Swing Lv. 20#\n#cLevel 10 required to learn Overswing#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Slams your polearm into the ground with great force, launching nearby enemies into the air. Enemies hit directly by the polearm will be frozen and take damage over time. Can be resisted by some monsters. You can control where the polearm lands.
[Command: #cUp, Down/Up, Right/Up, Left + Attack Key#]
Command Effect: Freeze
#cRight-click to lock command#

#cLevel 20 required to learn Finisher#
Passively increases skill damage.

#cLv. 20 required to learn Hyper Skill Adrenaline Generator#

string.value:
Swing your polearm around to deal massive damage, ignoring some DEF. Learn this skill to utilize Final Blow as the 3rd hit of Smash Swing.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to use Smash Swing while airborne. Use Smash Swing while jumping, and Maha will stop you from falling. You'll be able to move around, just like on the ground. Also, passively increase Smash Swing's damage.
[Command: Combo #cAttack Key# while jumping]
Required Skill: #cSwing Studies I Lv. 4#
#cLevel 10 required to learn Swing Studies II.#

string.value: Pummel your enemies with a series of swings so quick that your polearm becomes invisible. A whirlwind forms around Aran, sucking in all enemies. This skill can be activated by command only during Adrenaline Rush. Can be resisted by some monsters.\n[Command: #cDown, Left, Right + Attack (held down)#]\nRequired Skill: #cAdrenaline Rush Lv. 20#

string.name: desc
string.value: Charges forward to strike a powerful blow, automatically targeting the most powerful enemy in the direction of your attack. Charge the skill longer to do more damage. You're invincible while charging. This skill can be activated by command only during Adrenaline Rush.\n[Command: #cDown, Right, Up + Attack Key (held down)#]\nRequired Skill: #cAdrenaline Rush Lv. 20#

string.name: h

Damage increases by #s% points for every 1 sec of charging, up to 500% points. Can charge for up to 5 sec.\n#cOnly one finisher can be triggered per Adrenaline Rush.

string.name: desc

string.name: h

string.name: desc
string.value: Through intense study, you've perfected your polearm swing and Smash Swing technique. Increases your movement speed and damage while swinging. Increases the damage of skills used after Smash Swing. The 2nd and 4th hits of Smash Swing and Aero Swing become Final Blows.\nRequired Skill: #cAero Swing Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value: Smash Swing Damage: +#damPlus% points, Final Damage (of other skills): +#w% for #z sec.\n#c[Final Attack Skills]# Creates an afterimage that attacks up to #mobCount enemies with #damage% damage #attackCount times when you use other skills after Smash Swing. Increases Movement Speed during swings.

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls upon all of Aran's might to sweep enemies away with Maha. Can only be used linked after using the Final Blow, and you're invincible while using it. Additional Adrenaline Rush Effect: Shoots out shockwaves in front of you and behind you.\nRequired Skill: #cFinal Blow Lv. 20#\n#cLevel 30 required to learn Fenelle Crash.#

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Fusion Skill]# Mir immediately stops attacking and returns to Evan, scorching enemies in a curtain of flame. This skill advances alongside Dragon Breath. Activates when Evan uses #c[Return]# while Mir is using #cDragon Breath, Wind Breath, or Earth Breath#.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Fusion Skill]# Mir breathes out flames that homes in on enemies when his #cDragon Breath# melds with Evan's magic. Earth Breath advances alongside Dragon Breath. You won't take damage when this skill targets enemies with attack reflection. Activates when Evan uses #cEarth Circle# while Mir is using #cDragon Breath#.

string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, makes you invincible. Stun up to #mobCount enemies and inflicts #damage% damage #attackCount times for #time sec. Reduces enemy #cMagic DEF by #y% and Weapon DEF by #x%#.
Stun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Freezing Breath.
Only inflicts damage to stunned enemies.
This effect lasts as long as the key is held, up to #q sec. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, create a Frozen Orb that deals #damage% damage with ice shards to up to #mobCount enemies, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Create and throw a Frozen Orb that fires ice shards everywhere to deal damage. The orb slows significantly when it encounters an enemy. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Further increases movement range bonus from Teleport Mastery.\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off# with the skill key.\nRequired Skill: #cTeleport Mastery Lv. 10#

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates a large, unstable sphere of electricity to continuously zap enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: #cIncreases your damage in proportion to the number of nearby party members you have buffed#. Obtains additional #cParty Bonus EXP# based on the number of Clerics, Priests, Bishops in the party. Bonus cannot be greater than 60% and does not apply if the level difference is too big between party members. Your own effects do not apply to you.

string.name: h
string.value: Including yourself, #cincreases final damage by #x% in proportion to the number of nearby party members you have buffed.# #c20% bonus EXP for each# Cleric in the party.

string.name: desc
string.value: A combo skill used after lifting enemies into the air with Rising Rush. Fly towards airborne enemies, peppering them with swift attacks. Can also be used by pressing the up key and basic attack after using Rising Rush.\nIn addition, permanently increases the damage caused by Rising Rush. Can be linked with Leaf Tornado, Gust Dive, Rolling Moonsault, Spikes Royale, or Wrath of Enlil.

string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\n[Passive Effects - Rising Rush Damage: +#damPlus%p]

string.name: desc
string.value: Nullifies all enemy magic effects within the targeted area while removing some abnormal conditions suffered by nearby allies. Decreases Dispel and Divine Protection's cooldown. The Dispel skill can remove critical abnormal conditions, including KO, Seduction, Confusion, and Zombified.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, after nullifying magic and curing Abnormal Status at #prop% chance, Dispel's cooldown reduced by #y sec and\nDivine Protection's cooldown reduced by #time sec for each party member cured\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Fully restores HP for you and all party members and grants a holy shield that defends against all damage for a short time. The shield is not affected by buff duration extension effects. After being activated it cannot be reactivated for a short time, even if Holy Magic Shell is cast by another player.

string.name: desc
string.value: Quickly fire multiple arrows at enemies in front of you. Enemies who are hit have a chance to be stunned. Any enemies who are already stunned will take additional damage. Can be used in the air and linked with Rising Rush, Unicorn Spike, Spikes Royale, Lightning Edge, or Wrath of Enlil.\n#cLevel 20 is required to learn Ishtar's Ring and Advanced Stunning Strikes.#

string.value: When attacking Boss Monsters with Ishtar's Ring - Damage: +#bdR%

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the Abnormal Status Resistance increase from Water Shield.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the Elemental Resistance increase from Water Shield.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the amount of Defense reduced by Spikes Royale. This defense reduction is applied in addition to the base defense reduction granted by Spikes Royale.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enhances Leaf Tornado's damage boost increased by Spikes Royale.\nRequired Skill: #cSpikes Royale Lv. 1#

string.name: desc
string.value: Borrows the power of Ishtar, a legendary weapon, to rapidly fire arrows at enemies ahead of you. Hold down the skill key to fire arrows continuously. In addition, increases damage from Unicorn Spike permanently.\nRequired Skill: #cStunning Strikes Lv. 20#\n#cLevel 30 required to learn Irkalla's Wrath.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nWhen hit, Ignis Roar Duration: +0.1 sec\n[Passive Effect: Unicorn Spikes Damage: +#damPlus%p]

string.name: desc
string.value: Jump into the air while raining down legendary spears that deal damage to multiple enemies. Decreases enemy DEF, and makes all attacks critical hits. Also increases damage of Leaf Tornado. The skill can be linked with Leaf Tornado, Gust Dive, Rolling Moonsault, or Wrath of Enlil. Cooldown reduced by 1 sec when a Link skill is used.\nRequired Skill; #cLeaf Tornado Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Delivers a Critical attack. Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Enemy DEF: -#y%, Duration: #time sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec
Cooldown reduced by 1 second each time a linked skill is used.
#c[Passive Effect - Leaf Tornado Damage: +#damPlus%p]

string.name: desc
string.value: Dashes through multiple enemies. Ignores collision with bosses while attacking and increases Ishtar's Ring damage. Also increases Gust Dive damage. Can be linked with Rising Rush, Stunning Strikes, Unicorn Spike, Spikes Royale, or Wrath of Enlil.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks while moving forward: #attackCount, Ignore collision with boss and Debuff while attacking boss with Lightning Edge: Ishtar's Ring Damage: +#x%, Duration: #time sec. \n[Passive Effect: Gust Dive Damage: +#damPlus%p]

string.name: desc
string.value: Receive the Ancient Spirit's protection for a short time, which increases your Attack Power and HP. Also permanently increases Avoidability for Ignis Roar.\nRequired Skill: #cIgnis Roar Lv. 5#

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Spin quickly in the air while attacking enemies. Can also be used by pressing the down key and basic attack key after using Rising Rush. Can be linked with Leaf Tornado, Gust Dive, Spikes Royale, or Wrath of Enlil.\nIn addition, the damage caused by Rising Rush and Aerial Barrage will be permanently increased.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily summons Bahamut to deal Holy damage. Bahamut can attack multiple enemies at the same time, and being attacked by Bahamut will make them extra vulnerable to Holy attacks. This skill is unaffected by enemy damage reflection skills.

string.name: desc

MP Cost: #mpCon, Increases final damage of Magic ATT by #q%

The memory of an uneaten liver nibbles away at your subconscious, appearing sometimes when you hit enemies. Pick it up to strengthen your resolve and increase the buff's duration.

#cLiver Circle Dance#: Attacks up to 6 enemies with 275% damage 3 times, Cooldown: 3 sec
#cSpirit Frenzy#: Attacks up to 10 enemies with 150% damage, Duration: 4.8 sec, Shade's Spirit Frenzy Final Damage (while Spirit Guardian is using Spirit Frenzy): +#y%, Cooldown: 60 sec
#cSpirit Ward#: Uses Spirit Frenzy regardless of Shade's current Spirit Frenzy cooldown as long as Shade doesn't have Spirit Frenzy active, Cooldown: 100 sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill] Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. #cOnly 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level#, while other skills can only be increased to master level. \nExceptions: Some special skills, Beginner Skills, Combat Orders, Decent Combat Orders, Hyper Skills, and 5th Job Skills cannot be increased.

string.value: MP Cost: 64, All skill levels increased by 1 level for 240 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to use the Double Jump skill to move #cvery quickly.# Double-tap the up arrow key to jump again while in midair. Double-tap the down arrow key to descend more quickly.

string.value: For every 5 levels on your highest level Cygnus Knight or Mihile character, this skill will gain 1 Skill Point. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Lv. 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Exceed speeds up your attacks and makes you more powerful, but also strains your body and decreases the amount of HP you absorb through Life Sap. When you reach the skill's final stage, the attacks will change. Your Overload increases if you use another Exceed skill.

string.name: h
string.value: Life Sap -#y% for every #x Exceed Overload cap and #z Overload stacks.\nOverload +#w when another Exceed skill is used while Exceed skill is in use.\nUsing Overload Release reduces the Exceed levels to half.

string.name: desc
string.value: Makes potions more effective. Works on items likes Elixirs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Changes the star powers on your equipment. Increases Max HP based on the Star Force enhancement level on your equipped item, and the HP increase amount for each enhancement gets larger when the total of your equipped Star Force enhancements are higher.

string.name: h
string.value: Max HP increases proportional to the Star Force on your equipped items

string.name: desc
string.value: Your rage increases your damage output.

string.name: desc
string.value: Activate a blood pact to convert your HP to Attack Power. This pact lets you ignore Warrior and Demon Avenger equipment stat requirements. Recovery skill efficiency increases do not affect HP recovery from the Demon Avenger's skills. In situations where HP cannot be recovered, HP consumed by the 1st through 4th tier job skills will be reduced.

string.name: h
string.value:
Damage calculated based on Max HP.
Only a set percentage of Bonus HP from Equipment items are applied.
Base HP confers a greater damage bonus than HP bonuses from equipment and items.
Allows you to ignore stat requirements on Warrior and Demon Avenger equipment.
In situations where HP cannot be recovered, HP consumed by the 1st through 4th tier job skills will be reduced by #x%.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Santa Sled.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nSummon the Archangel sealed inside the Angelic Blessing.

string.name: ph
string.value: MP Cost: 0, Additional Jump distance\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: pdesc
string.value: You have been transformed into an Ice Knight. Defeat the challengers and survive until time runs out.

string.name: ph
string.value: You have been transformed into an Ice Knight. Defeat the challengers and survive until time runs out.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nSummon the White Angel sealed inside the White Angelic Blessing.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the Promessa to return to base.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Summons the Promessa to return you to base.\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Activates the Modal Shift system, allowing you to alter the attack mode of your skills. Use this skill again to change back.

string.name: h
string.value: Use this skill simultaneously with another skill to activate its alternate modes. Reactivate this skill to revert back.

string.name: desc
string.value: Activate your internal boosters to fly for a short time. You can only use buff skills while airborne.

string.name: h
string.value: Activate the booster to fly for #x sec. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleash a flurry with your Whip Blade to damage nearby enemies.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount

string.name: desc
string.value: Learn a Link Skill from another character within the world or remove the Link Skill that you currently learned.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nTemporarily increases your Speed and Jump.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 50, Movement Speed: +20, Jump: +10, Duration: 200 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nCreates a portal that leads to the nearest town. You (and only you) can use it multiple times until it disappears. Press Up Key to use it.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 120, Uses 2 Magic Rocks, Portal Duration: 120 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nAllows you to locate an enemy's weak spot to deal fatal damage to that enemy.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 80, Crit Rate: +10%, Crit Damage: 8%, Duration: 240 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nIncreases Max HP and Max MP.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 80, Max HP and Max MP: +40%, Duration: 240 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill] Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. #cOnly 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level#, while other skills can only be increased to master level. \nExceptions: Some special skills, Beginner Skills, Combat Orders, Decent Combat Orders, Hyper Skills, and 5th Job Skills cannot be increased.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 64, All skill levels increased by 1 level for 240 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nGreatly increases your ATT, Magic ATT, DEF, Max HP, and Max MP. Can be stacked with other buff skills, except Bless and Advanced Blessing.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 120, Attack Power: +20, Magic ATT: +20, DEF: +425, Max HP: +475, Max MP: +475, Duration 240 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nConsumes HP to increase your attack speed by 1 level for a short time. Can be stacked with buffs other than Speed Infusion.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 120, Attack Speed increased for 240 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Releases power built up in the relic through continuous combat to weaken the effects of the Ancient Curse.

string.name: h
string.value: Activated when attacking with a #cCardinal Force# skill. Accumulates up to level #x, with a Critical Rate increase of #y% for each level.\nCan only be activated when the curse is reducing your Critical Rate.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gain proficiency in the fundamentals of Archery. Increases Range, Movement Speed, and Max Movement Speed.

string.name: h
string.value: Range +#range, Movement Speed +#speed, Max Movement Speed Increased to #u

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Cardinal Force]#\nAn archery technique that zeroes in on targets within range. The damage from the guided shots fired with this skill cannot be reflected.\n#cLevel 20 required to learn Cardinal Deluge Amplification.#

string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount. Blasts an arrow that deals #damage% damage #attackCount times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to use the Double Jump skill to move #cvery quickly.# Double-tap the up arrow key to jump again while in midair. Double-tap the down arrow key to descend more quickly.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Lets you use 3 different special arrowheads. The quiver fills up again when you use all 3. #cPress the skill key to change the current arrowhead#. You will switch to the next arrowhead #cautomatically# if you use all of your current ones.
Blood Arrow: recovers set percentage of Max HP
Poison Arrow: Does poison damage over time, stackable up to 3 times
Magic Arrow: Shoots an additional magic arrow when attacking

string.name: h
string.value:
Fire 1 arrow out of #y from a quiver containing one of three types of Special Arrowheads. Automatically recharges when all three types are expended.
#c[Blood Arrow]# #w% chance to restore #x% of Max HP
#c[Poison Arrow]# Inflicts debuff which deals #dot% damage over #dotTime sec. Stacks up to #dotSuperpos times.
#c[Magic Arrow]# Has a #u% chance to fire a magic arrow that deals #damage% damage.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Fires 1 arrow from 1 of 3 types of special arrowheads. The quiver is refilled when you have used up all 3 types. #cPress the skill key to change the current arrowhead#. You will switch to the next arrowhead #cautomatically# if you use up all of the current type.
#c[Blood Arrow] -# Restores a set percentage of Max HP.
#c[Poison Arrow] -# Deals poison damage over time, stacks up to 3 times.
#c[Magic Arrow] -# Fires an additional magic arrow when attacking.

string.name: h
string.value:
Fires 1 arrow out of #y from a quiver containing three specialized arrows. The quiver refills when all three arrows have been expended.
#cBlood Arrow#: Has a #w% chance to restore #x% of Max HP
#cPoison Arrow#: Deals #dot% damage over #dotTime sec, and can stack up to #dotSuperpos times. When attacking an enemy with Poison Arrow's DoT applied, Critical Damage is increased by #s%.
#cMagic Arrow#: Has a #u% chance to fire a magic arrow that deals #damage% damage.

string.name: desc
string.value: While this skill is active, using Combat Teleport will create a streak of black lightning between your starting and ending positions, injuring enemies and marking them with a Dark Brand. Attacking enemies marked by Dark Brands consumes the brand and inflicts additional damage. Learning Dark Shock causes Dark Chain and Battle Burst to inflict Dark Brands, although Dark Brands cannot be consumed by those skills and minions.\nRequired Skill: #cCombat Teleport Lv.5+#\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off#.

string.name: h
string.value: Increases the MP Cost of Combat Teleport by #mpCon. Teleporting creates a streak of black lightning between your start and end positions. #c[Black Lightning]# Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Afflicts enemies with Dark Brand for #time sec. Attacking enemies with Dark Brand consumes the brand and deals an additional #x% damage #y number of times. Brand-consuming attacks deal #bdR% bonus damage against bosses.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hone in on the enemy's weak spot for a devastating shot.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Critical Rate: +#x%, Critical Damage: +#y%, Monster DEF Ignored: +#indieIgnoreMobpdpR%, Damage: +#indieDamR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: bookName
string.value: The Ancient Power and the Dark Curse

string.name: desc
string.value: Gathers energy in the relic through combat. The use of a Cardinal Force skill will cause the relic's emblem to shift, and a successful hit will add to the gauge.\nUsing #cAncient Force# skills will consume the built-up gauge. After using a Cardinal Force skill, you can chain other Cardinal Force or #cAncient Force# skills together, allowing them to be used more quickly.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Maximum Charge: #u\nAttacking an enemy with a Cardinal Force skill charges the relic gauge by #y, and by #x for every guided arrow of Cardinal Deluge that hits an enemy.\nIf a different Cardinal Force skill is used next, the cooldown for all Ancient Force skills will be reduced by #t, except for the 5th Job Advancement skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: Chance to recover HP/MP when attacking. You cannot recover more than 10% per attack.

string.name: h
string.value: Chance: #prop% per attack, HP/MP Recovery: #x% of damage dealt

string.name: desc
string.value: Grafting the Resistance technology onto the crossbow grants it more power. Also permanently increases Jump and Speed.

string.name: h
string.value: Attack Power: +#padX, Crossbow Skill Attack Range: +#range, Jump: +#psdJump, Speed: +#psdSpeed

string.name: desc
string.value: Releases power built up in the relic through continuous combat to further weaken the effects of the Ancient Curse.

string.name: h
string.value: Activated when attacking with a #cCardinal Force# skill. Accumulates up to level #x, with a Defense increase of #y% for each level.\nCan only be activated when the curse is reducing your Defense.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Cardinal Force]#\nEnhances the Cardinal Deluge skill.\n#cLevel 10 required to learn Advanced Cardinal Force#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Fires an arrow that deals #damage% damage to up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times. If a boss monster is within the attack's range, fires #z additional arrows.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Jaguar Skill]# Swipes at multiple enemies with consecutive attacks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Manifests the power stored within the relic to call forth magical arrows that chase and attack enemies in range for a set amount of time.\nThese magical arrows are not affected by attack reflection skills.\nRequired skill: #cCardinal Deluge Amplification Lv. 5 or above#

string.name: h
string.value: When using Cardinal Burst while the relic displays the Deluge emblem, there is a #prop% chance to create #bulletCount magical arrows.\nThese magical arrows will chase and attack nearby enemies for #time sec, dealing #damage% damage #attackCount times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases your Ancient Bow Mastery and Attack Power. \n#cLevel 10 required to learn Ancient Bow Expertise.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases STR and DEX through sheer physical training.

string.name: h
string.value: Permanently increase STR by #strX and DEX by #dexX.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you wear the ring, the goddess of victory will appear to guard you

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a well-tamed Jaguar to ride. Increases Speed and Knockback Resistance while riding. Use Summon Jaguar or a Jaguar Skill to get off the Jaguar and walk alongside it.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Speed While Riding: #x, Knockback Resistance: +#y%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Summons a tamed Jaguar for you to ride. Increases your Max HP, Critical Rate, Minimum Critical Damage, Avoidability, and Movement Speed.

string.name: ph

string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, jumps a a certain distance

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows your Jaguar to make another leap during a jump. Can be used up to two times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Crossbow Attack Speed for a short time.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Crossbow Attack Speed increased for #time sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Manage captured Jaguars. You can reach the Jaguar Habitat through Black Jack in the Secret Square. Your stats are increased by capturing special Jaguars. Snow White and Onyx Jaguar stats do not stack.

string.name: h
string.value: Manage captured Jaguars using the mouse.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Jaguar Skill]# The Jaguar roars viciously. The roar creates a shockwave that damages multiple enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Cardinal Force]#
An archery technique used to achieve high mobility. Release Swiftstrike Energy stored in your weapon as a short burst of speed that propels you to your destination, then swing your weapon to attack nearby enemies.
You can use the directional keys to move left, right, or up with this skill. If used without directional input, you will swing your weapon at your current location.
#cLevel 20 required to learn Advanced Cardinal Force#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Consumes 1 Swiftstrike Charge\nDeals #v% damage #w times to up to #u nearby enemies.\nYou gain 1 Swiftstrike Charge every #s2 sec, and can store up to a maximum of #y.

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls forth a dark-elemental Raven for a period of time. The summoned Raven can attack up to 4 enemies at once.\nThe Raven's attacks cannot be reflected by attack reflection skills. In addition, permanently increases your Defense.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, summon a Raven for #time sec. Deals #damage% damage to up to 4 enemies at once.\n[Passive Effect: Increases your Defense by #pddR%]

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Ancient Force]#\nLeap up and fire 3 explosive arrows downward. These arrows will explode when they come in contact with an enemy, or when they reach their maximum range.\nIf you are already airborne, the arrows will be fired immediately without the leap.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon. Explosions deal #u% damage #w times to up to #v enemies.\nCooldown #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Your growing resilience to the curse grants you the ability to resist abnormal status ailments for a set amount of time.\nAny status ailment received while this buff is active will further increase your status resistance. Permanently increases both your status resistance and all elemental resistances.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, increases Status Resistance by #s for #time sec. If afflicted by an abnormal status while this skill, Status Resistance will be increased by #x, and can be stacked up to #y times.\n[Passive Effect: Increases Status Resistance by #asrR and all Elemental Resistances by #terR%]

string.name: desc
string.value: With the relic finally made whole, its flow of energy has become more stable and potent, allowing you to enhance #cEnchant Force# skills with the power of the Cardinal Force.\nThe currently-displayed emblem determines the characteristics of #cEnchant Force# skills, and will be reset after an #cEnchant Force# skill is used.\nAfter using a Cardinal Force skill, you can chain #cEnchant Force# skills to use them in quick succession.

string.name: h
string.value: The Relic Gauge is charged by #y when attacking an enemy with a Cardinal Force skill, and by #x per hit from Cardinal Deluge's guided arrows.\nThe Shadow Raven will charge the Relic Gauge by #s for each enemy hit by its attacks. When you use another Cardinal Force skill, all Ancient Force and Enchant Force skills will have their cooldowns reduced by #w sec, except for 5th Job Advancement skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: Overcoming the Ancient Curse allows you to turn its debilitating effects on your foes in battle.\nBow skills and special attacks will inflict the curse on enemies, and the Shadow Raven will focus its attention on enemies with the curse when summoned.

string.name: h
string.value: Using certain skills will inflict enemies with the Ancient Curse debuff, which lasts for #time sec and can be stacked up to #x times.\nSkills that utilize the Ancient Bow deal an increased #y% Critical Damage to enemies for each stack of the curse debuff currently afflicting them.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enhances all Cardinal Force skills with the power of the restored Relic.

string.name: h
string.value:
When using Cardinal Force skills, MP Cost: #mpCon
#cCardinal Deluge#
Fires an arrow that deals #v% damage to up to #u enemies #w times. Fires 1 additional arrow if a boss monster is within range.
#cCardinal Burst#
An exploding arrow deals #y% damage to up to #x enemies #z times. If total enemies struck is lower than the max, an additional 10% is added to the final damage for each enemy below the max.
#cCardinal Torrent#
Consumes 1 Swiftstrike Charge. Deals #u2% damage #v2 times to up to #s2 nearby enemies. You gain 1 Swiftstrike Charge every #w2 sec up to a maximum of 5. You cannot be pushed back while casting, and each enemy hit will receive 1 stack of the Ancient Curse debuff.

string.name: desc
string.value: Manifests the power stored within the relic to hex your arrows with the curse's energy when using the Cardinal Deluge and Cardinal Burst skills. Permanently increases Attack Power.\nRequired Skill: #cCardinal Torrent Lv. 20 or above#

string.name: h
string.value: When using Cardinal Deluge or Cardinal Burst while the relic displays the Torrent emblem, your next #y attacks within the following #u sec have a #prop% chance to apply 1 stack of the Ancient Curse debuff.\nPermanently increases your Attack Power by #padR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Train in the forgotten techniques of the ancient archers to enhance your combat ability.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Cardinal Force]#\nAn archery technique that zeroes in on targets within range. The damage from the guided shots fired with this skill cannot be reflected.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Fires an arrow that deals #damage% damage to up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times. If a boss monster is within the attack's range, fires #z additional arrows.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Cardinal Force]#\nAn archery technique that launches an explosive arrow of condensed energy that flies straight ahead. The arrow will detonate when it hits an enemy or reaches its maximum range.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies: #u, Damage: #v%, Attack Count: #w, when the arrow explodes.\nIf the total number of enemies struck is lower than the maximum, this skill's final damage will increased by an additional #s% for each enemy below the max.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Cardinal Force]#\nAn archery technique used to achieve high mobility. Release Swiftstrike Energy stored in your weapon as a short burst of speed that propels you to your destination, then swing your weapon to attack nearby enemies.\nYou can use the directional keys to move left, right, or up with this skill. If used without directional input, you will swing your weapon at your current location.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Consumes 1 Swiftstrike Charge
Deals #v% damage #w times to up to #u nearby enemies.
1 You gain 1 Swiftstrike Charge every #s2 sec, and can store up to a maximum of #y.
You cannot be pushed back by enemy attacks while casting the skill, and each enemy hit by it will receive 1 stack of the Ancient Curse debuff.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Ancient Force]#\nCall forth spears of dark energy imbued with the power of the Ancient Curse to attacks nearby enemies.\nDeals greater damage to enemies afflicted with the Ancient Curse debuff. This skill can be cast while using other skills.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Enchant Force]#
Attack nearby enemies with your bow, then let loose a magical arrow to attack enemies in a wider range.
#cDeluge Enhancement#
Increases the magical arrow's effective range.
#cBurst Enhancement#
The bow attack will deal a powerful strike to a single enemy.
#cTorrent Enhancement#
The bow attack inflicts additional stacks of the Ancient Curse debuff on enemies.

string.value:

string.value: #c[Enchant Force]#\nManifest arrows like those spoken of in legend to rain destruction upon your foes.\nUse the Up and Down arrow keys to control the firing angle. The arrow will detonate upon contact with the enemy or at the end of its range.

string.name: h
string.value:
Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon per sec. The key can be held down for up to #w2 sec, and intermittently launches arrows at the designated angle. The explosions deal #u2% damage #v2 times to up to #s2 enemies. The first arrow fired with this skill cannot be angled and is fired straight ahead.
While channeling this skill, damage taken from enemy attacks (including attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage) is reduced by #indieDamReduceR% 
#cThis skill will end early if the Relic gauge doesn't have enough points.# 
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Enchant Force]#\nManifest arrows like those spoken of in legend to rain destruction upon your foes.\nUse the directional keys to move forward and backward while channeling this skill.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon per sec. The key can be held down for up to #u sec, continuously attacking up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount times. \n#cThis skill will end early if the Relic gauge doesn't have enough points.# \nCooldown: #cooltime sec

#cLevel 10 required to learn Advanced Homing Beacon.#
Right-click to toggle the Homing Beacon smoke effect ON/OFF.

Can multi-target with a Homing Beacon on Tank Mech, but final damage is decreased when multi-targeting.

Required Skill: #cHumanoid Mech Level 10#
