string.name: desc
string.value: Swings your energy sword at enemies in the direction you're facing to dispel some buffs, bind them, and stun them. Bound enemies cannot have buff effects applied for the duration of the stun.\nDebuffs: Attack Power/Magic ATT Increase, DEF Increase, Obsidian Skin.\nEnemies hit by this will resist stuns for 90 seconds and won't be stunned by other skills, like Entangling Lash.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Chance to Debuff: #prop%, Bind Duration: #time sec.\nBind Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Entangling Lash.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Activates the Amaranth Generator, which supplies you with infinite power for a short time.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Gauge Charge: Max, Charge duration: #time sec\n\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires a powerful orbital laser cannon that can incinerate anything on the ground. Damage increases over time.

string.name: desc
string.value: When attacked by an enemy, generates a protective shield proportional to the damage taken. The total of the shield and current HP can't exceed the max HP or the shield will disappear. While using Blaster skills, you cannot be knocked back.

string.name: h
string.value: When hit, converts #x% of your damage taken into a protective shield. #y% + #z of the shield dissipates every 5 second. The maximum strength of the shield is equal to your Max HP.\nKnockback Resistance increases by 100% while using Blaster skills.\nPermanently increases Knockback Resistance by #stanceProp%, DEF by #pddX, and Max HP by #mhpR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Study the Arm Cannon to learn the basics of Revolving Cannon. Any enemies attacked directly by an overheated Arm Cannon will receive additional damage due to the excess heat, and the additional damage increases depending on your number of charged Dynamo Gauge stock.\n#cAffected skills: Magnum Punch, Double Blast, Hammer Smash, Shotgun Punch, Ballistic Hurricane, Muzzle Flash, Hyper Magnum Punch#\n#cLv. 5 required to learn the 2nd Job skill 'Revolving Cannon Upgrade'.#

string.name: h
string.value: #c[Final Attack Type Skill]# When the Dynamo Gauge has at least 1 stock, direct attacks from the Arm Cannon will trigger additional attacks which deal #damage% #attackCount times. For each charged Dynamo Gauge stock, the damage of the additional hits increase by #x%.\nPermanently increases Movement Speed by #psdSpeed, Jump Power by #psdJump, and Max Movement Speed by #speedMax.

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleashes a powerful straight punch in front of you with the explosive power of the Arm Cannon. You can use Revolving Cannon while using this skill. You can also link this skill to Double Blast and Bullet Blast.\n#cLevel 20 required to learn Bobbing.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.\nUsing Revolving Cannon while using Magnum Punch will additionally attack the same number of enemies for #y% damage #x times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use your Arm Cannon to create additional explosions and deal damage. This cannot be used as a standalone skill. It can only be used during certain attacks. Holding the key down to charge will manually reload your Ammo. You can charge while using other skills, and can charge up to 2 skills simultaneously.\n#cSkills usable during Revolving Cannon: Magnum Punch, Double Blast, Revolving Blast#

string.name: h
string.value: Uses 1 Ammo, and your Ammo is reloaded if used as a key-down skill

string.name: desc
string.value:
Depletes the Dynamo Gauge to release massive explosions and shockwaves. Ignores Defense Rate of enemies' in melee range.
The Dynamo Gauge charges when using Revolving Cannon during certain offensive skills. Additional shockwaves are released based on Dynamo Gauge bars used, dealing extra damage based on proximity. Immune to damage from attack reflection.
Required skill: #cRevolving Cannon Mastery Lv.5#
#cLv. 10 required to learn 'Revolving Blast'.#

string.name: h
string.value: Requires #x or more Dynamo Gauge bars. Attack up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount times. Melee hits ignore #ignoreMobpdpR% of enemy Defense Rate.\nReleases Shockwave 1, attacking up to #q enemies for #w% damage #w2 times.\n#cAfter use, you will Overheat for #time sec. While Overheated, the Dynamo Gauge is set to max, and you cannot charge the Dynamo Gauge or use Bunker Buster Explosion.# On ending, depletes the Dynamo Gauge.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fire your cannon to thrust in the direction opposite the way you are facing. The recoil that thrusts you will also damage nearby enemies. Using the skill while holding the up arrow key will cause an explosion on the ground that propels you upward. Attacking an enemy with attack reflection will not damage you, and the skill cannot be used while reloading.

string.name: h
string.value: Ammo Cost: 1, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Arm Cannon Mastery, Critical Rate, and Attack Power.\n#cLv. 10 required to learn 'Gauntlet Expert'.#

string.name: h
string.value: Mastery +#mastery%, Critical Rate +#cr%, and Attack Power +#padX

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases STR and DEX through sheer physical training.

string.name: h
string.value: Permanently increase STR by #strX and DEX by #dexX.

string.name: desc
string.value: Maintain control over your power to improve charge skills. Additionally, permanently increases Damage.\n#cLv. 14 required to learn 'Advanced Charge Mastery'.#

string.name: h
string.value: Decreases the charge time for all charge skills by #x%. Using a charge skill reloads #w Ammo immediately but will not reload while in midair or interrupt an auto-reload.\nAt the start of charged Bobbing, Weaving, or Hammer Smash, all damage taken is briefly reduced by #y%, including attacks that deal damage based on your Max HP.\nPermanently increases damage by #damR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Improves the potential for the Revolving Cannon embedded within your Arm Cannon.\nRequired skill: #cRevolving Cannon Mastery Lv. 5#\n#cLv. 20 required to learn 'Revolving Cannon Plus II'.#

string.name: h
string.value:
Bunker Buster Explosion damage +#w% points, Shockwave 1 damage +#w2% points
Additional attack damage due to overheating +#s% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Magnum Punch +#s2% points
Maximum Dynamo Gauge capacity expanded to 4 bars, maximum number of Ammo increased to 4.
Using Bunker Buster Explosion while the Dynamo Gauge is at 4 bars or higher increases damage by 40% points and will generate Shockwave 2, which attacks up to #dot enemies for #q% damage #q2 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Performs a powerful 2-hit combo in the direction you're facing using the momentum from your Arm Cannon. After you learn this skill, you can also activate it by repeatedly pressing the Magnum Punch button. You can use Revolving Cannon while using this skill. Can be linked to Bobbing, Weaving, Hammer Smash, Shotgun Punch, or Bullet Blast.

string.name: h

string.name: desc
string.value:
Moves forward while avoiding enemy attacks. Increases Avoidability during this skill, and you can stop it immediately by jumping. Can be linked to Magnum Punch, Rocket Rush, or Bullet Blast.
If activated after a charge, #cany skill that was already activated will be canceled and Bobbing will be activated. #You can charge a skill while using a different skill, and up to 2 skills can be charged simultaneously.
Also permanently increases Magnum Punch damage.
Required skill:#cMagnum Punch Lv. 20#
#cLevel 15 required to learn Weaving.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Deliver a powerful punch to the enemy you were holding with Rocket Rush. The enemy will be launched a certain distance and explode, damaging any other enemies it hits on the way. Can only use during Rocket Rush, and using Rocket Rush again will activate this skill.\nRequired skill : #cRocket Rush Lv. 1#

string.name: h
string.value:
Bunker Buster Explosion damage +#w% points, Shockwave 1 damage +#w2% points, and Shockwave 2 damage +#u% points
Additional attack damage due to overheating +#s% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Magnum Punch +#s2% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Double Blast +#v% points
Maximum Dynamo Gauge capacity expanded to 5 slots, maximum number of Bullets increased to 5.
Using Bunker Buster Explosion while the Dynamo Gauge is at 5 slots or higher increases its damage by 80% points and will generate Shockwave 3, which attacks up to #dot enemies for #q% damage #q2 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fortify your Blast Shield with some training. \nRequired Skill: #cBlast Shield Lv. 10#

string.name: desc
string.value: Research the most efficient movement and attack patterns for battle. Using linked skills or charge skills will increase your abilities. Additionally, Attack Power is permanently increased.\n#cLv. 9 required to learn 'Combo Training II'.#

string.name: h
string.value: Can be stacked up to #x times. Duration: #time sec. Final Damage increased by #y% per stack, Attack Speed increased by 1 for every #w stacks, Skill Link Speed increased by 1 for every #z stacks.\nPermanently increases Attack Power by #padR%

string.name: desc
string.value:
Strikes the ground to knock nearby enemies into the air. Affected enemies receive a debuff increasing the final damage taken from Blaster's attack for a short time.
Can be linked to Magnum Punch or Bullet Blast.
Charge the skill by holding down the key. #cWhile charging, attacks won't knock you back. Releasing the charge will cancel any active skills, and will create an extra shockwave that deals additional attacks.#
You can charge skills even while other skills are in use, and up to 2 skills may be charged at once.
You will not take damage from shockwaves that strike enemies with attack reflection.
Permanently increases Double Blast damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Number of Enemies: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%. Attacks #attackCount times. Applies Debuff on Hit: for #y seconds, Final Damage taken from Blaster's attack +#x%.\nWhen releasing charge, creates a shockwave that lasts for #q sec and hits up to #s enemies for #q2% damage #s2 times. Enemies struck by the shockwave will be afflicted by the Final Damage debuff.\nDouble Blast Damage +#damPlus% points.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Moves backward while avoiding enemy attacks. Increases Avoidability during this skill, and you can stop immediately by jumping. Can be linked to Rocket Rush, Muzzle Flash, or Bullet Blast.

#cLevel 15 required to learn Muzzle Flash.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Grabs onto nearby enemies and drag them in the direction you're facing. Any enemy in your path will be bulldozed along, and you can use Magnum Launch during this skill. This skill will not be activated if there are no enemies nearby to grab. Can be resisted by some monsters.\nRequired Skill: #cWeaving Lv. 1#

string.name: h

string.value: Instantly approaches a nearby enemy while Weaving to perform an attack. Can only be used during Weaving, and can be activated by Weaving again. It will not be activated if there is no enemy within range. Can be linked to Magnum Punch and Bullet Blast, and permanently increases Magnum Punch damage.\nRequired skill: #cWeaving Lv. 15#

Using Bunker Buster Explosion while the Dynamo Gauge is at 6 slots or higher increases its damage by 150% points and will generate Shockwave 4, which attacks up to #dot enemies for #q% damage #q2 times.

The maximum potential for the shield is equal to your Max HP.\nPermanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance by #asrR% and Elemental Resistance by #terR%.\nRocket Rush damage +#damPlus% points.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the Mastery, Critical Damage, and Boss Damage of the Arm Cannon.

string.name: desc
string.value: Maintain control over your power to optimize charge skills. Overwrites the buffs from Charge Mastery. Additionally, permanently ignores a portion of enemies' Defense Rate when attacking, and decreases damage taken.\nRequired skill: #cCharge Mastery# Lv. 14

string.name: h
string.value: Decreases the charge time for all charge skills by #x%. Using a charge skill reloads #w Ammo immediately but will not reload while in midair or interrupt an auto-reload.\nImmediately after using charged Bobbing, Weaving, or Hammer Smash, all damage taken is briefly reduced by #y%, including attacks that deal damage based on your Max HP.\nPermanently ignore #ignoreMobpdpR% of enemies' Defense, and damage taken is reduced by #damAbsorbShieldR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Research the most efficient movement and attack patterns for battle. Using linked skills or charge skills will increase your abilities. This overwritesyour enhancements from Combo Training. Attack Power is further increased.\nRequired skill: #cCombo Training Lv. 9'.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the damage of Magnum Punch, Double Blast, Hammer Smash, Shotgun Punch, Muzzle Flash, and Ballistic Hurricane. Does not increase damage of shockwaves.

string.name: desc

string.value: Reduces the cooldown of Ballistic Hurricane.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires a Screw Blow accompanied by a shockwave. For a short time after, a spiraling shockwave will remain in that spot, dealing additional damage. Can be linked with Bobbing, Weaving, and Bullet Blast. Also permanently increases Double Blast damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP cost: #mpCon, Max Number of Enemies: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Generates a shockwave that attacks up to #z enemies for #s% damage #u times\nIncreases Double Blast damage by #damPlus% points.

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleashes all of your fighting prowess into a seamless cyclone of punches. Your rapid onslaught of punches creates a hurricane and pulls in nearby enemies. Can be resisted by some monsters. You can continue to move and attack while the skill is active. Also permanently increases Hammer Smash damage.\nRequired skill: #cWeaving Lv. 15#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP #Cost: mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Duration: #time sec. After the skill, delivers a jumping uppercut that hits up to #z enemies for #s% damage #u times and sends them flying.
You can #cmove around# using the #carrow keys# while holding the skill key down.
If the attack succeeds, combo training remains at max level.
Hammer Smash Damage +#damPlus% points
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Reloads Ammo. Rush, grab and stun an enemy you're facing. Prioritizes highest Max HP target in range. Revolving Cannon is usable while holding enemy. Use Revolving Cannon on the enemy 6 times and perform this skill again to unleash a Bunker Buster for extra damage. Activates even when grabbing an enemy that can't be stunned. Invincible while holding the enemy. Bonus Bunker Buster attack ignores additional Defense Rate. Will not activate if no enemies are nearby. \nAffected enemy is immune to Stun for 90 seconds.\nRequired skill: #cBunker Buster Explosion Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Rushes and grabs enemies for #damage% damage. Stuns. Hits #attackCount times. Activate Revolving Cannon to attack up to #s more enemies up to 6 times. Each attack hits #s2 time(s) for #x%, #y%, #t%, #w2%, #q%, or #q2% damage.\nBonus Bunker Buster deals #z% damage #v times and ignores additional #ignoreMobpdpR% Defense Rate.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Converts an active Blast Shield to HP. You can't use this if no Blast Shield is active or if your HP is full. There is a brief moment after using this skill where damage from attacks, including attacks that deal a percentage of your HP, is reduced. The damage reduction is determined by the damage reduction of Charge Mastery. This buff is not affected by buff duration extension effects. Additionally, permanently increases Magnum Launch damage.\nRequired skill : #cShield Training II Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, recovers HP equal to the sum of the dissipated Blast Shield and #x% of your Max HP. The extended defense period lasts for #time sec.\nMagnum Launch damage increased by #damPlus% points.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases the stats of all party members. Does not stack with Maple Warrior, Call of Cygnus, Nova Warrior, Hero of the Flora, President's Orders, Anima Warrior, or Rhinne's Protection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hones your resolve to ignore certain abnormal status effects. Immune to Abnormal Status for 3 sec after use.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Rush forward with a powerful punch to cause a colossal explosion. 
Hold down the skill key to charge. Generates additional shockwaves based on charge time, dealing more damage to nearby enemies. While charging, you have improved defense, increased Abnormal Status resistance, and can't be pushed back by attacks. 
Final damage increases based on how often you're attacked while charging. 
Hyper Magnum Punch's charge time is unaffected by Charge Mastery's charge time reduction effect. If no enemy is in range after the initial rush, neither the attack nor the shockwave will occur. 
Shotgun Punch deals +30% damage to normal monsters once Hyper Magnum Punch is obtained.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Attacks up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% #attackCount times.
Generates a shockwave that attacks for #v% damage #v2 times.
Can be enhanced up to #z levels by charging, and each level of enhancement generates an additional shockwave that deals #q%, #q2%, #s2% damage #dot times.
While charging, the defense boosts from Charge Mastery are applied, and Abnormal Status Resistance increases by 100.
Each time you get hit while charging, the final damage increases by #x%, up to #y%.
Can be charged for up to #subTime sec.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.value: Activates and amplifies the power in magic wings to max out Magic Conversion.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpRCon% of Max MP, Duration: #time sec, Damage increases up to #y% depending on current MP proportions, Damage increase reset when Spell Storm occurs.\nWhen using attack skill, activates a Spell Storm. Spell Storm MP Cost: additional #w per #x sec, Spell Storm Max Enemies Hit: #z, Spell Storm Damage: #q%, Spell Storm Number of Attacks: #s\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: The collapsing space between the Mirror World and reality become linked with Will's Erda, causing the spider within the mirror to temporarily materialize in reality.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP
#cSpatial Collapse# - Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Once complete, summons True Arachnid Reflection.
#cTrue Arachnid Reflection# - Duration: #s sec, Goes into attack mode at set intervals. During attack mode, uses spider legs #w times to deal #x% damage #y times. If the spider legs attack one target #z consecutive times, attack mode will end immediately. #q sec cooldown after attack mode ends.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: The collapsing space between the Mirror World and reality become linked with Will's Erda, causing the spider within the mirror to temporarily materialize in reality.

string.name: desc
string.value: The collapsing space between the Mirror World and reality become linked with Will's Erda, causing the spider within the mirror to temporarily materialize in reality.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Maple World Goddess's Blessing increases all stats and damage. Can only be used when you have 1 of the following skills applied: Maple Warrior, Call of Cygnus, Nova Warrior, Hero of the Flora, President's Orders, Anima Warrior, Sengoku Warrior, Maple Guardian, or Rhinne's Protection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Increases stat bonuses for class-wide buff skills like Maple Warrior by #x% for #time sec, Damage: +#indieDamR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: The blessing of Cygnus increases damage and restores HP over time. This skill can be enhanced after Lv. 245.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Damage +#q%
Periodically restores #y% HP and increases your damage by #damage%.
This damage bonus is additive and maxes out at #w%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cygnus's transcendent blessing increases damage and restores HP over time.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Damage +#q%, Damage Taken: -#z% (Includes damage proportional to Max HP).
Periodically restores #y% HP and increases your damage by #damage%.
This damage bonus is additive, and maxes out at #w%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: The prayers of Rhinne, the Transcendent of Time, increase final damage.

string.name: h
string.value:
Time Force Cost: #forceCon, resets cooldowns for all skills.
Duration: #time sec. When Doubletime stacks your next single attack gains Final Damage: +#x%, Attack Power: +#indiePad.
This Final Damage bonus does not apply to Throwing Weapons, Blade Tempest, blades produced by skills, Shock Waves, Shock Fields, or Assist Skills, and ends when Transcendent Rhinne's Prayer ends.
Doubletime and Immune Barrier last for their maximum duration.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of Grandis has a different appearance for each of her child races, and she grants a different blessing to each race.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec
#cNova#: Skills have a #x% chance to not have cooldown, up to #y times
Damage: +#v%, Knockback Resistance: +#u%
Kaiser receives additional #q% damage increase for each Morph Gauge Stage.
#cFlora#: Excluding your weapon, #w% of your equipment's Attack Power/Magic ATT, whichever you do not use, is converted to the one you use. This does not apply to set effects. Converted bonus cannot exceed #z% of your weapon's base Attack Power/Magic ATT, whichever one you use.
Attack Power and Magic ATT: +#s
#cAnima#: Talisman and Scroll Energy Charge: +#v2%
Damage: +#q2%, Knockback Resistance: +#w2%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of Grandis grants a blessing appropriate to the Nova.

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of Grandis grants a blessing appropriate to the Flora.

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of Grandis grants a blessing appropriate to the Anima.

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of the otherworld does whatever she wants and periodically gives a blessing of a different type.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP, increases Final Damage by #indiePMdR% for #time sec. Periodically casts various blessings or attacks. Previous blessings disappear when a new blessing is cast.
#cBlessing of Recovery# : Restores #y% of the your character's max DF/PP/HP. Heals through status effects that prevent health recovery.
#cAegis Blessing#: Damage Taken: -#z% (Triggers once, includes damage proportional to Max HP.)
#cBlessing of Fortitude#: Ignores one debilitating status effect.
#cOtherwordly Void#: Max Enemies Hit: #u, Damage: #v%, Number of Attacks: #s
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of the otherworld grants you an Blessing of Recovery.

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of the otherworld grants you an Aegis Blessing.

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of the otherworld grants you a Blessing of Fortitude.

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of the otherworld casts an Otherworldly Void.

string.name: desc
string.value: Your Final Damage has been enhanced through the manipulation of time itself.

string.name: desc
string.value: The blessing of Princess Sakuno will protect you from abnormal status effects and increase your final damage.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Final Damage Increase: #q% 
Periodical Bonus Final Damage Increase: #damage% 
Princess Sakuno's Blessing will increase final damage by up to #w2%. 
While the skill is active, 1 debilitating abnormal status attack will be ignored. 
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Swing your Polearm and call forth a mythical wolf to deliver a devastating blow. After using Beyond Blade 3rd Hit, you will not be pushed back by any enemy attacks when using Beyond Blade.\nAlchemic Adrenaline Boost Additional Effect: Creates an iceberg in front of you\nRequired Skill: Beyond Blade Lv. 30+#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount
For each enemy struck fewer than Max Enemies Hit, #s% of the damage that would be dealt is doubled and inflicted as bonus damage.
Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Creates an iceberg that hits up to #z enemies for #w% damage #y time(s) if Adrenaline Rush is active.
#cUsed after Beyond Blade 3rd Hit.

string.name: desc
string.value: Infuses your weapon with a portion of your health, granting it a visible aura and temporarily empowering it. The aura wave is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpRCon%, Ignores #indieIgnoreMobpdpR% Enemy DEF for #time sec, Final Damage: +#indiePMdR%.\n#cAura Wave (Usable Every #q sec) -# Using certain offensive skills will generate waves, inflicting #x% damage on up to #mobCount enemies #w times.\nCooldown: #cooltime Sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Conjures a burning soul blade to fight at your side. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cRaging Blow Lv. 30 or higher#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Summon Duration: #time sec. Press the skill key again to have the blade stay put (it will respawn if you stray too far). While near the blade, Raging Blow is boosted.
When you use an offensive skill, attacks up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times every #w sec with #cr% bonus Critical Rate.
#cNormal# - Damage: #damage% (While#c enraged#: #z%) 
#cStationary# - Damage: #s2% (While#c enraged#: #w2%)
Cooldown: #x sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Conjures a burning soul blade to fight at your side. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cRaging Blow Lv. 30 or higher#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Summon Duration: #time sec. Press the skill key again to have the blade stay put (it will respawn if you stray too far). Boosts Raging Blow while near the blade.
When you use an offensive skill, attacks up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times every #w sec with #cr% bonus Critical Rate.
#cNormal# - Damage: #s% (While#c enraged#: #w2%) 
#cStationary# - Damage: #damage% (While#c enraged#: #z%)
Cooldown: #x sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants an echo of your battle prowess to a party member. It cannot be used on a party member who is already echoing the skills of another Paladin.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, targets a party member in range. The affected party member will duplicate any attack skills you use as well as certain buffs. Only the self-buff will persist if the target moves out of range. If the party member is not inside the echoing range, then you enhance yourself. If the party member is inside the echoing range when you're enhanced, they automatically mimic you, and when the link is disconnected the party member's buff is also removed.
#cEchoing Party Member# - Upon using an offensive skill, affected party member mimics you for #x% of Final Damage, Buff Duration: #y% + 1% for every #w Strength (up to 100%), Your Final Damage: +#u%
#cSelf Buff# - Final Damage: +#z%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hurls a spear of utter darkness at the enemy. Direct the spear with the up and down arrow keys. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, summoned spear deals #damage% damage #attackCount times on up to #mobCount enemies.\nAdditional Critical Rate: +#cr%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Simultaneously unleashes the power of the sun and moon.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, creates an afterimage when you use an offensive skill. Afterimage Damage: #x% of Final Damage 
Upon using an offensive skill, the sun and moon inflict an additional attack every #s2 sec on up to #mobCount enemies with bonus #cr% Critical Rate. 
#cRising Sun# - Damage: #damage%, Attacks: #attackCount 
#cFalling Moon# - Damage: #q%, Attacks: #u
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Awakens your true power. Cannot be cast while on a rope or ladder. The Cerberus portion is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
Fury Cost: #forceCon, Duration: #time sec, Critical Rate: +#indieCr%
Automatically triggers Cerberus every #x sec when you use an offensive skill, enhances Demon Lash and allows you to use Chaos Lock while Demon Lash #cis active# 
Enhanced Demon Lash - hits up to #z enemies #y times, Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%, Boss Damage: +#bdR%, 1st/2nd Hit Damage: #w%, 3rd Hit Damage: #q%, 4th Hit Damage: #q2%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Sacrifice your body to the flame to fuel your vengeance. Your demonic blood is unaffected by attack ignore and attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP, consumes #y HP per sec, Healing Restriction: Items and skills can only heal #w% of Max HP, Hit damage -#s% (including the damage proportional to Max HP)
Final Damage: +#x% per #u% HP consumed. Your demonic blood spills periodically to coat the ground for #s2 sec and deal #damage% damage on up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times
When your HP falls below #q2%, the HP loss and demonic blood will cease.
Skill is deactivated on reuse
Cooldown: #z sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Become the shield that protects party members from enemy attacks.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Damage Reduction (to you and party member inside shield): #x% (including Percentage HP attacks).
Cannot use movement skills while utilizing shield.
The shield has 3 layers, each of which can defend against #y, #w, and #z attacks, respectively.
When the shield is gone, your Final Damage: +#w2% + 1% per defense count for #q2 sec. 
Press the skill key again to manually remove the shield.
Cooldown: #cooltime Sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the Kaisers of old to fight by your side. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, summons 3 kaisers with limited movement range. After kaisers are summoned, use the skill again to bring them to your location. Can be used once every #z seconds.
Kaiser VI: attacks up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount times
Kaiser XV: attacks up to #z enemies for #x% damage #y times
Kaiser XXVII: attacks up to #q enemies for #w% damage #q2 times
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the Kaisers of old to fight by your side. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the Kaisers of old to fight by your side. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Freeze time, breaking through its limits! Binds enemies for 90 seconds. During that time, bound enemies are immune to Limit Break and other bind skills. The damage dealt at the end of the skill is unaffected by invincibility, attack ignore, and attack reflection, but cannot be fatal.

string.name: h
string.value:
Time Force Cost: #forceCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Bind Duration: #w sec
Bind Duration: Increases up to 100%, based on initial damage done
For #time sec - Skill Cooldowns: -#q% (Excludes skills not affected by cooldown reduction), Attack Speed: +2, Final Damage: +#indiePMdR%, slows nearby enemies.
If any enemies still live when the skill ends, #q2% of your damage from the skill will be inflicted upon them 15 times.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Maha's power flows into you, granting you enormous strength.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, instantly increases combo to #z, Maha empowers you for #time sec, Attack Power: +#indiePadR% \nBlizzard Damage: #damage% every #x sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Load up your Arm Cannon with armor-piercing ammo and deliver an earth-shattering punch. Rocket Punch is not affected by Revolving Cannon's Boost Node.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Using your arm cannon while active triggers Revolving Cannon Boost, which uses special ammunition.\nMax Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Enemy DEF Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants an echo of your battle prowess to a party member. It cannot be used on a party member who is already echoing the skills of another Paladin.

string.name: desc
string.value: Simultaneously unleashes the power of the sun and moon.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, creates an afterimage when you use an offensive skill, Afterimage Damage: #x% of Final Damage\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Simultaneously unleashes the power of the sun and moon.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, creates an afterimage when you use an offensive skill, Afterimage Damage: #x% of Final Damage\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Imbued with the power of the morning moon, quickly charges toward and slash various enemies. Can attack a group of enemies repeatedly and recover Hayato's sword energy after use. Battoujutsu Zankou is not affected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Rush Attacks: #attackCount, Enemies Hit: #mobCount. Able to do 2 or more rush attacks on the same enemy.\nHayato's sword energy recovers by #x upon use. Invincible during casting.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleashes a brutal slash that decimates all in sight.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Combo Orbs Used: #y, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Invulnerable while casting\nOn hit, increases Final Damage for #time sec by the Final Damage bonus of the Combo Orbs consumed for this skill.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Throws a rapid barrage of punches out in front of you. Grants Enhanced Guard. Prevents Knockback, and increases Final Damage proportionally with number of hits.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #w%, Number of Attacks: #z. Deals #damage% damage #attackCount times consecutively for up to #time sec while the key is held.
Grants the Enhanced Guard effects of Charge Mastery and Combo Training with max stacks.
Final damage increases by #x% every hit up to #y%.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Delivers a series of unbelievably swift strikes. Successful strikes grant a buff that stacks up to 5 times. #cUsable during Sanrenzan, Blade Flash, and Shinsoku.

string.name: h
string.value:
Sword Energy Cost: 200, Successful hits grant a buff giving +#w% Final Damage per stack for #time sec.
1st Hit: Deals #x% damage to up to 15 enemies 8 times
2nd Hit: Deals #y% damage to up to 15 enemies 8 times
3rd Hit: Deals #z% damage to up to 15 enemies 8 times
4th Hit: Deals #q% damage to up to 15 enemies 8 times
5th Hit: Deals #q2% damage to up to 15 enemies 8 times

string.name: desc
string.value:
Swings Maha around in a circle, leaving a trail of destruction in its wake. Afterimage from Swing Studies is only activated once.
[Command: #cDown, Down + Attack Key#]
Command Effect: Prevents Knockback. Unaffected by attack reduction and attack reflection.

#cRight-click to lock command.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Chase Cut Activation Count: #w, Boss Damage: +#bdR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec, reduced by #x% when Maha's Fury is activated.

string.name: desc
string.value: Focuses the power of your Soul Shield into the form of the legendary Sword of Light to strike down your foes. Attacking an enemy during cooldown still produces a Sword of Light and inflicts damage, and this attack is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Damage increases according to the #cnumber of Royal Guard's Attack Power buff's stack.#
Royal Guard's Attack Power buff duration increases #q sec after use. However, it cannot exceed the max value.
[0, 1 Stack] - Damage: #x%, [2 Stacks] - Damage: #y%, [3 Stacks] - Damage: #z%
[4 Stacks] - Damage: #w%, [5 Stacks] - Damage: #v%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec
When you attack during a cooldown: [1] attack activated per #s sec. This attack is activated #q2 sec after using the skill and does not increase the Buff Duration of Royal Guard.
100% chance to Blind enemies for #time sec, reducing their Accuracy by 30%, Duration halved against bosses

string.name: desc
string.value: Sacrifice your own health to release an explosion of demonic energy. #cCan be used while the skill is active#. Charge the ability by holding down its key. Damage increases according to charge time. If you defeat an enemy or strike a boss with this ability, you will recover HP, even under Demonic Frenzy's recovery reduction or certain statuses that prevent you from recovering health.

string.name: h
string.value:
Consumes #hpRCon% of Max HP to attack up to #q enemies. Consumes an additional #x% of current HP per second while charging, Max Charging Time: #subTime sec. Damage -#w% only for attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio of the Max HP while attacking.
#cLv. 1 (No Charge)#: Deals #damage% damage #q2 times, restores #u% of Max HP
#cLv. 2 (#y sec Charge):# Deals #v% damage #s times, restores #v2% of Max HP
#cLv. 3 (#z sec Charge from Lv. 2)#: Deals #s2% damage #u2 times, restores #dot% of Max HP, Critical Rate +#cr%, Ignore Def +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Alpha and Beta attack together to demolish the enemy. Hold the skill key to perform a series of linked attacks. Immediately performs a final #cJoint Attack# when Alpha and Beta's skills end, or when the skill key is released.

string.name: h
string.value:
Time Force Cost: #forceCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Invulnerable while casting skill
#c[Beta Link]# 1st Hit: Deals #q% damage #q2 times, 2nd Hit: Deals #v% damage #v2 times, 3rd Hit: Deals #w% damage #w2 times
#c[Alpha Link]# 1st Hit: Deals #x% damage #y times, 2nd Hit: Deals #z% damage #dotInterval times, 3rd Hit: Deals #u% damage #u2 times
#c[Joint Attack]#: Triggers an explosion #dot time(s), which deals #s% damage #s2 times, Ignores an additional #ignoreMobpdpR% Monster DEF
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a whirling bulwark of righteous hammers to strike down nearby enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
#c[Passive Effects]# Creates 1 spiraling hammer around you whenever you generate an Elemental Charge. Up to #x can be active at once, and their duration is shared with Elemental Charge.
Hammers automatically attack up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times dealing #damage% damage. Attack speed increases with the number of hammers.
#c[Active Effects]# MP Cost: #mpCon, Augments Hammers of the Righteous for #v sec. #cAugmented Hammers# - Max Enemies Hit: #s, Number of Hits: #z, Damage:#q% damage.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a whirling bulwark of righteous hammers to strike down nearby enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Evil Eye reveals itself and blasts nearby enemies. Only usable while Evil Eye of Domination is active. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Evil Eye appears in front of you, attacking up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times, dealing #damage% damage for #x sec.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates a rift between the world of the living and the Underworld when used with Styx Crossing. Attacks against afflicted enemies are unaffected by attack reduction or attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, disables Styx Crossing's cooldown for #time sec and sets skill to max charge, but reduces Final Damage by 50%. Resets Styx Crossing's cooldown upon use.\nAttacking with Styx Crossing creates a rift to the underworld for #y sec. Continually attacking the area around the rift with Styx Crossing causes the rift to grow, and eventually shatter, dealing #damage% damage to up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times. No more than 2 rifts can be open at once. After a rift shatters, you cannot create another for #z sec.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Sacrifice all your Fury to conjure a malevolent serpent of pure rage. Attacks again before vanishing. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
Consumes #forceCon Fury and #hpRCon% of Max HP
Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
#c[On Disappearance]# Max Enemies Hit: #z, Damage: #selfDestruction%, Number of Attacks: #w
All hits receive Critical Rate: +#cr%and additional Ignore Def: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Your Tempest Blades rain down upon the enemy, oozing deadly magma where they land to incinerate enemies. You can use the skill once more after all your Tempest Blades land to force deadly magma to ooze. If the magma hits enemies, it immediately resets Draco Surge's cooldown and allows you to use Draco Surge consecutively a certain number of times. This enhancement lasts during the cooldown of Bladefall. Only usable with Tempest Blades summoned. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Each blade strikes for #damage% damage #attackCount times and creates a pool of magma where it lands after #u sec.
The magma hits up to #y enemies, dealing #w% damage #z times, and increases up to #q% in proportion to the time the blade remained in the ground after landing.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec
Final Form: Tempest Blades and magma's attack counts increase by 1.

string.name: desc
string.value: Makes your flesh as strong as steel so you're not pushed back by enemy attacks.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP, Duration: #time sec, Knockdown Immunity and Status Resistance: +#indieAsrR
Damage increases +#x% when hit, Max Stack: #y times
Cooldown: #cooltime sec
[Passive Effects - STR: +#strX, Max HP: +#mhpX]

string.name: desc
string.value: Swings a spear so fast it creates a dark storm and devastate the area in front of you. The final attack is unaffected by attack ignore and attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Deals #damage% damage #attackCount times consecutively on up to #mobCount enemies for up to #dot sec. Recover #w% of max HP for every attack that lands.
When key is released, deals #q final attack(s) with #s% damage to a max of #y enemies. Recover #w2% of max HP for every final attack that lands.
All Piercing Cyclone hits receive Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%, and Additional Monster Def Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: A glorious cross-section of light blazes, symbolizing noble sacrifice. You can continuously attack while moving at a slow pace, and can gain more strength the longer the sacrifice continues. You will not be pushed back by any enemy attacks while casting, and the Stun Abnormal Status will be ignored.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpCon. After that, consumes #t% of max HP per sec. Deals #damage% damage #attackCount times consecutively on up to #mobCount enemies during key-down.
#cThe cross gets bigger after some time passes#, which will increase attack speed and deal #s% damage.
Max Key-down Time: #time sec, Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Damage Reduction During Key-down: #x% (including Percentage HP attacks)
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Tap into your subconscious abilities and use your power to its fullest potential. Increases the ability gained from the Combo Orb and allows you to leave a tear in space when #cRaging Blow is used#. The tear in space is unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cRaging Blow Lv. 30+#

string.name: h
string.value:
Can be used if you have at least 1 Combo Orb. MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec
The Combo Orb increases Final Damage, damage to bosses, and Attack Power by #t%.
Decreases the chance of charging Combo Orbs by #x%
#cTear in Space#: Periodically activates a rift #s time(s). Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Cannot charge the Combo Orb with the Tear in Space.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Sacrifice all your Fury to summon malevolent twin gods of pure rage. The twin gods' attacks are unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
Consumes #forceCon Fury and #hpRCon% of Max HP.
Summon Duration: #time sec
#cNemea#: Attacks every #x sec, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Max Hits: #attackCount
#cGeryon#: Attacks every #z sec, Damage: #w%, Max Enemies Hit: #q, Hits: #y
All Orthrus hits receive Additional Critical Rate: +#cr% and Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enhance Gigas Wave with the strength of an ancient dragon. The Dragon Warrant launches forward to deal additional attacks to the enemy. Requires recharging time after skill is used.
All enemies, including bosses, will be Slowed when hit by Draco Surge. The Dragon Warrant is unaffected by attack reflection.
#cDragon Link: During Attack + Gigas Wave#
Required Skill: #cGigas Wave Lv. 30+#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. After that, launches the Dragon Warrant, Damage: #z%, Number of Attacks: #y, Max Enemies Hit: #u. Additional Critical rate: +#cr%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Final Form: Increases Draco Wave's attack count by #w
#cActivates upon using Gigas Wave#
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Draw on your soul power and imbue your sword with a radiant light. You can use #cRadiant Soul Slash with the attack key# while equipping Radiant Soul.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon
Equip the Radiant Soul for #time sec for an increase on the following: Attack: +#indiePadR%, Critical Rate: +#indieCr%, Ignore Defense: +#indieIgnoreMobpdpR%. Royal Guard defense possible for an additional #t sec.
#cRadiant Soul Slash#: MP Cost: #x, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Focuses your wisdom and the strength of your soul to call forth a stunning eclipse. When the sun and the moon are completely overlapped, #cuse the skill one more time# to use Equinox Divide. The eclipse is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, creates an eclipse, attacking up to#mobCount enemies #attackCount time(s), dealing #damage% damage #time times consecutively. Invincible during casting.\n#cEquinox Divide#: The eclipse dissipates, triggering explosions #s2 time(s) at a certain interval. Max Enemies Hit: #s, Damage: #y%, Number of Attacks: #dot. Invincible while casting.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Cuts through the sun and the moon with the power of soul.

string.name: desc
string.value: Amplify the Desperado's power and call forth a brilliant sword of destruction. When the sword spins, the attack deals damage to enemies even when they are under attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpRCon%, summons a magic sword for #time sec every #x sec. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
The skill duration becomes 1/#q if #cthe skill is used again# while summoning, but the magic sword will spin quickly and deal #z% damage to #y enemies #w times.
All Dimensional Sword hits receive Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Use the Revolver Gauntlet to unleash the combined power of all of your bullets in one concussive blast. The Charge and explosion deal damage to enemies even when they are under attack reflection. The Charge action cannot be canceled by the Charge Skill.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Ammo Cost: 1
Can prepare for up to #y sec, adds up to #w bullets by using the Revolving Cannon, launches an explosion in proportion to the number of bullets used after Charge when the key is released. Invincible during preparation and Charge. Combo Training remains at the max level while casting skill.
#cCharge#: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
#cExplosion#: Max Enemies Hit: #z, Damage: #q%, Number of Attacks: #s
All hits receive Additional Critical Rate: +#cr% and Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Drive swords into the earth to create a personal sanctuary, use the skill again, then inflict a devastating attack after you teleport back in time.\nCooldown for Alpha and Beta will be applied.

string.value:
Time Force Cost: #forceCon, creates a sanctuary that lasts during cooldown. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount
#cAlpha#: Deals Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. #cBeta#: Deals Damage: #q%, Number of Attacks: #w
#cSkill Cooldown#: Consumes #z Time Force to destroy the sanctuary, move to the location, and attack up to #v enemies. #cAlpha#: Activates a sword attack #dot time(s), Damage: #x%, Number of Attacks: #y. #cBeta#: Activates a sword attack #s time(s). Damage: #q2%, Number of Attacks: #w2

string.value: Drive swords into the earth to create a personal sanctuary, use the skill again, then inflict a devastating attack after you teleport back in time.\nCooldown for Alpha and Beta will be applied.

#cAlpha#: Deals Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. #cBeta#: Deals Damage: #q%, Number of Attacks: #w

string.name: name
string.value: Battoujutsu Ultimate Will - God of Blades

string.name: desc
string.value: Releases the maximum amount of Sword Energy required to materialize the blade god. \nAbsorbs Sword Energy from the enemy, performs a final attack #cat the end of its duration or by using the skill again#, and restores your Sword Energy.\nUnaffected by attack reflection.

Sword Energy Cost: #s, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Damage: #damage%, Attack Duration: #time sec, Sword Energy Absorbed: #u for each enemy defeated.
Deals #y% damage when attacking 1 enemy and absorbs #q Sword Energy per attack
Before disappearing, deals a final blow for #selfDestruction% damage and recovers Sword Energy, #cMax Sword Energy Recovered:# #v#

string.value: #c[Fusion Skill]# Evan infuses Mir with his magic during #cDragon Slam#, causing Mir to briefly grow and release a blast of elemental energy. This skill advances alongside Dragon Slam. Unaffected by attack reflection.\n\c Activates when Evan uses #cElemental Barrage# while Mir is using #cDragon Slam#.

Consumes #t% Max HP for jobs without MP. 
Can be toggled#c on/off#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons flame orbs from another dimension to pursue enemies. The number of orbs you summon depends on how many damage over time stacks you have on enemies.

string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Flame Orbs Created: #x, Damage Per Orb: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Duration: #time sec
Flame Orb Damage: #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec
Summons 1 additional orb for every #y of your damage over time stack(s) on enemies in range
When multiple orbs hit a single target their Final Damage is reduced by #w%, starting with the second orb

string.name: desc
string.value: Covers the world in the ice of an ancient glacier. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Damage: #damage%, enemies in range are frozen.\nArea stays icy for #y sec, periodically dealing #q% damage and freezing stacks to enemies caught in it.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls upon your holy power to create a consecrated space that empowers and revitalizes your allies. Benedictions do not stack.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Final Damage (all party members in range including yourself) +#q%
Party members other than you periodically recover #x% of max HP/MP, clear certain statuses, and have their Attack Speed increased.
Final Damage: +1% per #q2 INT (up to +#w% max)
HP/MP Recovery: +1% per #y INT (up to #z% max)
Attack Speed: +1 per #u INT (up to +3 max)
Can be toggled
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Hurls a giant ball of flame that shoots forward before returning to you. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.value: Summons a gate to a realm of pure light whose blinding glow incinerates nearby. Unaffected by attack reflection.

When attacking one person: #y%
Duration: #time sec
#cCan be used once while Equilibrium is active#

string.value: Combine all of your auras and become a grim specter of death.

string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon per sec, Duration: #time sec, grants the effect of all your auras. Additional Magic ATT increase by #indieMad for the self.
The Aura Scythe enhances your Blow skills. MP Cost: #q, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%.
Can be toggled On/Off.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleashes your psychic powers to create a tornado that gathers in nearby objects. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cPsychic Point Cost: #ppCon#, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Duration: #time sec.
The tornado grows and grows until the skill ends or is used again, causing the objects inside to be thrown forward.
Thrown Object - Deals #u% damage to up to #q enemies #w2 times and explodes #dot times, dealing #q2% damage to up to #s enemies #s2 times. Final Damage increases up to 3 times in proportion to the object's size.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Utilizes powerful elemental magic for rapid attacks. You'll get new powers for a short time after each attack. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, uses magic 4 times in a row, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Critical Rate: +#cr%
Each element increases Final Damage by #y% for #x sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec
Casting Elemental Barrage after a Mir skill will instead trigger a#c fusion skill#. Casting Mana Burst before Elemental Barrage, or casting Elemental Barrage while lying down will not prevent the fusion skill from triggering. However, MP cost will be multiplied by 5.

string.name: desc
string.value: Utilizes powerful elemental magic for rapid attacks. You'll get new powers for a short time after each attack.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons Yuki-musume, a specter who wields intense cold. Yuki-musume helps Kanna attack enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: Mana Cost: #epCon, Yuki-onna Duration: #time sec. Yuki-musume assists Kanna, dealing #v% damage to #z enemies 6-8 times. When Yuki-musume is summoned, Kanna's mana consumption is reduced by #x% and #y% HP is recovered on every attack.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: The Beast Tamer's animal friends join forces to attack the enemy. Pressing the skill button repeatedly will perform a joint attack, with the last animal friend unleashing a powerful special attack. You can use the directional keys during the skill to determine which animal will inflict the final strike.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Beast Tamer's four animal friends attacks the enemy consecutively.
Lai - Regular Attack: attacks 8 enemies 3 times dealing #x% damage, Special Attack: attacks 8 enemies 6 times dealing #y% damage.
Fort - Regular Attack: attacks 6 enemies 2 times dealing #z% damage, Special Attack: attacks 4 enemies 3 times dealing #w% damage, then attacks 1 enemy 8 times dealing #s% damage.
Eka - Regular Attack: attacks 8 enemies 10 times dealing #v% damage, Special Attack: attacks 15 enemies over a large range 10 times, dealing #q% damage.
Arby - Regular Attack: attack 8 enemies 1 time dealing #u% damage, Special Attack: periodically attack 8 enemies 4 times dealing #a% damage, creates a tree that reduces damage taken by nearby allies by #q2%, Tree Duration: #s2 sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Releases a poisonous cloud that spreads in all directions, striking nearby enemies. You can detonate the cloud to inflict additional damage. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Creates a number of poisonous clouds that deal #damage% damage #attackCount times and inflict an additional #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec.
Enemies can only be struck by one poisonous cloud.
#w sec or more after poisonous clouds are created, you can use Mist Eruption to detonate them which hits up to #x enemies and deals #z% damage #y times. Explosion damage from poisonous clouds may stack, but if more than #u are applied to a single enemy, the Final Damage for the additional explosions is decreased by #s%.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a wall of lightning that pulses forward, electrocuting enemies in its path. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, conjures #w lightning bolts that attack up to #q enemies, dealing #v% damage #s times.
The lightning moves forward as it strikes, but will continue to strike the same place if its path is blocked.
Final Damage of lightning bolt decreases by #q2% every time the enemy is attacked repeatedly.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons an angel of balance possessing both compassion and vengefulness. Not usable while Bahamut is active. Unaffected by attack reflection. Ignores Righteously Indignant's max enemy limit.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Summon Duration: #time sec. The angel's aspect depends upon whether Righteously Indignant is active or inactive.
#cInactive#: Appears as the Angel of Benevolence. Grants a buff that recovers #y% of party members' Max HP every #x sec, and increases their damage by #w% and 1% per #attackCount INT for #subTime sec. Damage can increase up to #damage%.
#cActive#: Appears as the Avenging Angel. Attacks up to #s enemies dealing #z% damage #v times. Attacked enemies are marked for #q sec. Dealing holy damage to those enemies consumes the mark and increases Final Damage of the attack by #q2%.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons an angel of balance possessing both compassion and vengefulness. Not usable while Bahamut is active. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a magic symbol that oscillates between light and darkness. The magic symbol changes depending on your light/dark state, but does not receive bonuses from Sunfire, Eclipse, or Equilibrium. Unaffected by attack reflection.
