string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Summon Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount
#cSunfire# - Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
#cEclipse# - Damage: #w%, Number of Attacks: #z
#cEquilibrium# - Damage: #y%, Number of Attacks: #v
Critical Rate: +#cr% will be applied with all attacks
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleashes the true might of the Essence of Fire. Only usable while Fires of Creation is active. Attack varies based on the Fire Essence summoned. All the flames are consumed upon use and the attack is boosted in proportion to the number of flames consumed.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cPassive Effects#: Gain 1 Flame Charge for each enemy struck that is afflicted by Ignition, up to #y flames.
#cActive Effect# - MP Cost: #mpCon, Flame Cost: #x+ charges
[Blazing Lion]: Hits up to #v enemies dealing #z% damage #w times. Increases Final Damage by #v2% for every Flame Charge over the minimum cost.
[Flame Fox]: Creates #q foxfires that randomly strike #q2 enemies within range. Each foxfire deals #s% damage and can regenerate up to #u2 times. Regenerates #s2 more time for each #u Flame Charge over the minimum cost.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Mir Skill]# Mir slams down and savagely attacks the enemy. Unaffected by attack reflection.\n#cMir's skills and fusion skills are not affected by effects that increase attack speed.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Duration: 2.5 sec\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons an altar of destructive magic. Once two or more have been placed, the 1st altar fires an orb of deadly void energy that travels between the altars, decimating all in its path. Each orb can only strike a given enemy once until recharged by the next altar. The orb travels faster when additional altars are placed. Additional altars must be placed within range of the previous altar. Enemies hit are marked with a Dark Brand. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Altar Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
The orb takes 0.8 sec to move to the next altar. After 2 altars, the time to travel that distance is reduced by #u% for every additional altar.
A new altar can be summoned every #v sec, up to #y altars.
Enemies hit gain Dark Brand.
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Conjures ultra-dense matter out of pure psychic energy, and pushes it towards the enemy. The matter inflicts damage more quickly as it accelerates. Using the skill again redirects the matter toward yourself, at a reduced speed. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cPsychic Point Cost: #ppCon.# Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Attacks more quickly as object accelerates.
While traveling towards you, object moves at #w% speed.
Inflicts an additional #u% damage to up to #s enemies #v times when the object disappears.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons an angel of balance possessing both compassion and vengefulness.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a Spiritstone that amplifies the abilities of you and your party. It grows more powerful as it absorbe mana. The effects of Spirit's Domain do not stack.

string.name: h
string.value:
Mana Cost: #epCon, Spiritstone Duration: #time sec
#c[Basic Effect]# Deals #damage% damage to up to #mobCount enemies within range #attackCount times every #attackDelay sec. Periodically restores #y% of Max HP/MP, Final Damage +#x%, Status Resistance +#w
The Spiritstone grows more powerful with every #z mana absorbed from the caster, boosting its Basic Effect up to 3x.
When the Spiritstone is at full power, party members within range gain 2 Attack Speed, and the mana cost of the caster's skills are reduced to 0.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls a herd of critter cubs to your aid. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Summon Duration: #time sec. Summons between #x and at most #y groups of critter cubs, depending on the number of enemies within range.
Cubs periodically attack 3 times dealing #damage% damage.
When time runs out the cubs attack, dealing #selfDestruction% damage to as many as #mobCount enemies #z times
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Moves you to a different dimension to reduce the damage you take. Use the skill again to return. While in Ethereal Form, you cannot use other skills.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Gain Knockdown Immunity and lose #x MP instead of taking damage, when MP is 0, you lose #y HP\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires an intense beam of energy that scorches everything in its path. Usable for up to 10 seconds consecutively by holding#c the skill key#. Can move while casting. On hitting an enemy, Lucent Brand is refreshed.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, DoT: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, damage increased by #bdR% when attacking a boss\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: When Crystal Ignition comes in contact with your crystal, its strength is enhanced, and it fires 3 powerful beams of light in the direction Crystal Ignition is traveling. While using Wings of Glory, it activates automatically even if you don't have a crystal. Levels up alongside Crystal Ignition.

string.name: h
string.value: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Boss Damage: +#bdR%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\n#cCooldown: 1 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a mechanical warrior wielding a weapon forged from light. The Templar prepares to attack in Illium's direction, and will not change direction until the attack is made. With sufficient Crystal Charges, it fires a more powerful attack.\nIgnores Attack Reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, DoT: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nIf Crystal Charges reach #y while preparing, or while Wings of Glory is active, Final Damage is multiplied by 2.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleash the fury of flame in the form of an enraged spirit. Can be only used when Ifrit is summoned. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cIfrit Lv. 30+#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Attack Duration: #y sec\nDuration increases #t sec per 1 active Fervent Drain\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon the devastating frosts of the El Nath Mountains. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, stacks Freeze, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Damage: #damage%, Attack Duration: #time sec\nDeals #y% damage when attacking 1 enemy and stacks Freeze #z time(s)\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Use the power of mytocrystals to form a crystalline spirit and drive your enemies away. Can activate the Reaction skill with the crystalline spirit.
Does not reduce the number of enemies that can be attacked when the Radiant Javelin comes into contact.
Cannot use while Wings of Glory is active.
Required Skill: #cReaction - Destruction II Lv. 1 and above# and #cReaction - Domination II Lv. 1 and above#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, uses 1 crystal shard
A crystalline spirit forms near the mytocrystal for #time sec. Only #z% of Final Damage for the Reaction skill the spirit activates is applied, but if it's the 5th skill, #w% is applied. Not affected by cooldown reset.
Using #cWings of Glory# will disperse the crystalline spirit. Each spirit dispersed in the remaining time increases damage by #u%.
Prepares 1 crystal shard every #q sec up to #y shards.
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec
[Passive Effect: Magic ATT: +#madX]

string.name: desc
string.value: Master the art of black magic and summon death itself to deal with your enemies. The summon duration gets longer as there are more souls to be sacrificed. The god of death's attack deals damage to enemies even when they are under attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, summons the Grim Harvest that attacks for #time sec every #w sec. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Use the skill again to re-summon near you, can be used once every 10 sec
If the Grim Harvest defeats an enemy, the duration increases by #t sec per 1 enemy. If a boss was attacked, the duration increases by #z sec. Duration increased to up to #s sec for each attack
Attack interval beomes 50% with the #cMaster of Death applied#, but duration is not increased with attacks.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Hurl the embodiment of divine power directly at your enemies. The object attacks the enemies that come into contact with it and restores #cparty member HP#.\nThe object turns into Holy Light when it disappears, attacking enemies nearby and granting a buff to party members. It disappears immediately if #cthe skill is used again#.\nUnaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, deals #damage% damage to up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount time(s) at every interval, or restores #hp% of the Bishop's max HP for you and your party members that come into contact with the object.
Max Contact Count: #w, consumes the contact count for both attacks and recovery
#cHoly Light#: Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #dot%, Number of Attacks: #z. The Bishop and party members that come into contact with the light will gain a buff that increases damage by #q2% for #time sec + increases damage by #w2% for each remaining contact count.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Use the ultimate combination of light and dark to eviscerate your enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cEnder Lv. 30+#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, activates the Baptism of Light and Darkness #s times consecutively. Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec
If the #cEnder# hits the enemy, you gain 1 Sword of Consciousness. If you acquire #x swords, the#c cooldown for Baptism of Light and Darkness resets immediately.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Blaze through your enemies with the phoenix's symbol of infinite life and death.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, consumes 1 Phoenix Feather every sec
Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
1 Phoenix Feather will be prepared every #z sec. You can have up to #x feathers.
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Cast a magical ring to channel the power of the constellations. Magic ATT starts to charge the pentacle when Evan's magic hits a target, and the pentacle will operate when Magic ATT is full. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, sets up a magic pentacle for #time sec. Liberation starts when Magic ATT reaches #x, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount times consecutively, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%\n#y Magic ATT will be charged if a skill with an attribute hits a target, but it will #conly be charged once per skill#. Charges 1 Magic ATT when a skill with no attribute hits a target, and there is no charge limit\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Fuse monsters and objects into one and launch them like bullets. A Micro Black Hole forms for a short duration at the end of the attack range and deals additional attacks to nearby enemies. But, two Micro Black Holes cannot exist at the same time.
The Micro Black Hole is unaffected by attack reflection.
You can also use it by pressing the down key+[Psychic Grab] while the monster is lifted up.
Required Skill: #cPsychic Grab 2 Lv. 30#

string.name: h
string.value: #Psychic Point Cost: #ppCon. Attacks the enemies you're lifting and up to #mobCount enemies in front of you to deal #damage% damage #attackCount time(s). Charges #ppRecovery Psychic Point slot(s) when the skill hits a boss monster.\n#cMicro Black Hole#: Activates a black hole #s times. Damage: #x%, Max Enemies Hit: #z, Number of Attacks: #y. Charges #u Psychic Point slot(s) when the skill hits a target.

string.name: desc
string.value: You received a damage increase buff from the Holy Light.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Conjures a magic circle that releases spirits wrongfully sacrificed to perform evil spells. After 5 uses, you can call forth an even larger circle.
Unaffected by attack reflection.
You cannot summon the circle yourself. It is periodically activated when you use the following skills:
#cShikigami Haunting and Vanquisher's Charm#

string.name: h
string.value:
Mana Cost: #epCon, periodically summons a giant magic circle, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.
The magic circle will disappear either when it moves a certain distance or reaches the top of the map, and souls that deal #y% damage #z times to #x enemies will appear in up to #u locations.
The giant magic circle summons souls in up to #u2 locations.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Your animal friends zoom in on an airplane and attack the enemy mercilessly. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, periodically attacks #x times, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nRecovers #u HP for you and nearby allies and ignores abnormal status.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates spirit arrows that pursue and attack nearby enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Arrow Damage: #damage% damage #z times to 1 nearby enemy when in combat\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates spirit arrows that pursue and attack nearby enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Arrow Damage: #damage% damage #z times to 1 nearby enemy when in combat\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Arrows shot into the sky fall like rain. Unaffected by attack reflection. Has no effect in towns.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: +#indieDamR%, Duration: #time sec, arrows rain down on an area every #x sec for #t sec; up to #y of these areas can be created.
The falling arrows deal #q% damage to up to #z enemies #w times
Magic Arrow chance applied to attacks in this area is 2x that of Quiver Cartridge.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a ferocious gust to punish your enemies. Consumes 1 wind energy upon summoning. Using the skill with the down arrow key consumes all your wind energy to summon a stronger gust. There can only be 1 gust at a time, and it is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Wind Energy increases by 1 every #x sec (up to #y max)\n#cConsume 1 Wind Energy# - Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Duration: #s sec\n #cConsume 2 Wind Energy# - Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #w%, Number of Attacks: #w2

string.name: desc
string.value: Your jaguars heed your call to battle.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, summons #y jaguars from among the ones you've tamed (excluding your current jaguar) for #time sec
Applies #x% Final Damage to the skills of summoned jaguars
When the skill is activated while jaguars are summoned, they will be re-summoned at your location. Jaguars can be re-summoned once every #z seconds
Cooldown: #cooltime sec
[Passive Effect - ATT Power: +#padX]

string.name: desc
string.value: Catch your enemies square in your sights. Use the left-mouse button to attack and right-mouse button to cancel the skill.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Critical Shot Count: #x
Damage Range: #y% - #w% depending on enemy's proximity to the center of your sights, Enemy DEF Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%
Duration: #time sec, invincible for 2 sec after skill ends
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon forth the spirits of Elluel to devastate your foes. The spirits' energy is unaffected by attack reflection. The energy does not activate while using Sylvidia's Flight, but the skill's Final Damage increases in proportion to the activation rate.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, your afterimages may mimic the skills you use up to 3 times each
Afterimage Final Damage: #x%
Afterimage Skill Mimic Chance: #z% (-20% per successful mimic)
Ishtar's Ring and Irkalla's Wrath Activation Chance: 50%
Spirits - Deal #damage% damage #attackCount times on up to #mobCount enemies every #s2 sec, cooldown decreases by 1 sec after using a linked skill
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon forth the spirits of Elluel to devastate your foes. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, your afterimages may mimic the skills you use (except Ishtar's Ring) up to 3 times each
Afterimage Final Damage: #x%
Afterimage Skill Mimic Chance: #z% (-20% per successful mimic)
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Your Jaguar unleashes the full fury of the wild to savagely hunt your enemies.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Grants invincibility for #x sec. #c[Primary Attack]# Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Primary attack occurs 3 times. #c[Final Attack]# Unleashes #v attacks for #u% damage that have Critical Rate +#cr% and ignore #ignoreMobpdpR% additional enemy Defense.
Final Attack can be triggered immediately by using the skill before the Primary Attacks are complete, and #prop% chance for Another Bite debuff to be at max stack.
If not mounted, causes you to mount your jaguar. Invincible while mounting.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Magically enchants your arrows to explode as they approach the enemy, releasing countless more arrows.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Landing a hit with Piercing Arrow or Snipe causes your arrow to split and attack up to #mobCount enemies, dealing #damage% damage #attackCount times.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Ride into battle on Sylvidia, the majestic queen of unicorns. Activate once to mount, then again to perform a dash attack. Activate the skill while pressing Up to attack upward. The dash attack can be used from the air, and can be performed with the Jump key. You receive Ignis Roar at max stacks while riding Sylvidia, and some skills cannot be used.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Mount Duration: #time sec. Knockback Resistance: +#indieStance%, Attack Power: +#indiePadR%, Damage Taken: -#indieDamReduceR% (Includes HP% Based Attacks)\nDash attack deals #w% damage to up to #v enemies #z times.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #[cActive Effect]# Causes you to attack so quickly you produce afterimages. Unaffected by attack reflection. #[cPassive Effect]# After performing a certain number of attacks while the skill is on cooldown, an afterimage is created that attacks for a short time.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Fires arrows at set intervals dealing #damage% #attackCount times to enemies within range of your afterimages.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec
[Passive Effect: Every #u attacks performed while this skill is on cooldown, an afterimage is created that lasts #q sec and periodically attacks enemies within its range for #w% damage #z times.]
Active and Passive Effects cannot trigger simultaneously.

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls upon the Spirit of Wind to conjure deadly homing projectiles that track down your foes.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Creates #x enemy-seeking Spirit Arrows that deal #damage% damage #attackCount times.
If more than one Spirit Arrow strikes the same enemy, the Final Damage of each additional arrow is reduced by #w%.
Enemies hit by Spirit Arrows take #dot% damage time every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: When inflicting a critical wound, your strike hits the enemy where they are most vulnerable, dealing greater damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Allows Critical Rate to exceed 100% and Critical Damage to increase by #x% of Critical Rate.\nThe attack's additional Critical Rate is not applied.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Deal deadly consecutive attacks against your enemies, so they can experience the full wrath of the spirits.\nRequired Skill: #cIshtar's Ring Lv. 30+#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, can press the key down for up to #t sec, attacks up to #mobCount enemies in front of you to deal #damage% damage #attackCount times consecutively.\nYou can use it while walking backward and can change direction by #cpressing the direction key twice#\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Concentrate and deploy a powerful spirit arrow.
Concentrate by pressing the key down. Activates an enhanced Surge Bolt when used after concentration is complete. It won't be canceled if you use a different skill while you concentrate.
You can #cactivate the Surge Bolt# while using Net Toss, Snipe, Piercing, and High Speed Shot if you've concentrated for just a short time.
The Final Attack will not be applied to the Surge Bolt.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #v, Damage: #u%, Number of Attacks: #y. Deals #u2 damage after focus is complete
Additional Monster DEF Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%, Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%
Max Focus Duration: #s sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Use every type of arrowhead at once, including a special flaming arrowhead that explodes when it hits an enemy. The Flaming Arrow is unaffected by attack reflection.\nDoes not consume arrowheads in the quiver and cannot use Enchanted Quiver while in use. Enchanted Quiver will be canceled if Quiver Barrage is used while Enchanted Quiver is active.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Attack Power: + #indiePadR%, use every type of arrowhead at once, including a flaming arrowhead\n#cFlaming Arrow#: Launches #y flaming arrows consecutively. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Cooldown: #z sec\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Activate a wind barrier around yourself that will defend you and decimate your enemies. Creates a whirlwind when you attack to deal additional damage.\n#cElemental is consumed upon defending against an attack# and the wind barrier will disappear when it's completely consumed. The whirlwind is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, creates a wind barrier with the #w Elemental
Damage is nullified when the #z #cElemental# is used for damage equal to 1% of max HP when hit. Also applies to attacks that deal damage proportional to the max HP.
Launches #q2 whirlwind(s) that deal(s) #dot% damage every #w2 sec upon attack. Decreases the Final Damage of the whirlwind by #s% if multiple whirlwinds attack 1 enemy.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Use new Resistance technology to equip a grenade launcher that can be used in addition to a crossbow. The grenade will bounce on the ground and delay detonation if it doesn't hit an enemy. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, upon explosion deals Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
#cNo casting action while Wild Arrow Blast is active.#
1 grenade is prepared every #t sec. Can have up to #z grenades
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Ancient Force]#\nConsume your entire Relic Gauge to fire a bolt of obliterating energy that pierces all. The more Relic Gauge consumed, the stronger the attack will be.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon or more required to use the skill. Consumes all energy built up in the Relic Gauge to deal #v% damage #w times to up to #u enemies. Invulnerable while casting.\nIf the consumed Relic Gauge exceeds certain thresholds (25%/50%/75%/100%), Final Damage will be increased by 25%/50%/75%/100%, respectively. Ignore Def +#ignoreMobpdpR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Ancient Force]#
Uses the power of the relic to call forth the true form of the Shadow Raven to wreak havoc.
The summoned Shadow Raven moves in search of enemies, and you can also press the skill key to manually change its direction.
Can only be used when the Shadow Raven or the Fury of the Wild is summoned. The Shadow Raven's attacks cannot be reflected.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon, Duration: #u sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Attack Count: #attackCount\nCharges the Relic Gauge by #v when attacking\nDirection Change Cooldown: #x, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Enchant Force]#
Projects the relic's power as a shield to defend yourself and your party members.
Party members who receive the protection of this skill will deal increased Critical Damage when attacking any enemy affected by the Ancient Curse debuff.
#cDeluge Enhancement#
Grants each party member a personal protective shield.
#cBurst Enhancement#
Increases the size of the shield.
#cTorrent Enhancement#
Allows the shield to be moved.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon, Duration: #time sec, decreases damage taken from attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage by -#y%.\nThe shield will deal #damage% damage #attackCount times to up to #mobCount enemies within its radius.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Enchant Force]#\nProjects the relic's power as a shield to defend yourself and your party members.\nParty members who receive the protection of this skill will receive reduced damage and will deal increased Critical Damage when attacking any enemy affected by the Ancient Curse debuff.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon, Duration: #time sec, Hit damage -#x% (including attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage)\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Enchant Force]#
Projects the relic's power as a protective shield. While within the shield, you will receive no damage from enemies' normal attacks, and reduced damage for attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage. 
Party members who receive the protection of this skill will deal increased Critical Damage when attacking any enemy affected by the Ancient Curse debuff.
Enhanced by the Burst emblem to defend a wider area than normal.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon, Duration: #time sec, decreases damage taken from attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage by -#y%.\nThe shield will deal #damage% damage #attackCount times to up to #mobCount enemies within its radius.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Enchant Force]#

 Party members who receive the protection of this skill will deal increased Critical Damage when attacking any enemy affected by the Ancient Curse debuff.

string.name: h

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Enchant Force]#\nProjects the relic's power as a shield to defend yourself and your party members.\nParty members who receive the protection of this skill will deal increased Critical Damage when attacking any enemy affected by the Ancient Curse debuff.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Enchant Force]#
Projects the relic's power as a protective shield. While within the shield, you will receive no damage from enemies' normal attacks, and reduced damage for attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage.
Party members who receive the protection of this skill will deal increased Critical Damage when attacking any enemy affected by the Ancient Curse debuff.
Enhanced by the Burst emblem to defend a wider area than normal.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Enchant Force]#
Projects the relic's power as a protective shield. While within the shield, you will receive no damage from enemies' normal attacks, and reduced damage for attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage.
 Party members who receive the protection of this skill will deal increased Critical Damage when attacking any enemy affected by the Ancient Curse debuff. 
Enhanced by the Torrent emblem to allow the shield to be moved to another location.

string.name: desc
string.value: Causes the poison inflicting nearby enemies to burst and spread.

string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Consumes all active Damage-over-Time stacks on up to #mobCount poisoned enemies in range and instantly inflicts #w% of their remaining damage plus an additional #damage% damage #attackCount times
Additional damage is +#x% per remaining second of consumed DoT stacks up to #z 
Afterwards, spreads the original DoT damage to up to #y nearby enemies

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily grants your throwing skills extra spread. Does not apply to Shadow Partner.

Lucky Seven attacks in 4 extra directions
Triple Throw attacks in 4 extra directions
Quad Star attacks in 3 extra directions, extra projectiles deal 15% less Final Damage

string.value: Storm forward, slashing enemies with \ntechniques honed at the Secret Garden. \nYou can move while attacking.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires a powerful beam of energy.

string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Duration: #time sec, Invincible while attacking

string.name: desc
string.value: The shadows on the ground coalesce to form a spear that pierces enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection. Has no effect in towns.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time. #prop% chance for shadows to form on the ground every time you use a dark-aspected skill (excluding Dark Omen and Shadow Spear)
The shadows slowly gather into a spear dealing #damage% damage #attackCount times on up to #mobCount enemies
If there are enough shadows, they coalesce into a Giant Spear that deals #q% damage #y times on up to #z enemies with a #w sec cooldown.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Throw a flurry of cards until you're down to your last one. Will luck be on your side as you unveil it? You can move slowly while attacking, and the cards will attack the boss monster in the area with highest max HP first.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Damage Taken during skill: -#y%, Luck of the Draw does not trigger Carte Blanc and Carte Noir.
On ending, draws a card to buff all party members for #dotInterval sec. Invincible while drawing.
#cRed Cross -# Recovers #u% Max HP/MP over time 
#cTree of Life -# All Damage Taken: -#v%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +#s2
#cHourglass -# Active Cooldowns shortened by #u2% (except skills that ignore cooldown resets)
#cThree Swords -# Final Damage +#v2%
#cCrescent Moon -# Gain all card buffs simultaneously.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Red Cross: recovers Max HP/MP over time.

string.name: h
string.value: #cRed Cross#: Recovers #y% of Max HP/MP over time

string.name: desc
string.value: Tree of Life: reduces damage taken, including proportional HP damage and increases Abnormal Status Resistance.

string.name: h

string.name: desc
string.value: Hourglass: reduces skill cooldowns (except ones not affected by cooldown resets).

string.value: #cHourglass#: reduces skill cooldowns by #x%, excluding skills not affected by cooldown reset

string.name: desc
string.value: Sharp Sword: increases your Final Damage.

string.name: desc
string.value: Throw a flurry of cards until you're down to your last one. Will luck be on your side as you unveil it? You can move slowly while attacking.

string.name: h
string.value: #cLuck of the Draw#: Grants all cards buffs at simultaneously

string.name: desc
string.value: Throws a massive shuriken said to be used by the thieves of old. Unaffected by attack reflection. Reduced chance of activating Assassin's Mark.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
The huge shuriken flies forward striking foes, then spins in place dealing additional damage for #z sec before disappearing.
#w% of normal chance to trigger Assassin's Mark.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Decide the fate of your opponents with a blinding flurry of blades. Additional hit from Blade Clone is applied only once.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Chase Cut Activation Count: #w, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Enemy DEF Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Throws a razor-sharp card infused with incredible power that ricochets dangerously. Use the skill again while the card exists to immediately release the power. Prioritizes targets with highest Max HP, but targets that were hit with an Ace in the Hole will get low priority.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Ricochets #z times dealing #damage% damage, before releasing the energy stored inside to strike up to #q enemies for #w% damage #v times.\nAttack the enemies with the highest HP first, except the previously attacked enemies when it ricochets. If there are no enemies nearby, the card's magic is unleashed instantly.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Move behind the enemy damaged by Assassinate to deal a fatal attack. Attacks linked with Assassinate are unaffected by attack ignore and attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cPassive Effect#: The enemy hit with Assassinate's last attack receives a wound debuff for #time sec that can stack up to 3 times. Only 1 enemy can receive the wound debuff. If the debuff is given to a new enemy, the previous debuff disappears.
#Active Effect# - MP Cost: #mpCon, Summons your friends that were hiding to deal #y% damage up to #v enemies #q times.
If one of the enemies has the wound debuff at max stack, you can use it by linking from Assassinate's last attack to move behind that enemy dealing #w% damage #z times that have Critical Rate +#cr% and ignore #ignoreMobpdpR% additional enemy Defense. Invincible for #s sec after the attack.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons an immovable shadow. The shadow faces in the direction of the enemy with the highest Max HP and mimics throwing-star attacks. It cannot be injured, and vanishes when its duration ends.\nYou may activate the skill again to swap places with the shadow. However, you cannot do this while in the air.\nUnaffected by attack reflection. Capable of triggering Mark of Darkness and Shadow Bat.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Summon Duration: #time sec. Shadow attacks from a fixed location, dealing additional #x% of the Final Damage of your throwing star skills.\nActivate to swap places up to #w times\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Overloads your energy core, producing power in excess of your maximum storage capacity. You cannot recover MP while your core is overloaded, but your skills will not cost any energy. Overloaded attacks produce plasma currents that strike nearby enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection. The increased capacity from overloading cannot be recharged by Amaranth Generator.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, When MP skill is cast, consumes #q% Max MP + #y per sec. Allows you to charge #w additional Surplus Energy. Energy charging time halved.
Final Damage increases by #x% per Surplus Energy charged.
Use skill again to deactivate it. Extra Surplus Energy disappears immediately on skill deactivation.
Generates plasma currents at random intervals that strike up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount times.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: You vow to destroy your enemies at any cost. You can renew your vow to empower its effects by using the skill again while it's active.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP, reduces Avoidability (including Bonus Evasion) and increases Final Damage for #time sec, Hit Damage increased if attacked within a certain percentage of your max HP.
Enters 2nd Stage with remaining duration being reduced to #u% when skill is used again during 1st Stage, skill ends when used again during 2nd Stage.
1st Stage - Avoidability: -#x%, Hit Damage: +#z%, Final Damage: +#y%
2nd Stage - Avoidability: -#w%, Hit Damage: +#s%, Final Damage: +#q%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec 
[Passive Effect - ATT Power: +#padX]

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons an ancient Nova weapon reforged by the Shadowdealers. The cannon draws in energy, and eventually fires. Does not trigger Attack Reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. The cannon gathers energy for #time sec, periodically inflicting #damage% damage #w times to up to #x enemies at set intervals.\nAfter amassing enough energy, it creates a supernova that deals #q% damage #u times to up to #s enemies.\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Throws your chains with such intensity that they tear through the fabric of space and time, wreaking havoc on your foes. Can inflict damage even on enemies with attack ignore and attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Creates giant chains that travel along an arbitrary path inflicting #y% damage #w times to up to #x enemies.\n#cChain Cooldown: 0.6 sec#\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Make your enemies's shadows attack them and strip them of their power.\nRequired Skill: #cBat Affinity III Lv. 30+#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, deals #x% damage to boss monsters, creates a Shadow Bat where an enemy received an attack #cif a Shadow Bat can be summoned#\n#cIf an enemy has been defeated by Shadow Bite#, the Final Damage increases by #y% per 1 enemy for #time sec. #cIf you attacked a boss monster#, the Final Damage increases by #w%. The Final Damage increased by Shadow Bite is applied up to #q%.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleash the power of the Dark Lord's insight. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, shoot #bulletCount Throwing Star(s) per 1 enemy for #time sec, dealing #damage% damage to max #mobCount enemies
#x additional Throwing Stars are launched regardless of the number of enemies.
Boss Damage: +#bdR%
The scroll explodes when the skill duration ends, dealing #selfDestruction% damage with #w additional attacks. Max Enemies Hit: #z
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Move faster than the speed of sound, dealing consecutive attacks along the way. You will not be pushed back by any enemy attacks when casting Sonic Blow.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost:#mpCon, periodically deals #damage% damage to #mobCount enemies #attackCount time(s) for 2.5 sec, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec\nCooldown decreases by #t sec for each Body Count point

string.name: desc
string.value: Brand the enemy with the Phantom's Mark. Can be used #cif there is an enemy marked as the Phantom's target or all of the Master Thief Marks are collected#.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, use all Master Thief Marks#
Move behind a marked enemy or the furthest enemy in range and attack. #cPhantom's marked enemies are targeted first.# Invincible for #subTime sec after moving.
Activates a trajectory #q time(s) dealing #damage% damage #attackCount time(s) and completes the Master Thief Mark dealing #s% damage #z time(s). All attacks, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%
Enemies hit with a Cane skill or Tempest get a debuff for #time sec. Targets 1 enemy after #s2 stacks and prioritizes targets with highest max HP in range. Gain 1 Master Thief Mark for enemies hit with a Cane skill or Tempest. Phantom's Mark requires #x Master Thief Mark(s). Mille Aiguilles and Tempest must hit targets #y times more than other skills to mark an enemy or get Master Thief Marks.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Whip chains at high speed to create a maelstrom that will strike fear into the hearts of all your enemies. There can only be 1 maelstrom, and it is unaffected by attack reflection.\nChain Arts: Can only use as a combo after using 2 Thrash hits. You can also use it by pressing the down key+[Attack Key].\nRequired Skill: #cChain Arts: Thrash IV Lv. 10+#

string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, at a certain interval deals Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Upon attack, #prop% chance to Slow enemies for #s sec\nAttack speed gradually decreases based on time

string.name: desc
string.value: Spin as fast as a tornado and create a black typhoon that shoots forward to damage your enemies. The typhoon is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.value:
MP Cost:#mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
At intervals, Typhoon deals Damage: #x%, Max Enemies Hit: #u, Number of Attacks: #y
For Spinning Attack and Typhoon, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%

string.value: Deploys the latest Hypogram Field that combines every Hypogram feature. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cHypogram Field Lv. 30 or higher#

string.value:
MP cost: #mpCon, Hologram Field generated for #time sec.
Whenever the orb makes contact with the Hologram Field, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. The same amount of damage is inflicted when the orb touches monsters.
Damage inflicted by party members within the field is increased by #s%, 1 surplus energy recharged whenever a party member within the field evades an attack.
Missiles fired by the Aegis System increased by #x when Xenon is inside the field.

string.name: desc
string.value: Party members's damage is increased within the Hypogram Field: Fusion field.

string.name: desc
string.value: Draws the powers of the Talisman: Clone to its limits, raining a barrage of clones on enemies. Greatly increases the Attack Power and number of clones created with Talisman: Clone.\nCan only be used while Talisman: Clone is active. While this skill is active, Talisman: Clone's duration will not decrease.\nRequired Skill: #cTalisman: Clone Lv. 20#

string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, For #time sec, create #v2 clone(s) when attacking, Each clone attacks for #w2%p more damage than Talisman: Clone #q2 times\nClone creation has a #t sec cooldown\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: #[Scroll Skill]# Summons the guardian of Mt. Songyu, a giant tiger spirit. Whenever you achieve an attribute combo stage 3, the tiger gives out a mighty roar to shake heaven, earth, and your enemies.\n\n#Scroll: Tiger of Songyu is unaffected by attack reflection.#

string.value:
Scroll Energy Cost: #atGauge2Con, Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
When you reach attribute combo stage 3, its next attack will replace the normal attack with a roar that periodically deals #y% damage #z times.
Tiger's attacks have a cooldown of #s sec
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Calls upon the gods of an unknown place and time. Temporarily increases your damage and the gods join in your attacks after every few attacks.
#cUse the skill a second time# to summon the gods' full power in a massive attack.

#Sage: Wrath of Gods is unaffected by attack reflection.#

string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Damage: +#indieDamR%
The gods strike once per #x successful attacks, hitting up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount times, Cooldown: #t sec
Using the skill again will immediately end its effects and summon the gods at once, creating #v2 shockwave(s) that attacks up to #u enemies for #v% damage #u2 times.
You are invincible while summoning the gods. It negates attack ignore and attack reflection effects.
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.value:

#cUse the skill a second time# to summon the gods' full power in a massive attack.

HP Cost: #hpCon, select your desired die roll.
If a job that has Double Down gets the same number on 2 dice, the chance for the last die to have the same number is decreased by #x%.

[Passive Effect: Attack Power: +#padX]

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleash your rage and soar to new heights of power. Double-tap an arrow key to teleport in that direction. Use the skill again to attack nearby enemies with a humongous orb of energy. The orb of energy is unaffected by attack reflection and is invincible while casting.

string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon
Duration: #time sec, Final Damage (when fully charged): +#indiePMdR%.

string.value: Wildly fires your gun in all directions.

string.name: desc
string.value: Call upon the full power of the storm to annihilate your enemies with a chain of lightning. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Grants Final Damage +#indiePMdR% for #time sec. Initial Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Send forth a traveling lightning bolt. 
The damage it deals decreases with each enemy it attacks, and it can hit up to #x nearby enemies in a row
When only one bolt triggers, it becomes a more powerful version, dealing #s% damage #q times.
Lightning Spawn Cooldown: #y sec
Skill Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires a gigantic rocket from your cannon. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, periodically fires a giant rocket, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.\nYou can prepare a rocket once every #q seconds, and can hold up to #y.\nCooldown: #cooltime Sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons an diabolical death machine to annihilate your opponents. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, summoned machine lasts #time sec and arsenal includes Gatling Guns and missiles
Gatling Gun - Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Cooldown: #t sec
Missiles - Fires 2 missiles to hit up to #q enemies, Damage: #w%, Number of Attacks: #v, Cooldown: #s2 sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: The spirits that guide you flow as one within you, empowering you. Attacks that are automatically triggered are unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, resets cooldowns, Duration: #time, the spirits guiding you automatically trigger an attack skill, excluding 5th Job Skills, when you perform an attack, Key-down Skill Durations: #w sec, Final Damage: +#indiePMdR%\nSpirit Attack Cooldown: #x Sec.\nCooldown: #cooltime Sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon a sparkly orb bursting with power.

string.name: h
string.value: Summons an orb that grants #z sec of invincibility, the orb can last up to #time sec and explodes when used again, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.\nAll attack skills except Soul Buster further enhance orb invincibility duration and powers, up to 2 stages, with each stage increasing the Final Damage by #q%, and the invincibility duration by #s sec.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Call upon the full power of the storm to annihilate your enemies with a chain of lightning. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, send forth a traveling lightning bolt that lasts for #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nThe damage it deals decreases with each enemy it attacks, and you can trigger up to #x bolts per #y sec depending on the number of enemies nearby\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful singularity draws in enemies. Detonating the singularity inflicts significant damage over a large distance, based on the damage dealt while the target was affected by the singularity. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Draw in up to #mobCount enemies in range, stunning them, and create a singularity which periodically deals #damage% damage. Number of attacks: #x. Singularity Duration: #time sec. When the skill duration ends, the singularity explodes dealing #selfDestruction% AoE damage over a large range. The damage of the AoE attack can increase up to #y% based on the damage inflicted by the caster or a party member while the enemy is within the Singularity.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls upon the spirit of the dreaded sea serpent that slumbers beneath the savage tides to wrap yourself in a deadly barrier that maims all foes who venture near. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Consumes #y energy per sec, consumes additional #x energy per attack, energy consumption decreases by #z% when attacking boss monsters.\nAutomatically attacks up to #mobCount enemies, dealing #damage% damage #attackCount times at certain times.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a deadly shark spirit that flies forward, attacking your foes. Can be linked with all skills except for Thunder and self-skills. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Consumes #x Lightning Charges.\nFires a deadly spirit-shark that deals #damage% damage #attackCount times to up to #mobCount enemies.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Launches a missile battery that fires a barrage of micro-missiles.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Launches a battery that fires #bulletCount micro missiles at up to #mobCount enemies.\nMicro missiles deal #damage% damage #attackCount times.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: A real superstar takes their spotlights wherever they go. Enemies, being unworthy of the spotlight, take damage under its rays, while your own abilities are boosted. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
Installs 3 spotlights that shine on you for #time sec. Each spotlight deals #damage% damage #attackCount times to up to #mobCount enemies within its area.
While you are within the spotlight, you gain Status Resistance +#w, Critical Rate +#v%, Knockback Resistance +#q%, and Final Damage +#s%.
You receive a separate bonus for each spotlight, up to 3 buffs.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Locks onto your targets, then draws your gun and fires upon them in rapid succession.

string.name: h
string.value:
#c[Passive Effect]# Focuses aim on up to #mobCount enemies within range whenever skill is not on cooldown. Aiming process resets if skill is activated when the target is locked.
#[Active Effect]# MP Cost: #mpCon, Targeted enemies take #damage% damage #attackCount times, at +#cr% Critical Rate.
Deals extra damage for Target Locks. Bonus stacks up to 3x.
For each enemy struck fewer than Max Enemies Hit, +#w% additional Final Damage per enemy.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Opens a portal to the spirit world. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Creates a portal that summons #x spirits lasting #w sec. Up to #y spirits can exist simultaneously.
Spirits seek out nearby enemies to inflict #v% damage #s times. Spirits then collide with the enemy, disappearing and granting them a debuff for #s2 sec.
Attacks against an afflicted enemy gain Critical Rate +#q% and Critical Damage +#v2%.
Debuff can stack up to #q2 times.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Shoots a ballistic missile along a curved trajectory to obliterate enemies in a wide range. While holding the skill key, press the Up or Down arrows to control the angle of fire. Release the key to fire. The missile does not strike enemies directly but deals sustained damage when it hits the ground and explodes. Grants resistance to Knockback while aiming, and invincibility while prepping the skill and right after it ends.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, gives up to #dotTime sec to aim your shot. The skill is canceled if you fail to fire within this time. The explosion inflicts #q% damage #q2 times to up to #u enemies for #range sec.\nCreates a patch of Polluted Area lasting #u2 sec on the lowest platform within attack range which inflicts #z% damage to up to #v2 enemies.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Sets up a series of mobile spotlights that empower superstars and damage enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls down drones to blast your enemies with a graviton beam. Swap modes by pressing the skill key again after casting. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Summons drones for #time sec. The drones have two modes of operation, and you can switch between them every 3 sec. Drone attacks prioritize the enemy with the highest Max HP within range.
#c[Beam Splitter]# The drones hover above 4 targets within range, and fire downward periodically dealing #x% damage to up to 8 enemies 4 times.
#c[Beam Amplifier]# Drone hovers over 1 target within range and blasts downward periodically dealing #damage% damage to up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Puts your weapon into overdrive to unleash more attack power. Afterwards, your weapon will be less effective for a short while and cannot be unequipped until it's back to normal.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Attack Power: +#x% of base weapon attack power, Attack Power during cooldown: -#y% of base weapon attack power\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Connects you directly to the source of Abyssal power to temporarily prevent consuming Spectra in your Specter State.

string.name: desc
string.value: Exchange your HP for unlimited magical power.

#cSpecter State#: When Impending Death activates, an additional #x Abyssal Auras are created

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon the special Champion Monkey Platoon that will help you in battle. The platoon is comprised of 3 members, Basic Roy, Speedy Maxi, and Explosive Khakee, and is unaffected by attack reflection.

Monkey Bomb: Max Enemies Hit: #s, Damage: #y%, Attack Count: #w, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%

#cSpeedy Maxi#: Uses Monkey Cannon every 0.7 sec, and Monkey Bomb every 30 sec.
#cExplosive Khakkee#: Uses Monkey Cannon every 2.5 sec, and Monkey Bomb every 3 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Battleship Nautilus charges forward at its enemies. Strike enemies with the ship to create a weak spot, then fire all cannons to annihilate them. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nCannot be used when #cNautilus Strike# is being used.\nRequired Skill: #cNautilus Strike Lv. 30 or higher#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Invincible while casting
#cShip Attack#: The ship attacks at set intervals. Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Ship Attack Activation Count: #q
#cVolley#: Fires a volley at set intervals. Damage: #y%, Number of Attacks: #x, Volley Activation Count: #s

string.name: desc
string.value:
Use all available Mech weapons to fire every single one of your bullets at once. Invincible while casting, but cannot move or change direction.
Can use Homing Beacon while casting, can use multi-target, and there is no Final Damage reduction.
Homing Beacons require reload time and temporarily cannot be used after using the skill.
Required Skill: #cHeavy Salvo Plus Lv. 30 or higher#, #cGiant Robot SG-88 Lv. 30 or higher#

string.value:

string.name: desc
string.value:
Unleashes back-to-back Battoujutsu attacks as quick as the wind. Uses all 8 stages of attack during the time limit. 
1st Attack: Surging Blade
2nd Attack: Shouryuusen
3rd Attack: Rising Slash
4th Attack: Falcon Dive
5th Attack: Dankuusen
6th Attack: Sweeping Sword
7th Attack: Tornado Blade 
Final Attack: Sudden Strike
#cOnly learned skills will activate.# 
Damage and sword energy increased when using skills related to Battoujutsu. 
Required Skill: #cSurging Blade Lv. 1+ and Shouryuusen Lv. 1+#

The spiritual energy of nature flows within the Mana Vein, allowing Kanna's Mana to recover even more quickly This effect stacks with MP recovery from other skills. #cUp to #x# Mana Veins can be active at one time.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use your power as a Spirit Walker to teleport to a location of your choice via the currents of Mana.\nIf used while standing still, you will immediately teleport to a nearby Mana Vein that you've discovered. If used in a town, where the flow of Mana is murkier, you will be teleported to a random location.\nThis skill consumes Mana only when used in town.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hones your stealth technique, allowing you to attack and use skills during Dark Sight, with a chance of maintaining stealth. Being attacked by enemies may automatically trigger Dark Sight, and attacking during Dark Sight deals increased damage.\nDodging an attack that deals damage proportional to Max HP using the automatically-triggered Dark Sight will not trigger Dark Sight's cooldown (but Dark Sight will be deactivated).\nRequired Skill: #cDark Sight Lv. 10#

Mana Cost: #epCon, Transformation Duration: #time sec. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

Haku's Spirit Walker Skills
#c[Haku's Gift]#: When Kanna's HP is below 90%, restores #hp% of max HP. (Cooldown: #u sec)
#c[Foxfire]#: Summons a barrier made up of 3 wisps of foxfire for #w sec. When Kanna is hit, the foxfire absorbs the damage instead, then attacks back by exploding for #y% damage. (Cooldown: #z sec)
#c[Haku's Blessing]#: Increases Magic ATT for you and your party members by #x% of the Magic ATT of the Fan Haku has equipped. (Always Applied)
#c[Breath of the Unseen]#: Kanna's final damage increased by 3% for each party member. (Always Applied)

string.value: #c[Barrier]#\n#cA Blossom Barrier enhanced with energy drawn from a Mana Vein.#\nInside the enhanced Blossom Barrier, damage received from enemies' attacks is reduced by #x%, while Status Resistance is increased by #y and Knockback Resistance is increased by #prop%. You will also recover an additional #w Mana while within the barrier.

string.name: desc
string.value: Haku, his power now fully liberated, reacts to Kanna's attacks to launch his own attacks.

string.name: h
string.value: [Passive Effect] If you attack while Nine-Tailed Fury is off cooldown, there is a #u% chance Haku will attack up to #mobCount enemies in front of you for #damage% damage #attackCount times.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Shikigami Skill]#\nSummons the mighty Ghost Yaksha Boss and command it to attack and push back enemies\nRequired Skill: #cGhost Yaksha Lieutenant Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value:
#cMana Cost: #epCon#, Duration: #c#time sec#. Summons the Ghost Yaksha Shikigami.
While summoned, the Ghost Yaksha repeatedly attacks #cup to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount times#.
#cUse the skill again# while the Ghost Yaksha is summoned to instantly dismiss it, #cpulling in nearby enemies# to be hit for #selfDestruction% damage#.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Shikigami Skill]#\nGrants the chance to invoke a spirit when attacking that deals damage to enemies and curses them. Enemies cursed by the spirit yield additional EXP and have a greater chance of dropping higher quality equipment upon defeat.\nRequired Skill: #cKishin Shoukan Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value: Attack Chance: #u%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Attack Count: #attackCount. Attacked Targets have a #prop% chance to yield #expR% additional EXP for #subTime sec, and have an increased chance to drop equipment with potential.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the Mastery and Damage of fans.

string.name: desc
string.value: Liberate Haku's Mana, upgrading #cHaku Reborn# to #cHaku Reborn 2#. With his powers unfettered, Haku can take human form longer and use even more powerful Spirit Walker skills.\nRequired Skill: #cHaku Reborn Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value:
Upgrades Haku Reborn. Haku takes human form for #time sec. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

Haku's Spirit Walker Skills
#c[Haku's Gift 2]#: When Kanna's HP is below 90%, restores #hp% of max HP. (Cooldown: 120 sec)
#c[Foxfire 2]#: Summons a barrier made up of 3 wisps of foxfire for #w sec. When Kanna is hit, the foxfire absorbs the damage instead, then retaliates by exploding for #y% damage. (Cooldown: 60 sec)
#c[Haku's Blessing 2]#: Increases Magic ATT for you and your party members by #x% of Magic ATT of the fan Haku has equipped. (Always Applied)
#c[Breath of the Unseen 2]#: Kanna's final damage increased by 5% for each party member. (Always Applied)

string.name: desc
string.value: Haku temporarily assumes human form to use even more powerful Spirit Walker skills.\nRequired Skill: #cHaku Reborn Lv. 10#

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Spirit Walker Skill]#
Steadfast training has yielded true mastery of Shikigami Haunting, empowering the skill to its full might. Increases the attack power of Shikigami Haunting, as well as its range and the number of enemies hit.
Required Skill: #Shikigami Haunting 3 Lv. 20#
If the 5th Job Advancement skill 'Liberated Spirit Circle' has been learned, it will be automatically activated if not on cooldown.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Spirit Walker Skill]#\nBlast the enemy with evil-destroying charms. Hold down the skill key for a rapid-fire attack.\nIf the 5th Job Advancement skill 'Liberated Spirit Circle' has been learned, it will be automatically activated if not on cooldown.

string.name: h
string.value: Mana Cost: #epCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: #attackCount\nYou can #cmove# and #cjump# while holding down the skill key.\nWhile in use, increases the amount needed to activate #cShikigami Doppelganger# by #y.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Spirit Walker Skill]#\nCall forth a sakura tree to slam down in front of you. Enemies around the tree will suffer multiple hits while you and your party members recover HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Spirit Walker Skill]#\nThrow a charm imbued with the power to seal demons at the enemies before you, temporarily turning them to stone and stunning them in place.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Barrier]#\nUse your power as a Spirit Walker to create a Bellflower Barrier, strengthening yourself and your party members. Inside the Bellflower Barrier, Attack Power is increased by #indieDamR% and Boss Damage is increased by #bdR%.\nWhen used on a Mana Vein, the barrier will absorb the vein's energy to enhance the barrier, as well as restore additional Mana for yourself while you stand within it.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Spirit Walker Skill]#\nUnleashes the powers of the Ghost Yaksha Boss to wreak destruction and beat all unclean beings in the vicinity into submission, stunning them.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Spirit Walker Skill]#\nCreates a barrier that blocks and weakens evil beings around you.\n(The barrier will automatically dissipate if you stand idle or hang on a rope for over a certain amount of time.)

string.name: h
string.value: When activated, uses #epCon Mana to deal #damage% damage to #mobCount nearby enemies at set intervals #attackCount times.\nNegates attack ignore and attack reflection effects.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily release the sealed shikigami, Orochi, to immolate enemies in a wide area with its mighty power.\nCan also be used while in the air. Knockback Resistance is automatically set to 100% while casting.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily release the sealed shikigami, Orochi, to immolate enemies in a wide area with its mighty power. The most potent damage is dealt Immediately after the seal is opened, due to the sudden release of the condensed energy.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Shikigami Skill]#\nCreate a large paper shikigami that looks just like Kanna. The Shikigami Charm receives a share of Kanna's Mana each time Mana is consumed, and once enough Mana has been accumulated, it will burn, damaging nearby enemies.\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons two random crew members to assist you in battle. If you are targeted by a fatal status effect, a crew member will block it.\n#cLevel 10 required to learn Scurvy Summons.#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Summons two brave crew members to assist you in battle, Summon Duration: #time sec, Cooldown: #cooltime sec.
Crew members deal increased damage
#cMurat -# Damage: #damage%
#cValerie -# Damage: #w%
#cJack -# Damage: #y%
#cCutter -# Damage: #z%
If you're targeted by an abnormal status, a crew member will block it. That crew member cannot block another status effect until re-summoned.

Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Lv. 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Fills up the Morph Gauge and transforms you into your Final Form immediately upon use.
Morph Gauge is recovered as much as the amount that was in possession before the transformation when Final Form through Final Trance ends.
If transformed into Final Form using Final Trance, the skill duration is not affected by skill duration buffs.
Required skill: #cFinal Form Lv. 10#

string.name: desc
string.value: Your training in the ways of the Shadowdealers has left you with a permanent boost to Avoidability and maximum movement speed.

string.name: desc
string.value: Your hard life on the streets has left you with a certain wisdom that some might attribute to luck.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Use your chain to grapple to a platform or enemy. Press the skill key to launch the chain horizontally or at a vertical angle.
Striking horizontally only targets monsters, while striking vertically only targets platforms within a certain distance. While airborne, you can strike downward to temporarily slow your descent.
If the#c Skill key is pressed again# while the chain is tethered, you will quickly move to the target location. When the chain is tethered and while moving with the skill, you become temporarily #cstealthed# where you cannot be hit, and attacking or using skills will deactivate the stealth.
Enemies struck by the skill are briefly #cslowed#. #cCan be used while using other skills.#
#c[Up + Skill key]# Launches 45 deg. upward
#c[Down + Skill key]# Launches 45 deg. downward

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #q2%, Number of Attacks: #u, #s% chance to slow enemies for #s2 sec, enables Dark Sight state and cannot be hit from the time you start moving for #u2 sec.\n#cCooldown: #cooltimeMS sec#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Press the#c Attack Key# to whip your chain forward, then bring it crashing down. Enemies hit by the 2nd strike are pushed back. Foes struck by the chain are#c slowed# for a short time.
Other attacks can be used between the 1st and 2nd strikes to inflict enhanced damage.
#cCan be used while using other skills.#
#cSkill Lv. 10 required to learn Chain Arts: Thrash II.#

string.value:

#c[1st Hit]# Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
#c[2nd Hit]# Damage: #y%, Max Enemies Hit: #w, Number of Attacks: #u, #prop% chance of slowing enemies for #time sec.
Skills used immediately after 1st hit gain +#x% Final Damage #c(Excludes Chain Arts: Thrash)#.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Extensive training with a varied assortment of weapons increases the damage of#c all of your attacks#. Whenever you#c switch summoned weapons#, you execute a bonus attack and receive the Muscle Memory buff. The additional attack is unaffected by attack reflection.
This buff stacks up to the#c number of summonable weapons# you possess (excluding Chain Arts). Summoning any weapon besides the last one used will refresh this buff. 
Muscle Memory is not affected by effects that increase buff duration.
#cLv. 10 required to learn Muscle Memory III.#

string.name: h
string.value: Triggers upon switching summoned weapons. #c[Stack Bonus]# Attack Skill Final Damage +#x% per stack, for #time sec. Stacks up to the number of weapon summon skills you possess (excluding Chain Arts).\nRefreshing this buff stack inflicts additional hits. #c[Bonus Hits]# Damage: #y%, Max Enemies Hit: #s, Number of Attacks: #w, Cooldown: 0.25 sec.\n#c[Passive Effect: Damage for Scimitar +#damPlus%p]#

string.name: desc
string.value: Whips your chain out far and fast in a merciless flurry of strikes. Enemies struck by the initial blow are#c Stunned#. Grants a full stack of Muscle Memory.\nNot affected by cooldown reset.\nFoes hit cannot be Stunned again for 90 sec by Chain Arts: Beatdown, or other skills.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Attacks: #attackCount, Stun Length: #time sec. Strikes nearby foes from high to low HP, increasing stun duration up to 100% based on inflicted damage. Charges secondary attack enhanced by#c number of skill key presses#, and a final strike hitting up to 10 foes. #c[< #wx]# Damage: #s%, Hits: #s2, End Damage: 2500% #c[< #vx]# Damage: #q%, Hits: #q2, End Damage: 3500% #c[#vx+]# Damage: #u%, Hits #u2, End Damage: 5000%. Stun Length bonus up to 100% based on first hit. Secondary attack gains Ignore Enemy DEF +#ignoreMobpdpR% & grants Invulnerability for 10 sec. Half invulnerability time applied if enemy wasn't stunned. Deals secondary attack trigger shockwaves. #c[Shockwave]# Damage: #v2%, Max Enemies: #w2, Attacks: #z. #cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates a zone in which your Attack Power and Magic Attack are increased. This zone is destroyed when you move outside it.\nNot affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Attack Power: +#indiePadR%, Magic ATT: +#indieMadR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Fixes the player's max ATT at 2,000,000 temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec. The player's Max ATT is fixed at #x. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily fixes max MP at 500 to increase damage against Boss Monsters. Not affected by cooldown reset, and cannot be used by classes that do not use MP.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Fixed Max MP: #x MP, Boss Damage: +#indieBDR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily decreases max HP to increase damage against Boss Monsters. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max HP: -#x, Boss Damage: +#indieBDR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Decreases the max MP and ignores a certain percentage of the Defense Rate temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset, and cannot be used by classes that do not use MP.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max MP: -#x%, Ignore DEF: #indieIgnoreMobpdpR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily doubles your Max HP. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max HP: +#indieMhpR%, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases Critical Damage. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Critical Damage: +#x%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily nullifies enemy's Defense Rate by a percentage of your Critical Rate. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec. Ignored Defense increases by #x% of your Critical Rate. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily replaces the value of your Critical Rate with the value of the main stat that you invested all of your AP into. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, changes your Critical Rate value to #x% of your main stats. Cooldown: #cooltime sec. (This may end up reducing your Critical Rate.)

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily replaces Knockback Resistance with the value of another stat. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, changes your Knockback Resistance to #x% of one of your main stats, Cooldown: #cooltime sec. (This may end up reducing your Knockback Resistance.)

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases your main stats by the sum of all stats. For Xenon, increases the highest stat out of STR, DEX, and LUK. If stats are all the same, increases LUK. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases the main stats by #x% of the sum of all your stats. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases STR by the character's current level temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases STR by #x% of your current character level. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases DEX by the character's current level temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases DEX by #x% of your current character level. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases INT by the character's current level temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases INT by #x% of the current character level. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases LUK by the character's current level temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases LUK by #x% of your current character level. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases STR by a portion of your main weapon's ATT. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases STR by #x% of your equipped main weapon's Attack Power. (Of the main weapon's Attack Power and Magic Attack, the higher value will be applied.) Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases DEX by a portion of your main weapon's ATT. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases DEX by #x% of your equipped main weapon's Attack Power. (Of the main weapon's Attack Power and Magic Attack, the higher value will be applied.) Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases INT by a portion of your main weapon's ATT. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases INT by #x% of the equipped main weapon's Attack Power. (Of your main weapon's Attack Power and Magic Attack, the higher value will be applied.) Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases LUK by a portion of your main weapon's ATT. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases LUK by #x% of your equipped main weapon's Attack Power. (Of the main weapon's Attack Power and Magic Attack, the higher value will be applied.) Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases attack speed. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases Attack Speed by #indieBooster. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to temporarily deal damage to enemies even when they are under Attack Ignore and attack reflection. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, ignores enemy Attack Ignore and attack reflection effects. Does 100% damage. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Ignores a percentage of enemy Defense Rate, but also decreases your Defense temporarily during attacks. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Ignored Enemy DEF: #indieIgnoreMobpdpR%, Defense: -#indiePddR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Amplifies incoming damage by a certain amount and reflects it for a limited period of time. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Amplifies incoming damage by #x% and reflects it. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Has a chance to cancel all Abnormal Statuses. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Grants a #prop% chance to cancel all Abnormal Statuses and be immune to Abnormal Status for 3 sec after use. Does nothing when no Abnormal Statuses are applied. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases Attack Power and Magic Attack by a set amount. Buffs will be canceled if you take damage. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Attack Power: +#indiePadR%, Magic Attack: +#indieMadR%, Buff canceled when you take damage, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.value: [마스터 레벨 : 1]\n더블점프가 가능한 돼지바를 타고 #c상당히 빠른 속도로# 이동할 수 있습니다. #c월드맵에서 원하는 목적지를 더블클릭#하면 네비게이션을 따라 해당 위치까지 자동으로 비행합니다. (빅토리아 아일랜드를 비롯한 일부 대륙에서만 자동비행이 가능합니다. #c교관 어빈에게서 비행허가권을 구매#하여 스마트 라이딩 허가 대륙을 확장할 수 있습니다.)

string.name: desc
string.value: [마스터 레벨 : 1]\n더블점프가 가능한 돼지바를 타고 #c상당히 빠른 속도로# 이동할 수 있습니다. #c월드맵에서 원하는 목적지를 더블클릭#하면 네비게이션을 따라 해당 위치까지 자동으로 비행합니다. (빅토리아 아일랜드를 비롯한 일부 대륙에서만 자동비행이 가능합니다. #c교관 어빈에게서 비행허가권을 구매#하여 스마트 라이딩 허가 대륙을 확장할 수 있습니다.)
