string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nRide the fearsome Pulverizer, and try to forget that time when it chased you.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a miniature version of Black Heaven. You should be proud to be the hero who saved the world from Black Heaven!

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Mir Skill]# Releases a fiery breath that scorches enemies in front. Not affected by attack reflection.
Skill damage increases from the Dragon Breath passive trump the damage increases of Dragon Dive.
#cMir's skills and fusion skills aren't affected by Attack Speed increases.
Required Skill: Lv. 20 Dragon Dive#

string.name: desc
string.value: It's Pink Mong's Happy New Week filled with fun and happiness each and every day! The power of the Soul Weapon will increase your party members's HP, MP, and stats.

string.name: h
string.value: Soul Cost: #soulmpCon, increases Max HP & Max MP of party members by #indieMhp and All Stats by #indieAllStat for #time sec \nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 1]\nMove #cvery quickly# with the power of the Card Master that can use the Double Jump skill. #cDouble-click the destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount on more continents.)

string.name: desc
string.value:
A frog-drawn cart. Frogs are quite agile, but weaken in dry desert climates.#c
Speed: 80
Jump: 90
Weight: 10

string.name: desc
string.value:
With their impressively sturdy legs, ostriches can easily rush a cart along.#c
Speed: 85
Jump: 90
Weight: 20

string.name: desc
string.value:
A camel is called the Ship of the Desert. They are indispensable companions to desert merchants.#c
Speed: 90
Jump: 90
Weight: 30

string.name: desc
string.value: This desert porter looks scrawny but possesses an iron will and hearty stamina.

string.name: desc
string.value: You don't know what's more impressive -- his enormous frame or his bulging muscles. He may be slow, but he can lift heavy loads with ease.

string.name: desc
string.value: Growing up in the desert made her way tougher than she looks. She fires up the morale of the other porters, allowing for faster movement.

string.name: desc
string.value: Robbers wouldn't dare steal from you with a mighty Sand Warrior at your side.

string.name: h1
string.value: Speed: 10, Jump: 5, Max Carrying Weight: +10, Robber Encounters: -10%

string.name: desc
string.value: This little critter can easily lift loads many times his own weight and looks adorable doing it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Your Speed and Jump increases after drinking water from the oasis. Your chances of meeting thieves again significantly decreases.

string.name: desc
string.value: The offering is sacrificed when the brand is complete, strengthening Damien's power. If the brand is not yet complete, give a part of your brand to a party member to slow down its completion. You can also purify it at the World Tree's altar.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Periodically recovers HP and MP for 150 sec with the power of Fairy Tears.
Recovery amount increases based on the number of stacks when potions are used during recovery.
Max recovery amount is doubled for Demon Avenger.
1st Time: Recovers 1% of HP and MP per sec up to 1,000.
2nd Time: Recovers 1.5% of HP and MP per sec up to 1,500.
3rd Time: Recovers 2% of HP and MP per sec up to 2,000.
4th Time: Recovers 2.5% of HP and MP per sec up to 2,500.
5th Time: Recovers 3% of HP and MP per sec up to 3,000.

#c2018# is the year of the Golden Dog!
Gather good energy in the lucky sack, and a Golden Dog will slowly fade into existence to help you hunt!

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a #cFlame Bird# who wants to help save the world. Summon the Flame Bird in a hunting ground where#c monsters near your level# appear. Defeat monsters when the bird is nearby to acquire #cFlame Bird's Determination#. It counts towards your determination count and also charges the Flame Bird's Energy. When its Energy is full, use the skill once more to temporarily ride around on the Flame Bird and attack nearby enemies.\r\n#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#\r\n#cYou cannot summon the Flame Bird if you have already collected all the determination you can for the day.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
A support effect that changes based on the number of Cygnus Support Troops present.
#cLevel 1: 10% increase to EXP obtained and damage inflicted
Level 2: 20% increase to EXP obtained and damage inflicted
Level 3: 30% increase to EXP obtained and damage inflicted
Level 4: 40% increase to EXP obtained and damage inflicted
Level 5: 50% increase to EXP obtained and damage inflicted

Support Troops and their effects disappear if you exit the area.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
A support effect that changes based on the number of Resistance Support Troops present.
#cLevel 1: 10% increase to EXP obtained and Critical Rate
Level 2: 20% increase to EXP obtained and Critical Rate
Level 3: 30% increase to EXP obtained and Critical Rate
Level 4: 40% increase to EXP obtained and Critical Rate
Level 5: 50% increase to EXP obtained and Critical Rate

Support Troops and their effects disappear if you exit the area.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
A support effect that changes based on the number of Nova Support Troops present.
#cLevel 1: 10% increase to EXP obtained, 20% increase to Knockback Resistance
Level 2: 20% increase to EXP obtained, and 40% increase to Knockback Resistance
Level 3: 30% increase to EXP obtained, and 60% increase to Knockback Resistance
Level 4: 40% increase to EXP obtained, and 80% increase to Knockback Resistance
Level 5: 50% increase to EXP obtained, and 100% increase to Knockback Resistance

Support Troops and their effects disappear if you exit the area.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The air is saturated with the force of Erda.\n#cSkills with a cooldown of 5 seconds or longer will have their cooldowns set to 5 seconds for a short time.#\nBuff duration increase effect does not apply, and this effect will not apply to certain buff skills.

string.name: h1
string.value: #cSkills with a cooldown of 5 seconds or longer will have their cooldowns set to 5 seconds for a short time.# Buff duration increase effect does not apply to Erda Frenzy. #cLeaving the map will dispel the effect#.

string.name: desc

When the light shines upon the character 10 seconds later, you will acquire#c determination# and obtain#c additional determination# if the skill eliminates monsters.\r\n#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#\r\n#cYou cannot use this skill if you have already collected all the determination you can for the day.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Peaceful Maple Tree appears to attacks nearby enemies that dare to disturb Maple World's harmony.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Tractor mount that can double jump.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Chick that can double jump.

string.name: desc
string.value: The #cLife Force# needed to heal Maple World is full. Eliminate #cmonsters near your level# to obtain #c10 determination per monster, up to 500#. \r\n#cAttack Power & Magic ATT: +30.#\r\n#cIt will not activate if you have already collected all of the determination you can for the day.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
You're in a strange, mysterious place. 
The Alliance casts a powerful defense so that you won't be swept up by the dark energy.
#cYour Attack Power is greatly enhanced for 30 seconds, and the cooldown for some skills is set to 5 seconds.#
However, the Attack Power increase does not apply to those who are already strong enough.

string.name: desc
string.value:
You've removed the Seed of Life before it turned into a Transcendion.
Obtain additional EXP when you defeat monsters.
Eliminate the #cSeed of Life# before the buff ends to level up the buff.
#cLevel 1: Acquire 20% more EXP
Level 2: Acquire 30% more EXP
Level 3: Acquire 40% more EXP
Level 4: Acquire 50% more EXP
Level 5: Acquire 60% more EXP

string.name: desc
string.value:
Restore the destroyed world by remembering the journey you took to get to this point.
Obtain #cMaple Leaves of Peace# and#c determination# by eliminating#c monsters near your level#. You can activate#c one of four skills# when you've collected enough #cMaple Leaves of Peace#.
#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#
#cYou cannot use this skill if you have already collected all of the determination you can for the day.#
#cOnly works in fields with Monsters Near Your Level.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
The air became saturated with Erda when the Light Giant took damage.
#cSkills with a cooldown of 5 seconds or longer will have their cooldowns set to 5 seconds for a short time, and EXP obtained will increase by 200%.#
Buff duration increase effect does not apply, and certain buff skills will be unaffected by this effect.
#cLeaving the map will dispel the effect.#

string.name: desc
string.value: An effect granted to warriors who helped deal damage to the #cLight Giant#.\nIncreases EXP obtained by 100% for 3 min.\n#cLeaving the map will dispel the effect.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute, cherub-like fairy scatters the leaf dew at high speed to deal damage to your enemies. Holding down the skill key charges up a large water drop for a more powerful attack.

string.name: h
string.value: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #u% \r\nCharged Dew Drop Mischief \r\nMax Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: #u2%

string.name: desc
string.value: Wonky the Fairy leaps and flies temporarily. Restores HP while in flight and does a radial attack when Dew Drop Mischief is used.

string.name: h
string.value:
Leap in the direction you're facing and fly for 4 seconds. 
Restores #x% of Max HP per sec while in flight. 
Duration: 15 sec 
Dew Drop Mischief fires a front radial attack while in flight. 
Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: #u%

string.name: desc
string.value: Protects the body with condensed dew drops infused with fairy energy.

string.name: h
string.value: No damage received beyond #x% of Wonky's maximum HP per hit. \r\nDamage Reflect: #y%, Duration: #time sec \r\nCooldown: 20 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Wonky the Fairy strikes the leaf 2 times at high speed.

string.name: h
string.value: On every hit, Number of Enemies in Front Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%. The opponent's character will become confused for #time sec on the second hit. Cooldown: 12 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Collects power from everyone to fire an energy sphere in front of you. Hold down the skill key to charge the energy sphere up to 3 levels and release it to fire the energy sphere in the direction you are facing. The higher the charge level, the faster and more powerful the attack will be. #cThe charged energy sphere will cancel if Wonky enters the Last Stage while holding the charge.#

string.name: h
string.value: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Lv. 1 Damage: #v%, Lv. 2 Damage: #u%, Lv. 3 Damage: #u2%. Abnormal Status ignored or removed while charging. Cooldown: 50 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Attack competitors and monsters in front of you with help from the ancient hero's spirit.
Enemies will be stunned for a set amount of time and pushed back.
For each competitor successfully hit, you'll earn 100 points.
Cannot be used while using certain skills.

string.name: h
string.value: SP Cost: 50%, Damage: #damage%, Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Protect yourself from your opponent's attacks for a short time with the help of the ancient hero's spirit. You cannot move while you are under this protection. However, if you successfully defend against your opponent's attack, the protective shield will be destroyed. You'll then be able to move immediately and earn 100 points.\nCannot be used while using certain skills.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Blast an orb to attack opponents and monsters with the help of the ancient hero's spirit.
Competitors hit with the orb will be stunned for a set amount of time and pushed back.
For each competitor successfully hit, you'll earn 100 points.
Cannot be used while using certain skills.

string.name: h
string.value: SP Cost: 50%, Damage: #damage%, Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: A blessing for those who have overcome Medusa's trials.\r\nBoss Damage: +30%\r\nDuration: 10 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Subject yourself to the training of a Glory Guard. Use this skill in the Glory Guard Drill Hall at the Outpost to choose between conducting Mock Battles and Tactical Research which grant EXP and Glory respectively. The amount of Glory you receive increases with your Guard Rank.

string.name: h
string.value: While using this skill in the Glory Guard Drill Hall, you will periodically gain Glory or Exp.\nGlory Acquired:#u\nEXP Acquired: Proportionate to Character Level (EXP Training requires Lv. 105+, and is limited to 8 hours a day.)

string.name: desc
string.value: A skill that's enhanced depending on your #cAdventurer Tier#. Eliminate#c monsters near your level# to charge your #cAdventure Power# and earn #cAdventure Points x100# at a fixed rate. Once your Adventure Power is full, your #cConcentration# will be enhanced for #c5 sec#, and you'll summon the #cDantes Statue# from Adventure Island. The summoned Dantes Statue deals great damage to surrounding enemies.\r\n\r\n#cRight-click to toggle ON/OFF.#

string.name: h
string.value: You get #cAdventure Points x100# at a fixed rate when you eliminate monsters near your level. Max Enemies Hit: #c15#, #cDamage: 1,000%#, #cNumber of Attacks: 6#

string.name: desc
string.value: 일정 시간 동안 하늘을 날 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 일정 시간 동안 자신의 이동 속도와 점프력을 증가시켜 준다.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c뉴트로 워리어#들을 소환한다. #c레벨 범위 몬스터#가 나오는 사냥터에서 소환한 뒤 몬스터를 퇴치하면 일정 확률로 #c뉴트로 파워#를 획득한다. 일정량의 뉴트로 파워 획득 시 뉴트로 워리어 주위의 마법진이 네 단계 걸쳐 변화한다. #c최종 단계#에 도달했을 때 #c스킬을 사용#하면 사용 위치에 뉴트로 워리어가 #c전투에 참여#하여 #c1분 동안# 적을 공격한다. 

#c우클릭으로 온오프 할 수 있습니다.#
#c일일 획득 가능 뉴트로 파워를 모두 모았다면 더 이상 소환 할 수 없습니다.#

string.name: h1
string.value: 초보 마법사 피피가 함께한다.\r\n#c[전투참여: 피피]# 최대 7명의 적을 1000%의 데미지로 2번 공격

string.name: h2
string.value: 초보 마법사 피피, 보물 사냥꾼 로이드가 함께한다.\r\n#c[전투참여 : 피피]# 최대 7명의 적을 1000%의 데미지로 2회 공격\r\n#c[전투참여 : 로이드]# 최대 8명의 적을 400%의 데미지로 5회 공격

string.name: h3
string.value:
초보 마법사 피피, 보물 사냥꾼 로이드, 용의 기사 해리얼이 함께한다.
#c[전투참여 : 피피]# 최대 7명의 적을 1000%의 데미지로 2회 공격
#c[전투참여 : 로이드]# 최대 8명의 적을 400%의 데미지로 5회 공격
#c[전투참여 : 해리얼]# 최대 9명의 적을 500%의 데미지로 4회 공격

string.name: desc
string.value: #c뉴트로 워리어#와 함께 전투하는 용사들을 위한 축복. 일정 시간 동안 몬스터를 사냥할 때 더 많은 경험치를 획득할 수 있다.

string.name: h
string.value: 1분 동안 몬스터 처치 시 획득 경험치 100% 증가

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c뉴트로 워리어#들을 소환한다. #c레벨 범위 몬스터#가 나오는 사냥터에서 소환한 뒤 몬스터를 퇴치하면 일정 확률로 #c뉴트로 파워#를 획득한다. 획득 시 뉴트로 워리어들의 기운이 점차 강해진다. 기운이 가득 찼을 때 한 번 더 스킬을 사용하면 사용 위치에 용사가 배치되어 일정 시간 동안 주위의 적을 공격한다. 

#c우클릭으로 온오프 할 수 있습니다.#
#c일일 획득 가능 뉴트로 파워를 모두 모았다면 더 이상 소환 할 수 없습니다.#

string.name: desc
string.value: #c레벨 범위 몬스터#를 처치하면 일정 확률로 #c20 뉴트로 파워#를 획득할 수 있다. 일정량의 뉴트로 파워를 모으면 #c뉴트로 몬스터 스테이지#가 발동된다.\r\n\r\n#c우클릭으로 온오프#

string.name: h
string.value: 레벨 범위 몬스터 사냥 시 일정 확률로 #c20 뉴트로 파워# 획득, 일정량의 뉴트로 파워를 모으면 #c뉴트로몬스터 스테이지# 발동

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Cotton Candy Bean mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Riding on the Builders' Hot Air Balloon allowed you to make the watchtower even taller than before.

string.name: desc
string.value: 뉴트로 몬스터 스테이지에서 몬스터 사냥 시 획득 경험치가 600% 증가한다.

string.name: desc
string.value: [마스터 레벨 : 1]\n고공 비행 스킬 사용이 가능한 뉴트로 화염새 라이딩을 타고 이동할 수 있다. 마을에서 점프 키를 두번 연달아 누르면 고공 비행 스킬을 사용할 수 있다.\r\n#c맵에서 라이딩에 탑승 후 월드맵에서 원하는 목적지를 더블클릭#하면 네비게이션을 따라 해당 위치까지 자동으로 비행합니다. (빅토리아 아일랜드를 비롯한 일부 대륙에서만 자동비행이 가능합니다. #c교관 어빈에게서 비행허가권을 구매#하여 스마트 라이딩 허가 대륙을 확장할 수 있습니다.)

string.name: desc
string.value: [마스터 레벨 : 1]\n고공 비행 스킬 사용이 가능한 뉴트로 냉동참치 라이딩을 타고 이동할 수 있다. 마을에서 점프 키를 두번 연달아 누르면 고공 비행 스킬을 사용할 수 있다.\r\n#c맵에서 라이딩에 탑승 후 월드맵에서 원하는 목적지를 더블클릭#하면 네비게이션을 따라 해당 위치까지 자동으로 비행합니다. (빅토리아 아일랜드를 비롯한 일부 대륙에서만 자동비행이 가능합니다. #c교관 어빈에게서 비행허가권을 구매#하여 스마트 라이딩 허가 대륙을 확장할 수 있습니다.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Glory Guard Mount that can use the High Altitude Flight skill. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.\r\n#cAfter getting on the mount in a map, double-click the destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount on more continents.)

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Taotie Mount that can use the High Altitude Flight skill. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.\r\n#cAfter getting on the mount in a map, double-click the destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount on more continents.)

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Pegasus Mount that can use the High Altitude Flight skill. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.\r\n#cAfter getting on the mount in a map, double-click the destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount on more continents.)

string.name: desc
string.value: 뉴트로 왕국의 명물 #c은빛갈기#를 소환한다. 은빛갈기를 소환한 채 #c레벨 범위 몬스터# 처치 시 일정 확률로 #c20 뉴트로 파워#를 획득한다. 뉴트로 파워 획득 시 은빛갈기의 기운이 점차 강해지며 기운이 가득 찰 때 한 번 더 스킬을 사용하면 #c은빛갈기에 탑승#해 적을 공격할 수 있다. \r\n\r\n#c우클릭으로 온오프#

string.name: h
string.value: 레벨 범위 몬스터 처치 시 일정 확률로 #c20 뉴트로 파워# 획득, 일정량의 뉴트로 파워를 모으면 #c은빛갈기# 탑승 가능

string.name: desc
string.value: 뉴트로 왕국의 명물 은빛갈기에 탑승하여 전투한다. 탑승 중 스킬을 다시 사용하여 돌진 공격을 사용할 수 있고 ↑ 방향키를 누른 채 스킬을 다시 사용하면 날아오르며 돌진 공격을 사용할 수 있다. 공중에서도 돌진 공격을 사용할 수 있으며 공중에 있을 때는 점프키를 스킬키 대신 사용할 수 있다.\r\n\r\n30초 동안 은빛갈기 탑승. 탑승 중 스탠스 100%. 돌진 공격은 최대 15명의 적을 2000%의 데미지로 5번 공격.

string.name: h
string.value: 30초 동안 은빛갈기 탑승, 탑승 중 스탠스 #indieStance%. \n돌진 공격은 최대 15명의 적을 2000%의 데미지로 5번 공격

string.name: desc
string.value: 30초 동안 몬스터 사냥 시 획득 경험치가 200% 증가한다.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 1]\nRide around on a Pirate Turtle mount that can use the double jump skill to move#c very quickly.# #cDouble-click a destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available in some regions, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount in additional regions.)

string.name: desc
string.value:
Takes out the Papyrus of Luck. You have a chance to obtain #cNewtro Power# when you defeat monsters in hunting zones with#c monsters near your level# after taking out the Papyrus. When you obtain a certain number of Newtro Power,#c one number# will get added to the formula on the Papyrus. When you get#c three# numbers and#c complete the formula#, you will get Newtro Power and additional EXP based on the result of the formula.
Press the #cInteract/Harvest key# after completing the formula to randomly rearrange the position of the numbers you obtained. 

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons everyone's favorite tactician to collect supplies and transport them to the Alliance.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Activates the Riftbringer. 
Defeating#c monsters near your level# in hunting zones while Riftbringer is active has a chance to grant#c dimensional energy#. Once Riftbringer is completely filled with the#c dimensional energy#, a#c dimensional rift# will open and periodically summon#c Specter# monsters. Defeating these monsters grants#c Glory# and#c bonus EXP#. 

#cRight-click to toggle on/off.#

string.name: h
string.value: Defeating monsters near your level opens a#c dimensional rift# which summons Specter Monsters. Defeating these monsters grants #cGlory# and#c bonus EXP.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Summons a #cPriest of Nerota# to search for Nerota's Relics. While summoned, defeating#c monsters near your level# in hunting zones has a chance to grant #cGlory#. After you have gathered enough Glory, the priest will uncoverone of #cNerota's Relics#. Press the #cInteract/Harves keyt# near this relic to gain #cNerota's Power#. 

#cRight-click to turn On/Off.#
#cYou cannot summon the Priest of Nerota if you have already reached the daily Glory limit.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a #cPriest of Nerota# for #cNerota Relic Hunt.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates a #cNerota's Blessing Orb# that lass for #c1 min# somewhere on the map. Touching this orb grants #cGlory#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Activates #cNerota's Protection# once every 10 sec for #c1 min,# dealing damage to nearby monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a Spisan piloting the#c Kaboom Bomber.# Defeating#c monsters near your level# in hunting zones has a chance to warm up the Kaboom Bomber, granting#c Glory.# The bomber's appearance changes according to its warm up stage. Use the skill# when Warm Up has reached its#c final stage,# to#c deploy# the bomber at your location where it will shoot flames.\r\n\r\n#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF. It will stop warming up if you exceed the daily Glory limit.#

string.name: h1
string.value: The deployed Kaboom Bomber attacks up to 8 enemies for 250% damage 8 times over 45 sec. It cannot Warm Up or grant Glory if the skill is on cooldown.\r\n#cCooldown: 60 sec#

string.name: h2
string.value: The deployed Kaboom Bomber attacks up to 8 enemies in a wide area for 250% damage 8 times for 45 sec. It cannot Warm Up or grant Glory if the skill is on cooldown.\r\n#cCooldown: 60 sec#

string.name: h3
string.value: The deployed Kaboom Bomber attacks up to 15 enemies in a wide area for 250% damage 8 times for 45 sec. It cannot Warm Up or grant Glory if the skill is on cooldown.\r\n#cCooldown: 60 sec#

string.name: h4
string.value: The deployed Kaboom Bomber attacks up to 15 enemies in a wide area for 250% damage 8 times for 60 sec. It cannot Warm Up or grant Glory if the skill is on cooldown.\r\n#cCooldown: 60 sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Press the Interact/Harvest key to drop a bomb. Can sink one Ebonstar Landing Ship.

string.name: desc
string.value: Activates #cNerota's Protection# once every 10 sec for #c1 min,# dealing damage to nearby monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates a #cNerota's Blessing Orb# that lass for #c1 min# somewhere on the map. Touching this orb grants #cGlory#.

string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Red Aquastallion mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires a net missile from Aquastallion's mouth. Enemies hit by the net will be temporarily stunned.

string.name: desc
string.value: Aquastallion becomes temporarily invincible. Your HP will not be reduced by enemy missiles.

string.name: desc
string.value: Conjures a protective shield using the Ancient Power extracted from Library Ghosts. You are protected from all attacks in the library when inside the protective shield.

string.name: h
string.value: Press the Interact/Harvest key to activate a protective shield for #c5 sec#.\r\n#cAll attacks are ignored# while within the protective shield.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Activates the Glory Guard Medal.
Defeating#c monsters near your level# in hunting zones while the Glory Guard Medal is active has a chance to grant#c Ancient Gods' Power#. Filling the Glory Guard Medal with power will activate #cGlory Guard's Brilliance#, instantly granting 2,000 Glory and a providing chance to gain glory from defeating monsters for the buff's duration.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.value: Activates #cGlory Guard's Brilliance#, granting 2,000 Glory.\r\nGrants Glory# when defeating regular monsters near your level while active.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nRide the Haechi mount alongside your highest level character within the world. Press the Jump key twice in a row to use the High Altitude Flight skill. If your highest level character is Zero, Zero's gender will be determined based on your current character's gender.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nRide in glorious style on a Meso-Raining Goblin Cloud mount, which has the High Altitude Flight skill. Meso Cascade Pouches drop while you ride. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: [마스터 레벨 : 1]\n고공 비행 스킬 사용이 가능한 천둥새 라이딩을 타고 이동할 수 있다. 마을에서 점프 키를 두번 연달아 누르면 고공 비행 스킬을 사용할 수 있다.

string.name: desc

(Auto Pilot is only available in some regions, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount in additional regions.)

string.name: name
string.value: バルログのヘルファイヤー

string.name: desc
string.value: バルログの魂を召還し画面の中の多数の敵に強力な火炎攻撃をする。nダメージ2500%で15匹攻撃、クリティカル確率+20%、再使用待機時間5分

string.name: h1
string.value: バルログの魂を召還し画面の中の多数の敵に強力な火炎攻撃をする。

string.name: name
string.value: ホーンテイルのファイヤーブレス

string.name: desc
string.value: ホーンテイルの魂を召還し左右の複数の敵に強力な火炎攻撃をする。 対象は一定時間の間持続的に火炎ダメージを受ける。nダメージ3500%で15匹攻撃、クリティカル確率+20%、10秒の間、持続ダメージ秒当たり、300%、再使用待機時間5分

string.name: h1
string.value: ホーンテイルの魂を召還し左右の複数の敵に強力な火炎攻撃をする。 対象は一定時間の間持続的に火炎ダメージを受ける。

string.name: desc
string.value: レックスの魂を召還し前方の複数の敵を一気に即死させる。ボスモンスターには一般ダメージが適用される。n一般モンスター即死、ボスモンスターダメージ1500%、再使用待機時間5分

string.value: ヴァンレオンの魂を召還し相手に防御力を無視した強力な一撃を与える。nダメージ5000%で1匹攻撃、クリティカル確率+30%、相手防御力を無視、再使用待機時間5分

string.name: h1
string.value: ヴァンレオンの魂を召還し相手に防御力を無視した強力な一撃を与える。

string.name: name
string.value: ジャクムのバーニングタワー

string.name: desc
string.value: ジャクムの魂を召還し左右の複数の敵を燃え上がるタワーで攻撃する。相手は一定時間の間持続的に火炎被害を受ける。

string.name: h1
string.value: ヴァンレオンの魂を召還し相手に防御力を無視した強力な一撃を与える。

string.name: name
string.value: ジェラシーロッカーのデスピッキング

string.name: desc
string.value: ジェラシーロッカーの魂を召還する。召還したジェラシーロッカー2分程現れ周りの複数の敵にスターン攻撃をする。nダメージ500%で15匹にスターン攻撃、持続時間2分、再使用待機時間5分

string.name: h1
string.value: ジェラシーロッカーの魂を召還する。召還したジェラシーロッカー2分程現れ周りの複数の敵にスターン攻撃をする。

string.name: desc
string.value: 武公の魂から強力な力を受け取って30秒間普段の2倍のダメージを与える。nダメージ2倍増加、持続時間1分、再使用待機時間5分

string.name: h1
string.value: 武公の魂から強力な力を受け取って30秒間普段の2倍のダメージを与える。

string.name: name
string.value: ピンクビーンの来るな！

string.name: desc
string.value: ピンクビーンの魂を召還する。召還したピンクビーンは２分程現れ周りの複数の敵に強力な攻撃をする。nダメージ1500%で15匹攻撃、持続時間1分、再使用待機時間5分

string.name: h1
string.value: ピンクビーンの魂を召還する。召還したピンクビーンは２分程現れ周りの複数の敵に強力な攻撃をする。

string.name: desc
string.value: 爆風のようなシグナスの威力を感じられる。魂の武器の力で召喚されたシグナスが周辺のモンスターに嵐のような攻撃を開始する。

string.name: h
string.value: #time秒間、攻撃力#damage%のシグナス召喚\n再使用待機時間 #cooltime秒

string.name: name
string.value: クセルクセスのヤギ隊

string.name: desc
string.value: クセルクセスのヤギ隊が突進する。魂の武器の力で召喚されたクセルクセスがヤギ隊と前方を攻撃する。

string.name: h
string.value: 最大#mobCount体の敵を#damage%ダメージで#attackCount回攻撃\n再使用待機時間 #cooltime秒

string.name: desc
string.value: エピネアが立ち去った場所には香りが漂っている。魂の武器の力で召喚されたエピネアの力でグループ員のHP/MPが上昇する。

string.name: h
string.value: #time秒間、グループ員のHP/MP 50%増加\n再使用待機時間 #cooltime秒

string.name: desc
string.value: アカイラムのコブラは周りのものを全て硬直させるほどの威力がある。魂の武器の力で召喚されたアカイラムが強い眼差しで周辺のモンスターにスタンダメージを与える。

string.name: h
string.value: 最大#mobCount体の敵を#damage% ダメージで#attackCount回攻撃、被害を受けた対象は#time秒間気絶\n再使用待機時間#cooltime秒

string.name: desc
string.value: 巨大的海中王族，額頭上有著恐怖的疤痕。被靈魂武器力量召喚的海怒斯以兇暴的咆哮對周圍的怪物造成緩慢効果。

string.name: h
string.value: 對周圍的怪物造成#prob%的緩慢効果\n冷卻時間：#cooltime秒

string.name: desc
string.value: 美艷的希拉將召喚閃電。被靈魂武器力量召喚的希拉向四面八方發動閃電雷擊，使周圍的怪物受到傷害。

string.name: h
string.value: #time秒內召喚攻擊力#damage%的希拉\n冷卻時間：#cooltime秒

string.name: desc
string.value: 大章魚噴吐毒霧。被靈魂武器力量召喚的船長黑綠水靈噴吐毒霧，使周圍的怪物受到毒氣傷害。

string.name: h
string.value: 對最多#mobCount個敵人造成#attackCount次#damage%傷害的攻擊，#dotTime秒內每#dotInterval秒持續受到#dot%的傷害\n冷卻時間：#cooltime秒

string.name: desc
string.value: 召喚背叛者梅格耐斯一同作戰。（小心他隨時都會背叛…）被靈魂武器力量召喚的梅格耐斯在一定時間內會攻擊周圍的怪物。

string.name: h
string.value: #time秒內召喚攻擊力#damage%的梅格耐斯\n冷卻時間#cooltime秒

string.name: desc
string.value:
[Master Level: 1]
Allows you to travel by riding a mount. 
If you have the #cSoaring (Mount)# skill, press the Up Arrow and the Jump keys to ascend. 
Consumes 5 MP when activated. 
Max Flight Time: #0 seconds#

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 10, Weapon and Magic Def: +10, Speed: 170%, Jump: 120%

string.name: desc
string.value: [最高等级：1]\n可以骑着梦魇移动。

string.name: h1
string.value: 消耗MP10，物理防御力、魔法防御力增加10，移动速度170，跳跃力120

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 1]\nAllows you to travel by riding a mount.

string.name: h
string.value: Weapon, Magic DEF: +10, Movement Speed: 170, Auto Pilot Speed: Very Fast, Jump: 120

string.name: desc
string.value: One of your basic moves, it puts you in Battoujutsu Stance for a quick attack. \nThis is a #ctoggle skill#, meaning some effects will be activated upon use and deactivated when used again.

string.name: h
string.value: During Battoujutsu Stance, Critical Rate Increase: #y%, Attack Speed Increases, and Chance to Stun: #prop% for #time sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases Max HP, Max MP, Weapon ATT, Speed, and Jump.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, Max HP and MP: +#x%, Weapon ATT: +#padX, Speed: +#speed, Jump: +#jump

string.name: desc
string.value: The third Battoujutsu secret technique. Transform into a whirlwind of destruction as you rush forward. Sends enemies flying if used right after Shouryuusen.

string.name: h
string.value: Active Effects: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. 100% Bonus Damage chance if used linked with Shouryuunsen. Passive Effect: Shouryuunsen's damage +#damR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Turns your blade into a tornado of steel, pushing all enemies around you to one side.

string.name: h
string.value: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Critical Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, pulls enemies. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Deal three devastating slashes against up to 6 enemies. Has a chance to deal extra damage.

string.name: h
string.value: [1st Hit] Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: 2. [2nd Hit] Damage: #x% Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 2. [3rd Hit] Damage: #y%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3. Bonus Damage Chance: #prop%, Bonus Damage: #z%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Focuses your fury and skill to attack a single enemy.

string.name: desc
string.value: The ultimate in destructive blows. Attacks multiple enemies with a guaranteed critical hit. Can instant KO enemies, and Hayato's Critical Rate increases for a short period after use.

string.name: h
string.value: Moves forward while attacking. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Critical Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Critical Rate: +#prop%, Duration: #time sec. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Not quite punchy, but close enough. Leap high into the air and dive down katana-first. Required Skill: Whirlwind Cut Lv. 20

string.name: h
string.value: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Stun Chance: #subProp% for #time sec, and Bonus Damage Buff to your party member attacks: #y%. Passive Effect: Shouryuunsen and Whirlwind Cut's Damage: +#damR%

string.name: desc
string.value: Hurls a mighty whirlwind forward to toss enemies into the sky. Chapter one of the Battoujutsu technique.

string.name: h
string.value: Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount to sweep up the enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the basic techniques of Battoujutsu. Dashes through enemies with an upward swing of the blade. Can be used four times in a row with no delay.

string.name: h
string.value: Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Dashes forward.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hold down the skill key, then use the arrow keys to teleport. Any enemies between your start and end path will be damaged with a chance to stun. Teleport to a random spot by tapping the skill key twice.

string.name: h
string.value: Normal Teleport: Move Horizontal: #x, Move Vertical: #y, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%. #prop% chance to Stun for #time sec.\nCommand:[#cSkill Key + Directional Key#]\nRandom Teleport: [Command：#cSkill Key#]

string.name: desc
string.value: When your target dies, its soul explodes to damage nearby enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Borrows the power of the fox spirit to gather enemies in one spot.

string.name: h
string.value: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount

string.name: desc
string.value: Shear a piece of your target's soul off with each attack. Use the skill again to detonate any fallen soul fragments. Can be stacked up to 10 times on normal monsters and 15 times on boss monsters.

string.name: h
string.value: Active Effect: Explosive Damage: #damage% per soul fragment, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, able to explode #attackCount fragments\nPassive Effect: #prop% chance to drop soul fragments

string.name: desc
string.value: Blasts the enemy with evil-destroying charms. Hold down the skill key for a rapid-fire attack.

string.name: h
string.value: Damage: #damage% per shot, Number of Attacks: #attackCount

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the mighty Orochi to attack up to 15 enemies.

string.name: h
string.value: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a sakura tree that damages nearby enemies while healing party members.

string.name: h
string.value: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Party Members' HP: #x% of HP\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a magical barrier to strengthen you and party members against boss monsters.

string.name: h
string.value: Damage vs. Boss: +#bdR%, Duration: #time sec \nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a powerful cherry blossom barrier to protect you and your party members.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, Damage Reduction: #x%, Status/Elemental Resistance: +#y%.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: h
string.value: Recovers up to #hp% of Max HP

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Haku Skill]#\nA flaming barrier of foxfire absorbs the damage that would otherwise hit Kanna, and counterattacks the attacker for #c#x% damage#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Haku invokes the ancient blessing of the foxes, increasing Magic Attack and Defense.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time, Magic Def: #indieMdd, Weapon DEF: #indiePdd, Haku's Magic ATT: +#x%

string.name: desc
string.value: A secret power only known to the fox spirits. Nullifies enemy knock-back attacks and ignores a portion of enemy defense.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time, Enemy DEF Ignored: #x%, Knock-Back Resist Chance: #prop%

string.name: desc
string.value: Haku temporarily assumes human form to use even more powerful Spirit Walker skills.\nRequired Skill: #cHaku Reborn Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value:
Upgrades Haku Reborn. Haku takes human form for #time sec. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

Haku's Spirit Walker Skills
#c[Haku's Gift 2]#: When Kanna's HP is below 90%, restores #hp% of max HP. (Cooldown: 120 sec)
#c[Foxfire 2]#: Summons a barrier made up of 3 wisps of foxfire for #w sec. When Kanna is hit, the foxfire absorbs the damage instead, then retaliates by exploding for #y% damage. (Cooldown: 60 sec)
#c[Haku's Blessing 2]#: Increases Magic ATT for you and your party members by #x% of Magic ATT of the fan Haku has equipped. (Always Applied)
#c[Breath of the Unseen 2]#: Kanna's final damage increased by 5% for each party member. (Always Applied)

string.name: name
string.value: 青炎ナイトメアライディング

string.name: desc
string.value:
[マスターレベル : 1]
青炎ナイトメアに乗って移動することができる。
#フライングライディング#スキルがある場合、「↑」キーを押しながら「ジャンプ」キーを入力すると飛ぶことができる。
発動する度にMP5を消費する。

string.value: Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Tengu's lightning attacks will be 100% Critical attacks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls forth a terrifying ghost to attack enemies in front of you. Does not consume Mana.

string.name: h
string.value: Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount

string.name: desc
string.value: Channels the power of Take-mikazuchi, god of lightning, into Shikigami Haunting, adding extra damage and knockback. Required Skill: Frozen Shikigami Haunting Lv. 15.

string.name: h
string.value: Active Effect: Duration: #time sec., Shikigami Haunting's lightning is used to apply additional #x% damage and knock back on every 3rd strike. Passive Effect: Permanently increases the damage of Shikigami Haunting by (95)% (Total Damage Increase: (210)%)

string.name: desc
string.value: One of Akatsuki's basic moves. Swing your sword and jump with the momentum to deal damage to all enemies in your path. You can jump higher at higher skill levels.\n[Command: #cUp + Up Arrow Keys#]

string.name: h
string.value: Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, jumps upward

string.name: desc
string.value: A repeatable skill. Swing your gun like a sword, followed by 3 shots. The shots explode, damaging nearby enemies and knocking back the target.

string.value:
1st Hit: Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 2
2nd Hit: Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 140%, Number of Attacks: 2
3rd Hit: Max Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 160%, Number of Attacks: 2
4th Hit: Max Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 180%, Number of Attacks: 3, Attacked enemy will be knocked back and explode to deal Damage: 200%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 4

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates a protective shield that absorbs the enemy's attack. Increases Weapon DEF and Magic DEF by 500. Immune to knockback. Duration: 60 sec. Using the skill right when an enemy attacks will incapacitate the enemy and allow you to counterattack once. When the buff expires, it will be replaced by Divine Guardian. \r\nGuard Success: Casts Divine Shield\r\nGuard Fail: Casts Divine Brilliance

string.name: desc
string.value: Teleports the Wondroid to the desired destination. You cannot send it #cbeyond the range of WonderLync#.\r\n[Usage: #cPress the skill button and click on the desired destination#]

string.name: desc
string.value: Picks up the Wondroid and throws it forward. You cannot throw it #cbeyond the range of WonderLync#.\r\n[Usage: #cPress, and then release the skill button.#]

string.name: desc
string.value: Picks up the Wondroid and throws it forward. You cannot throw it #cbeyond the range of WonderLync#.\r\n[Usage: #cPress, and then release the skill button.#]

string.name: desc
string.value: Commands the Wondroid to leap forward. \r\n[Usage: #cType the command 'jump' in the chat window#]

string.name: desc
string.value: Commands the Wondroid to stand still. \r\n[Usage: #cType the command 'stop' in the chat window#]

string.name: desc
string.value: Commands the Wondroid to resume following. \r\n[Usage: #cType the command 'follow' in the chat window#]

string.name: desc
string.value: Commands the Wondroid to lay in a prone position. \r\n[Usage: #cType the command 'down' in the chat window#]

string.name: desc
string.value: Commands a Wondroid that is lying prone to get up. \r\n[Activate: #cType the command 'up' in the chat window#]

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect 1,000 of a given Elunarium ore to increase its level, up to a maximum of level 5. The higher its level, the greater its effects. Each different kind of ore levels separately and provides different stats.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases both Attack Power and Magic Attack by 3.\

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases both Attack Power and Magic Attack by 5.\

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases both Attack Power and Magic Attack by 7.\

string.name: desc
string.value: Elunarium (ATT & M. ATT) increases in level for every 1,000 collected, up to level 5. Its effects are enhanced at higher levels. You can feel your Attack Power & Magic ATT grow with each level.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, Attack Power: +#indiePad, Magic ATT: +#indieMad. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Elunarium (Skill EXP) increases in level for every 1,000 collected, up to level 5. Its effects are enhanced at higher levels. You can feel the amount of EXP gained from using skills grow with each level.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, EXP Bonus for Skill Use: +#indieExp%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Elunarium (Boss Damage) increases in level for every 1,000 collected, up to level 5. Its effects are enhanced at higher levels. You can feel your Boss Damage grow with each level.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, Boss Damage: +#indieBDR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Elunarium (Ignore Enemy DEF) increases in level for every 1,000 collected, up to level 5. Its effects are enhanced at higher levels. You can feel your Ignore Enemy DEF stat grow with each level.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, Enemy DEF Ignored: +#indieIgnoreMobpdpR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec, MP Cost: #mpCon

string.name: desc
string.value: Elunarium (Crit Rate) increases in level for every 1,000 collected, up to level 5. Its effects are enhanced at higher levels. You can feel your Critical Rate grow with each level.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, Critical Rate: +#indieCr%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Elunarium (Crit Damage) increases in level for every 1,000 collected, up to level 5. Its effects are enhanced at higher levels. You can feel your Critical Damage grow with each level.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, Critical Damage: +#indieCD%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Elunarium (Status Resistance) increases in level for every 1,000 collected, up to level 5. Its effects are enhanced at higher levels. You can feel your Status Resistance grow with each level.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, Status Resistance: +#indieAsrR. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Elunarium (All Stats) increases in level for every 1,000 collected, up to level 5. Its effects are enhanced at higher levels. You can feel all of your stats grow proportionately with each level.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, All Stats: +#indieAllStat. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Summons a #cFlame Bird# who wants to help save the world. Summon the Flame Bird in a hunting ground where #cmonsters near your level# appear. Defeat monsters when the bird is near to acquire #cFlame Bird's determination#. It counts towards your determination count, and also charges the Flame Bird's Energy. When its Energy is full, use the skill once more to temporarily ride around on the Flame Bird and attack nearby enemies. 

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#
#cYou cannot summon the Flame Bird if you have already collected all the determination you can for the day.#

string.value: Defeat monsters near your level and collect the Nature's Roar Fragments they drop. Collect enough Nature's Roar Fragments, then press the skill key when #cglimmering light# surrounds your character to deal damage to enemies and obtain #c300 Story of Pebble and Wind points#. You'll also earn #c15 Story of Pebble and Wind points# for each monster you defeat using the skill. However, if you don't use it #cwithin 1 min#, you'll lose that charge of Nature's Roar.\r\n\r\n#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#

string.value: Increases Attack Power and Magic ATT by 3.

string.value: Increases Attack Power and Magic ATT by 5.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Attack Power and Magic ATT by 7.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Thunder Bird mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 1]\nNullifies all enemy magic effects, removes abnormal conditions suffered by nearby characters including yourself, and recovers HP.

string.name: h1
string.value: Nullifies Abnormal Status of nearby allies and recovers HP

string.name: desc
string.value: Greatly boosts the stats of nearby characters.

string.name: h1
string.value: Attack and Magic Ability +20, and other abilities +100 for 30 minutes.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: 30 min, ATT/Magic ATT: +30, Max HP/Max MP: +30%, DEF: +100, Speed: +40

string.name: desc
string.value: The great dragon's roar crashes up to 10 enemies.

string.name: h
string.value: Damage: 9,999%, Attack Range: entire screen, Max Damage: 99,999,999

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nIncreases Max HP and Max MP for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level:1]\nActivate Lie Detector on the suspicious macro user.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Accuracy and Avoidability of guild members.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases EXP received by guild members when hunting monsters.

string.value: Increases Guild Member's Attack Power and Magic Attack.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Movement Speed and Jump of guild members.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Critical Hit Rate of guild members.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special potion is provided every Monday.

string.name: h
string.value: Every Monday, provides #u potions that fully recover HP and MP

string.name: desc
string.value: Periodically gain Reward Points for staying online. You'll receive your points when you receive your Guild Contribution Points. \n[Required Skill]: #cSpotting Small Change Lv. 4# \n[Required SP Spent]: #c8#

string.name: desc
string.value: Get discounts when purchasing items from stores and bonuses when selling items to stores. (Does not apply to items with resell prices of 70% or more of their purchase price.) \n[Required Skill]: #cPoint Accrual Lv. 4# \n[Required SP Spent]: #c16#

string.name: h
string.value: Discount/Bonus Amount: #disCountR%, some items are not eligible

string.name: desc
string.value: Every Monday, you'll get guild potions that fully restore your HP/MP and Guild Blessings that raise your Attack Power/Magic Attack.

string.name: h
string.value: On Mondays, get Guild Potions: #x, Guild Blessings: #y

string.name: desc
string.value: Get a discount when using party points to purchase items from the Pub.\n[Required SP Spent]: #c16#

string.name: desc
string.value: Get bonus mesos when hunting monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases your success rate when you use regular scrolls or Spell Traces (excludes Special Scrolls).\n[Required SP]: #c24#

string.name: h
string.value: Regular Scroll and Spell Trace Success Rate: +#itemUpgradeBonusR%

string.name: desc
string.value: When you fail a scroll and your item is about to be destroyed, there's a chance your item won't be destroyed.\n[Required SP Spent]: #c32#

string.name: desc
string.value: When you fail a scroll or Spell Trace enhancement, there's a chance the upgrade count will not be consumed.\n[Required Skills]: #cEnhancement Mastery Lv. 4, Item Salvation Lv. 4#\n[Required SP Spent]: #c32#

string.name: h
string.value: Upgrade Save Chance for regular scrolls or Spell Traces: #itemTUCProtectR%

string.name: desc
string.value: Decreases the amount of EXP you lose when you die.

string.name: desc
string.value: Moves you to the #cguild mate of your choice on the same channel#. Cannot be used on all maps.\n[Required SP Spent]: #c8#

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the #cguildmate of your choice on the same channel#. Cannot be used on all maps. Costs IGP. The cooldown will activate even if your guildmate rejects your request, so give them a heads up first.\n[Required Skill]: #cOn My Way Lv. 3#\n[Required SP Spent]: #c24#

string.name: desc
string.value:
[Guild Master Skill]
Summons #call online guild members in the same channel#. Can only be used in Henesys and Leafre. Costs GP and the cooldown activates right when the skill is used. 
[Required Skill]: #cGuild Megaphone Lv. 1#
[Required SP spent]: #c32#

string.name: desc
string.value:
[Guild Master Skill]
Use a one-line Super Megaphone to advertise your guild.
[Required Skill]: #cBanner of Plenty Lv. 4#
[Required Sp Spent]: #c16#

string.name: h
string.value: GP Cost: #gpCon, Cooldown: 7 days, allows you to use the Super Megaphone one time

string.name: desc
string.value: Revives all party members with full MP.\n[Required Skill]: #cMore Party Play Lv. 3#\n[Required Sp Spent]: #c24#

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to participate in more Cross World Party Quests by restoring your daily count a set amount. Make sure to use this skill #cafter you've already received your reward for playing 5 times#! \n[Required Spent SP]: #c8#
